title: SmallRig Articulating Arm (5.5 inches) 2065B
desc:
1.It is equipped with 1/4" screws on both ends respectively.

2.It could attach monitor via the 1/4" screw on the one end and attach accessories with 1/4"-20 threaded holes on the other end.

3.Mounted with 1/4" screw is a rubber cushion which could prevent the scratches of monitor and help to lock the monitor tighter.

4.It features an ergonomic wingnut for great convenience that could help to adjust any angles based on your needs.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Articulating Arm (5.5 inches) 2065

It is equipped with 1/4" screws on both ends respectively. Thus, it could attach monitor via the 1/4" screw on the one end and attach accessories with 1/4"-20 threaded holes on the other end, like cage, NATO Rail 1973, 15mm Rod 1182 and Quick Release Rod Clamp 1976 etc. Mounted with 1/4" screw is a rubber cushion which could prevent the scratches of monitor and help to lock the monitor tighter. It features an ergonomic wingnut for great convenience that could help to adjust any angles based on your needs.

Key Features

1.It is equipped with 1/4" screws on both ends respectively.

title: SmallRig mini Magic Arm with Universal Ball Head 3238B
desc:
1. Compact and portable.

2. Maximum load-bearing capacity of 5kg / 11lb.

3. 1/4”-20 threaded anti-scratch and anti-twist rubber pads.

4. Adjustable universal ball head.

5. Easy one-handed assembly and disassembly.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig mini Magic Arm with Universal Ball Head 3238B

SmallRig mini Magic Arm with Universal Ball Head 3238B consists of two 1/4"-20 screw ball heads and one ball head clamp. It can be attached to the top or side of a cage on one end and to a monitor on the other. Maximum load-bearing capacity of 5kg / 11lb. Compact and portable, this mini magic arm suits for shooting with lightweight equipment. The 1/4”-20 threaded anti-scratch and anti-twist rubber pads prevent looseness due to vibration.

Note:

1. Maximum load-bearing capacity: 5kg / 11lb.

2. Do not use it in high-impact activities.

3. Avoid prolonged contact with water and rain.

4. Applicable temperature range: -20°C to 60°C / -4°F to 140°F.

title: SmallRig Φ62.5-Φ64.5 Seamless Focus Gear Ring 3291
desc:
1. Standard 0.8 MOD, anti-slip surface design, with accurate conduction.

2. Moderate stiffness, fits lens perfectly.

3. Support 360-degree rotation, seamless switching.

4. Coaxial with the lens, provides stable transmission.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Φ62.5-Φ64.5 Seamless Focus Gear Ring 3291

SmallRig Φ62.5-Φ64.5 Seamless Focus Gear Ring 3291 is designed to fit lenses for precise and stable focal length adjustment. Features standard 0.8 MOD and made by elastic material, suits lens seamlessly and evenly. The ring is compatible with Φ62.5-Φ64.5mm lenses and can work with Mini Follow Focus 3010 and other follow focus systems. It makes less noise and no distortion, allowing 360º smooth rotation and precise focus adjustment.

Note: Gear slippage or jam may occur when mounted onto lenses larger than Φ62.5-Φ64.5mm across.

Key Features

1. Standard 0.8 MOD, anti-slip surface design, with accurate conduction.

2. Moderate stiffness, fits lens perfectly.

3. Support 360-degree rotation, seamless switching.

4. Coaxial with the lens, provides stable transmission.

Work With

Standard 0.8 MOD gear

title: SmallRig Drop-in HawkLock mini Magic Arm with Quick Release Ball Head 3515C
desc:
1. Quickly locked and unlocked through a click without jamming.

2. 360° freely adjustable ball head.

3. Supports ball heads with different interfaces.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Drop-in HawkLock mini Magic Arm with Quick Release Ball Head 3515C

SmallRig Magic Arm with Quick Release Ball Head 3515C is a quick-release mount, which features 1/4"-20 threaded screw slots on both ends, with cushions to enhance friction and prevent scratches. Its quick-release ball head is compatible with devices with 1/4"-20 threads, such as cameras, monitors, cages, mounting plates, etc. and the quick-release plate can buckle vertically and stable into the baseplate, causing no deflection. The magic arm is easy to lock and unlock. The ball head, together with a clamp, enables universal adjustment of the magic arm. It is removable and replaceable. It’s compatible with accessories of 2132, 2133, 2134, 2114, 2108, BUM2383, and 2211, you can choose to get the above accessories according to your needs. This magic arm, which holds up to 5kg, locks devices securely during shooting.

Note: To prevent accidental contact from causing unlocking, the structure of HawkLock Quick Release is designed to prevent accidental contact, and the wrench also has a certain free movement in the locked state. The situation mentioned above is not a quality problem without affecting normal use.

Packing List

1 x Magic Arm with Quick Release Ball Head

1 x Allen Wrench

Technical Data

Product Dimensions: 27.6 x 58.8 x 142.4 mm

Package Dimensions: 156 x 83 x 43 mm

Net Weight: 185g±5g

Package Weight: 221g±5g

Material: Aluminum Alloy, Stainless Steel

title: SmallRig Crab-Shaped Clamp with Ballhead Magic Arm 3757B
desc:
1. Made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy and stainless steel for greater sturdiness and durability.

2. Load capacity< 3.5 kg, compatible with most photographic accessories.

3. Wide compatibility: equipped with 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes.

4. Anti-twist design.

5. Open distance of 14mm - 65mm, anti-slip cushions make it safer and more stable.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Crab-Shaped Clamp with Ballhead Magic Arm 3757B

SmallRig Crab-Shaped Clamp with Ballhead Magic Arm 3757B is made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy and stainless steel, CNC machined, and carved to increase sturdiness and durability. It features a skeletal design and shark clamp with stronger clamping force as well as widely compatible 1/4"-20 threaded holes, and 3/8"-16 threaded holes. The clamp, which supports a rod of a minimum diameter of 14mm and a surface with a maximum thickness of 65mm, can quickly attach cameras, monitors, LED lights, etc. to round pipes, tables, handlebars, tripods, and stabilizers handheld rings. In addition, built-in cushions provide protection and clamping stability. The ballhead magic arm consists of two ball heads and a ballhead clamp. An anti-twist design secures it to the crab-shaped clamp to prevent disconnection. The bottom ballhead is designed with a hex hole for enhanced fastening with the Allen wrench. The 360-degree adjustable ball heads feature anti-slip threads for easier locking and one 1/4"-20 screw to allow quickly connecting action cameras, monitors, LED lights, microphones, and other accessories. 

Note:

1. Please do not disassemble the original machine screw, otherwise it may lead to the deflection of the original ballhead magic arm.

2. Please do not disassemble the original machine screw to replace the original ballhead magic arm, otherwise it may lead to thread failure.

Work With

Rod 14mm - 60mm in diameter

Surface thickness up to 65mm

Packing List

1 x Crab-Shaped Clamp

1 x Ballhead Magic Arm

1 x Action Camera Adapter

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Magic Arm with Dual Ball Heads (1/4”-20 Screws) 3873

SmallRig Magic Arm with Dual Ball Heads (1/4”-20 Screws) 3873 is compact and lightweight. Each ball head, 20mm in diameter, features one 1/4 "-20 screw and stretchable pins that prevent twisting. The adjustable thumb lever helps secure the ball head at an appropriate angle and comes with a small magnetic wrench at the bottom to tighten the thumbwheels. At both ends of the ball head clamp there are notches which leave more space for flexible adjustment of ball heads as well as accessories mounted thereon. This item weighs only 88g, making it easy to carry around and store.

title: SmallRig Camera Battery for Fujifilm NP-W235 4072
desc:
1. Fully Decoded Chip:  the battery supports the original camera and charger without causing pop-ups and enables power display.

2. Long Battery Life: 2040 mAh high capacity brings long battery life.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Battery for Fujifilm NP-W235 4072

SmallRig Camera Battery for Fujifilm NP-W235 4072 is equipped with a full decoding chip, which is perfectly compatible with the device and does not pop up when in use. The shell is made of high-quality ABS+PC fireproof material, and the surface is frosted, high temperature resistant, tactile and durable. The battery is the same size as the original camera battery closely fits the camera battery compartment, and is installed without jamming. It can be used with the SmallRig camera battery charger 4085, and the camera battery can support the charging of the original charger.

title: SmallRig Rosette Arm (7”) 4194
desc:
1. Stretchable pins and 1/4"-20 screws prevent twisting and ensure safety.

2. Newly-designed ball heads increase friction and bear a load of up to 3 kg.

3. New locking structure at the rosette joint for smoother angle adjustment.

4. Made of sturdy, durable aircraft-grade aluminum alloy and stainless steel.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Rosette Arm (7”) 4194

SmallRig Rosette Arm (7”) 4194 made of aircraft-grade aluminum and stainless steel, features 1/4"-20 screws and stretchable pins at both ends for securely attaching such accessories, particularly with anti-twist holes, as monitors, LED video lights, microphones, mobile phones, iPads, action cameras. The thumbscrew helps lock accessories and has holes for the hex spanner for further tightening; and the ball heads, which are 360-degree adjustable, come with a spiral pattern to increase friction and bear up to 3kg of load. At the stainless steel rosette joint, there is a spring for easier angle adjustment. An ergonomically designed anti-off thumb lever, with a built-in thrust ball bearing, feels smooth and comfortable and quickly locks arm and ball heads in a second. This rosette arm is CNC machined for more robustness and durability and is also equipped with pads on both accessory mounts to prevent scratches.

Note: load capacity: 3.5kg

Packing List

Rosette Arm x 1

Package Dimensions: 121.0 x 103.0 x 43.5mm

Product Weight: 214.0 ± 5.0g

title: SmallRig VB99 Pro mini V Mount Battery 4292
desc:
1. BMS intelligent chip supports 100W (Max.) fast charging, fully charged in 2.5 hours.

2. Imported top-class large-capacity LG battery cell endures repeated charging and discharging, safe and stable.

3. Highly integrated design, about 70% the size of a normal V-mount battery, lighter and more portable.

4. Interfaces: 2 USB-C, 1 D-Tap, 1 USB-A, 1 8V-OUT, 1 12V-OUT, each with a shunt design to allow simultaneous USB-C and USB-A fast charging.

5. Aluminum alloy and fireproof PC, sturdy and drop-proof.

6. Durable, scratch-resistant PC and acrylic cover on the front.

7. The TFT color screen displays the status clearly and accurately.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig VB99 Pro mini V Mount Battery 4292

SmallRig VB99 Pro mini V Mount Battery 4292 is about 70% the size of a normal V-mount battery, given its highly integrated design which takes up less space, making it lighter and more portable! The highly integrated (fast charging protocol chip + MCU + voltage boost control) BMS chip supports a wide range of mainstream fast charging protocols (PD / QC / PPS etc.), bi-directional 100W (Max.) USB-C PD fast charging, as well as adaptive voltage boost/ adaptive current regulation, etc.! In addition, its customized intelligent BMS system ensures faster and safer charging by providing multiple protections against over-current / short-circuit / over-temperature / over-voltage, etc. Such interfaces as D-tap / USB-C / USB-A / 8V-OUT / 12V-OUT / BP electrode are also included for efficient charging/powering of camera/camcorder/monitor / wireless video transmitter / LED video light / mobile phone/laptop etc., without using a V-mount plate to convert! The BMS chip has a 16-bit ADC / power meter algorithm, together with an MCU and a TFT digital display for you to keep track of the battery's status at all times. Built-in premium high-performance battery (no inflated capacity), which is rechargeable and stable, and meets MSDS / UN38.3 / IEC62133 / UL2054 / UL62368 and other internationally recognized standards. Its shell is made of sturdy, drop-proof aluminum alloy and fireproof PC and features a durable, scratch-resistant PC and acrylic cover on the front, with a TFT color screen displaying battery status clearly and accurately. Overall, this item is safe and powerful enough for you to capture every moment without burden! 

Certification: FCC CE RoHS ISED RCM PSE KC

title: SmallRig x Caleb Pike VB212 mini V Mount Battery 4293
desc:
1. Intelligent BMS chip supports 140W (Max.) fast charging, fully charged in 2.5 hours.

2. Imported top-class large-capacity LG battery cell endures repeated charging and discharging, safe and stable.

3. Highly integrated design, ultracompact and travel-friendly.

4. Multiple interfaces: two USB-C ports, two D-Tap ports, one USB-A port, DC 8V-OUT, DC12V-OUT. Each interface adopts a parallel circuit to allow simultaneous USB-C and USB-A fast charging.

5. Aluminum alloy, silicone, TPU, and PC V0 materials; four layers of aluminum frames on the inside with silicone coating on the outside, make the battery robust, drop-proof, heat-resistant, and flame-retardant.

6. Durable, scratch-resistant PC and acrylic front cover.

7. TFT display shows battery status clearly and accurately.

8. The accurately designed cover and well-positioned grooves allow for easy and convenient operation.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig x Caleb Pike VB212 mini V Mount Battery 4293

SmallRig x Caleb Pike VB212 mini V Mount Battery 4293 adopts a highly integrated design, reducing the battery size and making it lighter and more portable. The battery combines fast-charging protocol chips, MCU, voltage control, and BMS chips. It supports a wide range of fast charging protocols (PD 3.1 / QC 3.0 / AFC, etc.), Two-way PD fast charging and discharging 140W (Max), and adaptive voltage / current regulation, etc.  In addition, its customized intelligent BMS system ensures faster and safer charging by providing overcurrent / short circuit / overtemperature / overvoltage protection, etc. The battery body is equipped with D-Tap / USB-C / USB-A / DC 8V-OUT / DC12V-OUT /  BP interfaces, which can charge or power camera / video camera / monitor / wireless image transmitter / LED video light / mobile phone / laptop etc., without using any V-mount plates. The BMS chip has a built-in 16-bit Smart ADC, which, combined with the MCU and a TFT display, allows you to keep track of the battery status anytime, anywhere. Built-in premium battery cells (no inflated capacity) can be charged and discharged cyclically, ensuring excellent performance and stability. The design complies with internationally recognized standards such as MSDS / UN38.3 / IEC62133 / UL2054 / UL62368, making it safer to use. The aluminum alloy body with a silicone coating provides robustness and makes it drop-proof. TPU and PC V0 materials make the battery heat-resistant and fire-retardant. Scratch-resistant PC and acrylic cover add durability and protect the TFT display that shows battery status clearly and accurately. The accurately designed cover and well-positioned grooves allow for fast and easy interaction with the dust cover. Overall, this item is safe and powerful enough for you to capture every wonderful moment without any worries.

Certification: FCC, CE, RoHS, ISED, PSE, RCM

Button function:

1. Click to check the battery level, and click again to turn off the screen.

2. Double-click to switch the display port voltage and power.

3. Click four times to turn on/off low current mode.

4. Press and hold for 10 seconds to force restart.

*Low current mode: In normal mode, low-power devices may not be able to be charged normally. In this case, the low-current mode can be turned on.

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Quick Release Magic Arm with Ball Head 4488

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Quick Release Magic Arm with Ball Head 4488 is a compact and lightweight gadget with an exclusive patented quick-release slider slot. It also features roll pins positioning technology with a self-locking system that enables vertical locking and can bear loads up to 5.5kg / 12.2 lbs. With a ø20mm / 0.8in ball head and 1/4”-20 screws featuring detachable locating pins at both ends, this ball head, when used with SmallRig camera cages 4119B, 3084C, 4088B, and monitors with similar locating hole specifications, effectively prevents equipment deviation, ensuring the safety of the equipment. The thumb lever on the ball allows for extension adjustment, making it easy to adjust to the desired angle. With slots at both ends of the ball head  thumb lever, the adjustment range of the ball head is effectively increased, allowing for flexible positioning of the equipment as needed.

5. Bi-directional sliding with automatic self-locking upon reaching a position, making equipment assembly effortless and time-saving.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Quick Release Rosette Magic  Arm (7") 4490

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Quick Release Rosette Magic  Arm (7") 4490 is crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum alloy and stainless steel. It features an exclusive quick-release slider patented structure with inner roll pins that enable secure vertical locking. The dual-head quick-release 1/4"-20 screw design allows for external attachment of monitors, video lights, microphones, smartphones, iPads, action cameras, and more. When used with detachable pins, in conjunction with SmallRig's camera cages 4119B, 3084C, 4088B, and other monitors with matching locating holes, it effectively prevents device deviation, ensuring the safety of your equipment. The ball head offers 360-degree adjustment, ensuring smooth and flexible movements without stocking; spiral patterns on the ball head enhance friction, supporting up to 3.5kg / 7.7 lbs loads. A spring has been added to the stainless steel rosette joint for smoother angle adjustments. The anti-skid design of the thumb lever incorporates thrust bearings for a comfortable, ergonomic grip, allowing for easy locking of the magic arm and ball head with a single press. CNC machined for durability, the unit includes padding on both mounts to prevent scratching of equipment.

Note: 3.5kg / 7.7lbs Load-Bearing Capacity.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HPS36 Handheld Power Stick (10000mAh) 4552

SmallRig HPS36 Handheld Power Stick (10000mAh) 4552 combines cutting-edge technology with user-friendly features in a compact design, that fits in any backpack. Featuring PD3.0 36W high-power fast charging, this device achieves a full charge in approximately 2 hours and efficiently charges devices within a short timeframe. Equipped with premium battery cells, it delivers a stable and reliable power supply, ensuring both safety and product longevity.

With its dual USB-C ports, the power stick can power multiple devices simultaneously, enhancing its practicality. Crafted from durable metal materials, it guarantees sturdiness and stability, complemented by a meticulously finished surface for a comfortable grip.

Additionally, the power stick features a standard 1/4" threaded hole on top and a convenient knob that ensure broad compatibility and easy attachment to various devices, including small mirrorless cameras, action cameras, smartphones, and lighting equipment.

Featuring a battery display screen on the front, users can conveniently monitor the power status at any time, enhancing overall convenience and practicality. Moreover, an emergency light on the back provides illumination during power outages or in low-light environments, bolstering its practicality and emergency utility.

Ideal for outdoor activities even in unforeseen circumstances, SmallRig HPS36 Handheld Power Stick 4552 offers high performance, multifunctionality, and portability to meet diverse power needs for daily use and outdoor adventures. Trust in this reliable mobile power solution for all your power requirements.

Certifications: CCC / CE / FCC / RoHS / ISED /RCM

title: SmallRig USB-C Rechargeable Camera Battery for Sony NP-F970 (Green) 4577
desc:
1. 10500mAh high standard capacity for long-lasting battery life.

2. Featuring USB-C input/output and USB-A output interfaces, this battery serves as a portable power source.

3. The USB-C port supports PD 36W fast charging, enabling a quick full charge in just 3.5 hours.

4. Parallel circuits of USB-C and USB-A ports allow for simultaneous fast charging (total power not exceeding 54W).

5. Equipped with touch buttons and a battery level display screen, it is convenient to monitor the precise remaining battery level at any time.

6. Colorful exterior design, stylish and minimalist, full of technological and trendy vibes.

7. High-quality battery cells from reputable manufacturers, integrated with intelligent management chips and equipped with multiple protection features in the circuit system, ensure the safety, reliability, and longevity of the product.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig USB-C Rechargeable Camera Battery for Sony NP-F970 (Green) 4577

SmallRig USB-C Rechargeable Camera Battery for Sony NP-F970 (Green) 4577 is a high-capacity, high-performance, versatile, and intelligent direct-charging battery with a capacity of 10500mAh (76.65Wh). Its large capacity ensures long-lasting power, meeting the power demand during shooting. The main port at the bottom of the battery can power a variety of devices such as cameras, LED video lights, monitors, motorized sliders, and others. It also comes equipped with one USB-C port and one USB-A port, allowing for charging of electronic devices like smartphones, tablets, and other electronic devices. The USB-C port functions both as an input and output, with a maximum power of 36W. Charging the battery using the USB-C port takes only 3.5 hours, empowering efficient creation. The USB-A port provides an output function with a maximum power of 27W, adding more functionality to the battery through its diverse interfaces. The USB-C and USB-A ports have parallel circuits, allowing for simultaneous fast charging of two devices. This battery also comes with touch buttons and a battery level display screen, providing precise battery level information for easy monitoring of the battery status at any time. These batteries have an innovative blend of cutting-edge technology and stylish design elements, featuring a colorful exterior design that enhances their visual appeal. In addition, this battery features high-quality battery cells, and intelligent management chips, and is equipped with multiple protection features for your creative endeavors.

Certification: FCC CE  ISED (UL2054 RoHS test is available)

Available regions: China, the United States, the United Kingdom, Europe, Canada

title: SmallRig VB50 mini V Mount Battery (Orange) 4871
desc:
1. BMS intelligent chip enables 45W (Max) fast charging, allowing for a full charge in just 1.5 hours.

2. Top-class LG battery cells ensure safe and stable performance through repeated charging and discharging.

3. Featuring a highly integrated design for enhanced portability and reduced weight.

4. Equipped with multiple interfaces including BP x 1, USB-C x 1, D-Tap x 1, USB-A x 1, 8V-OUT x 1, and 12V-OUT x 1, each featuring an independent circuit design to support simultaneous fast charging for USB-C and USB-A devices.

5. Made of fire-proof PC material, strong and drop-proof, heat-resistant and flame-retardant.

6. The front of the battery is covered by a 2/3 lens, and the high-brightness OLED screen accurately displays power information and battery status. The design is smart and fashionable, and the appearance is simple and advanced.

7. Smart switch button can be used to start or shut down the battery, control it at any time, and quick response.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig VB50 mini V Mount Battery (Orange) 4871

SmallRig VB50 mini V Mount Battery (Orange) 4871 is a compact V-mount battery featuring a highly integrated design that effectively reduces the battery's overall size, making it lightweight and portable. It features LG A-grade 18650 high-rate cells, ensuring accurate capacity, cycle performance, and exceptional stability. Designed to meet international standards such as MSDS / UN38.3 / IEC 62133 / UL2054 / UL 62368, it has obtained certifications including CCC / FCC / CE / RoHS / ISED / RCM / PSE / KC / BIS / TISI, ensuring safe and reliable operation for users. The battery is equipped with a BP, a D-Tap, an 8V-OUT DC, a 12V-OUT DC, a USB-C, and a USB-A ports offering a wide range of interfaces for powering multiple devices simultaneously. This includes cameras, mirrorless cameras, monitors, transmitters, video lights, smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, providing integrated and efficient power supply for all your needs. The battery features a highly integrated fast-charging protocol chip, MCU, boost/buck control chip, and Battery Management System (BMS), offering multiple protections including overcurrent, short circuit, over-temperature, and over-voltage. Additionally, it supports various fast-charging protocols such as PD, QC, and PPS, and enables 45W USB-C bi-directional PD fast charging. The battery exterior is made of fire-resistant PC material, heat-resistant, and flame-retardant, ensuring durability. It features an OLED screen that clearly displays battery level, remaining usage time, voltage, power, and other information, allowing you to accurately monitor the battery status. Featuring a suite of robust safety features, this device instills the confidence to capture every memorable moment with precision and reliability.

Certification: CCC / FCC / CE / RoHS / ISED / RCM / PSE / KC / BIS / TISI

Button Function:

Single-Click:

Turn off the screen at normal brightness

Restore maximum brightness after dimming

Illuminate the screen after shutdown or screen blackout

Double-Click:

Switch between displaying voltage and power in charging and discharging mode

3-Second Press:

Press and hold for 3 seconds to forcibly power off the USB-C, USB-A, and DC ports for discharging. Restore port operation by single-clicking or reinserting the plug

Work With

MILC, camcorder, camera, monitor, follow focus, image transmitter, LED video light, cell phone, tablet, laptop, etc.

6. The front of the battery is covered by a 2/3 lens, and the high-brightness OLED screen accurately displays power information and battery status. The design is smart and fashionable, and the appearance is simple and advanced.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig VB50 mini V Mount Battery (Green) 4872

SmallRig VB50 mini V Mount Battery (Green) 4872 is a compact V-mount battery featuring a highly integrated design that effectively reduces the battery's overall size, making it lightweight and portable. It features LG A-grade 18650 high-rate cells, ensuring accurate capacity, cycle performance, and exceptional stability. Designed to meet international standards such as MSDS / UN38.3 / IEC 62133 / UL2054 / UL 62368, it has obtained certifications including CCC / FCC / CE / RoHS / ISED / RCM / PSE / KC / BIS / TISI, ensuring safe and reliable operation for users. The battery is equipped with a BP, a D-Tap, an 8V-OUT DC, a 12V-OUT DC, a USB-C, and a USB-A ports offering a wide range of interfaces for powering multiple devices simultaneously. This includes cameras, mirrorless cameras, monitors, transmitters, video lights, smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, providing integrated and efficient power supply for all your needs. The battery features a highly integrated fast-charging protocol chip, MCU, boost/buck control chip, and Battery Management System (BMS), offering multiple protections including overcurrent, short circuit, over-temperature, and over-voltage. Additionally, it supports various fast-charging protocols such as PD, QC, and PPS, and enables 45W USB-C bi-directional PD fast charging. The battery exterior is made of fire-resistant PC material, heat-resistant, and flame-retardant, ensuring durability. It features an OLED screen that clearly displays battery level, remaining usage time, voltage, power, and other information, allowing you to accurately monitor the battery status. Featuring a suite of robust safety features, this device instills the confidence to capture every memorable moment with precision and reliability.

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Vibe P30 67mm Ring LED Video Light 4873

SmallRig Vibe P30 67mm Ring LED Video Light 4873 is a lightweight ring fill light designed for versatile applications. It can be easily attached to a phone case or cage using the 67mm threaded adapter or quickly mounted onto a phone with a phone mount. Furthermore, it can be installed directly on a 67mm camera lens, making it suitable for a variety of shooting scenarios. Compact and lightweight, it's akin to a women's powder compact, making it effortlessly portable.

The video light features intuitive lighting controls, offering three adjustable brightness levels (33% / 66% / 100%) and three color temperature settings (warm yellow/warm white / cool white). The high-quality bi-color temperature light source ensures a high color rendering index and accurate color reproduction. The soft ring light enhances eye highlights, adding depth and life to a subject's eyes, making them more engaging and expressive. It also provides a wide illumination range with even lighting, eliminating shadows on the face, and enhancing the skin and eyes for a beautifying effect.

Equipped with a 440mAh polymer lithium battery, this product supports USB-C charging and offers over 30 minutes of continuous use at full power. It serves as a one-stop solution that caters to hobbyist photographers, bloggers, and live streamers by efficiently addressing concerns related to lighting effects, portability, and battery life.

Application Scenarios: Lightweight lighting solution for enhancing content creation, including graphic and macro photography, tabletop figurine photography, half-body selfies, short videos, vlogs, and live streaming.

Note: Avoid extended use and charging simultaneously, as this may cause overheating and potential accidents.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Rosette Magic Arm (7") with 3/8”-16 ARRI Locating Screw 4899

SmallRig Rosette Magic Arm (7") with 3/8”-16 ARRI Locating Screw 4899 made of aircraft-grade aluminum and stainless steel,  features 1/4"-20 screws and stretchable pins at one end, ARRI Locating screw at another end for securely attaching such accessories, particularly with anti-twist holes, as monitors, LED video lights, microphones, mobile phones, iPads, action cameras. The thumbscrew helps lock accessories and has holes for the hex spanner for further tightening; and the ball heads, which are 360-degree adjustable, come with a spiral pattern to increase friction and bear up to 3.5kg / 7.7lbs of load. At the stainless steel rosette joint, there is a spring for easier angle adjustment. An ergonomically designed anti-off thumb lever, with a built-in thrust ball bearing, feels smooth and comfortable and quickly locks arm and ball heads in a second. This rosette arm is CNC machined for more robustness and durability and is also equipped with pads on both accessory mounts to prevent scratches.

title: SmallRig VB99 Pro mini V Mount Battery (Green) 4974
desc:
1. BMS intelligent chip supports 100W (Max.) fast charging, fully charged in 2.5 hours.

2. Imported top-class large-capacity LG battery cell endures repeated charging and discharging, safe and stable.

3. Highly integrated design, about 70% the size of a normal V-mount battery, lighter and more portable.

4. Interfaces: 2 USB-C, 1 D-Tap, 1 USB-A, 1 8V-OUT, 1 12V-OUT, each with a shunt design to allow simultaneous USB-C and USB-A fast charging.

5. Aluminum alloy and fireproof PC, sturdy and drop-proof.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig VB99 Pro mini V Mount Battery (Green) 4974

SmallRig VB99 Pro mini V Mount Battery (Green) 4974 is about 70% the size of a normal V-mount battery, given its highly integrated design which takes up less space, making it lighter and more portable! The highly integrated (fast charging protocol chip + MCU + voltage boost control) BMS chip supports a wide range of mainstream fast charging protocols (PD / QC / PPS etc.), bi-directional 100W (Max.) USB-C PD fast charging, adaptive voltage boost/ adaptive current regulation, etc.! In addition, its customized intelligent BMS system ensures faster and safer charging by providing multiple protections against over-current / short-circuit / over-temperature / over-voltage etc. Such interfaces as D-tap / USB-C / USB-A / 8V-OUT / 12V-OUT / BP electrode are also included for efficient charging/powering of camera/camcorder/monitor / wireless video transmitter / LED video light / mobile phone/laptop etc., without using a V-mount plate to convert! The BMS chip has a 16bit ADC / power meter algorithm, together with an MCU and a TFT digital display for you to keep track of the battery's status at all times. Built-in premium high-performance battery (no inflated capacity), which is rechargeable and stable, and meets MSDS / UN38.3 / IEC62133 / UL2054 / UL62368 and other internationally recognized standards. Its shell is made of sturdy, drop-proof aluminum alloy and fireproof PC and features a durable, scratch-resistant PC and acrylic cover on the front, with a TFT color screen displaying battery status clearly and accurately. Overall, this item is safe and powerful enough for you to capture every moment without burden!

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig X-Touch Smart Triple-Proof (1.5m / 4.9ft Drop-Resistant, IP54 Waterproof / Dustproof) V-Mount Battery X99 4984

SmallRig X-Touch Smart Triple-Proof (1.5m / 4.9ft Drop-Resistant, IP54 Waterproof / Dustproof) V-Mount Battery X99 4984 sets a new standard for professional power solutions by integrating smart technology, rugged protection, high-power fast charging and multi-port versatility, making it ideal for demanding shooting environments.

The battery's smart management system is centered around a 2.0-inch HD color touchscreen with a frosted anti-glare surface, ensuring optimal visibility in all lighting conditions. A dedicated mobile app offers comprehensive remote control features, including battery level monitoring, port management, battery location tracking, and OTA updates, significantly enhancing on-set workflow efficiency.

Designed to endure the rigors of professional use, the X99 incorporates triple-proof protection: a 1.5m (4.9ft) drop-resistant housing with eight silicone-protected corners and four reinforced edges, full metal side panels, and fully reinforced internal circuitry. With an IP54 rating, it ensures reliable operation when exposed to water splashes, rain, or dust, making it perfect for outdoor productions.

The battery features eight strategically placed ports: one BP port, two D-Tap ports, two USB-C ports (100W PD fast charging), one USB-A port, and two DC ports. Each port operates on an independent circuit, allowing multiple devices to charge simultaneously. The integrated BMS control chip guarantees rapid charging (fully charged in only two hours) and stable, safe power output.

At its core, the X99 utilizes premium LG battery cells, renowned for their exceptional cycle life and accurate battery readings. Innovative designs include dual mounting options (1/4" & 3/8" threaded holes) and a backlight indicator for effortless installation even in dim light. These professional-grade features combine to make the X99 an indispensable power solution for serious content creators.

Certifications: FCC, CE, RoHS, ISED, PSE, RCM

Work With

Mirrorless cameras, camcorders, cameras, monitors, follow focuses, image transmitters, LED video lights, cell phones, tablets, laptops, etc.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" ND0.6（2 Stops）Filter 3588

SmallRig 4 x 5.65" ND0.6（2 Stops）Filter 3588 is one of the CINE ND filters designed for professional photographers. It features 25% light transmittance, with two stops of light extinction, and optical glass, precisely ground and polished for use with a 4 x 5.65" filter tray or matte box. Made of high-clarity, high-transmission B270 optical glass from Germany, this filter is coated on both sides with multi-layer nano-coating to ensure high-accuracy color reproduction. These coatings are mildew-proof, waterproof, oil-resistant, and anti-scratch, making the item easy to clean and store, and ideal for use in video or film shooting. The filter allows for a wider aperture for added blur of the background and control of image sharpness, thereby improving latitude and image quality.

Note:

1. Compatible with 4 x 5.65" filter tray or matte box.

2. Incompatible with 100 x 150mm filter tray.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" ND0.9（3 Stops）Filter 4225

SmallRig 4 x 5.65" ND0.9（3 Stops）Filter 4225 is one of the CINE ND filters designed for professional photographers. It features 12.5% light transmittance, with three stops of light extinction, and optical glass, precisely ground and polished for use with a 4 x 5.65" filter tray or matte box. Made of high-clarity, high-transmission B270 optical glass from Germany, this filter is coated on both sides with multi-layer nano-coating to ensure high-accuracy color reproduction. These coatings are mildew-proof, waterproof, oil-resistant, and anti-scratch, making the item easy to clean and store, and ideal for use in video or film shooting. The filter allows for a wider aperture for added blur of the background and control of image sharpness, thereby improving latitude and image quality.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Attachable CPL Filter (67mm) 4582

SmallRig Attachable CPL Filter (67mm) 4582. By adjusting the polarizing filter to the appropriate angle, one can reduce surface reflections on water, glass, and still objects. The multi-coated optical glass offers reliable optical quality. The magnetic attachment system provides users with a fast and efficient experience for installing and replacing filters. It is compatible with SmallRig's mobile video cages that support the installation of a 67mm filter adapter ring, including models such as the iPhone 15 series, Samsung S24 Ultra, Vivo X100, and Vivo X100 Ultra. Equipped with the threaded adapter ring, the filter can be mounted on a 67mm camera lens, providing a convenient magnetic filter installation experience for camera lenses.

Note: While the filter design significantly reduces the occurrence of vignetting in photos, it does not guarantee the complete elimination of vignetting under all shooting conditions and camera settings.

title: SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" Black Diffusion 1/4 Filter 4740
desc:
1. Dual-sided 22-layer coating for a delicate and soft film-like texture, ensuring consistent color reproduction throughout the range.

2. Unique multiple color correction layers, nano anti-glare coating, and a distinctive structure of intermediate layers with fine particles.

3. Produces a cinematic-quality halo effect, imparting a frosted texture reminiscent of traditional film aesthetics.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" Black Diffusion 1/4 Filter 4740

SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" Black Diffusion 1/4 Filter 4740 is meticulously crafted to fulfill the exacting demands of premium film and video production. Tailored for users aiming to achieve a subtle and velvety film-like texture, enhance skin tones, and attain a captivating halo effect. This filter series includes the 1/8 Stop (ID: 4741) and the 1/4 Stop (ID: 4740), catering to common demands for subtle softness and refinement.

Crafted with imported glass materials and a unique interlayer structure with fine particles, the Black Diffusion Filter employs a proprietary multi-layer color correction film to control color biases. Featuring nano anti-glare and anti-smudge coatings, along with a dual-sided 22-layer coating process, this filter effectively suppresses glare caused by direct and oblique light sources on its surface, enhancing shadow details. It ensures color consistency across different grades and boasts precision-polished edges for optimal performance.

Noteworthy for its resistance to mold, water, oil smudges, and scratches from sharp objects, the Black Diffusion Filter is easy to clean and convenient to store. Its standardized 4 x 5.65" dimensions enable compatibility with commonly available 4 x 5.65" matte boxes in the market.

Note:

1. Exercise caution when utilizing telephoto lenses with a focal length exceeding 135mm / 5.3in.

2. The Black Diffusion series soft-focus filters are specifically engineered to control highlights and enrich shadow intricacies, Commonly used in large aperture daytime/nighttime candlelight, lighting, and other environments.

3. Opt for a suitable setting on the Black Diffusion filter to align with the desired soft-focus effect and ensure optimal performance.

title: SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" White Diffusion 1/4 Filter 4742
desc:
1. Dual-sided 22-layer coating for a delicate and soft film-like texture, ensuring consistent color reproduction throughout the range.

2. Unique multi-layer color correction and nano anti-glare coatings preserve depth in dark/black tones.

3. Delivers a soft effect closely mimicking natural light for authentic object color rendition.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" White Diffusion 1/4 Filter 4742

SmallRig CINE 4 x 5.65" White Diffusion 1/4 Filter 4742 is meticulously crafted to meet the high standards of cinematic and video production, catering to users seeking a dreamy, soft film-like texture and enhanced skin tones. Available in 1/8 Stop (ID: 4743) and 1/4 Stop (ID: 4742) variations, this filter meets the standard specifications for achieving desired special effects in cinematic and video production.

Crafted with imported glass material, it features unique multi-layer color correction films to control color bias, nano anti-glare and anti-dirt coatings, and a dual-sided 22-layer coating. This ensures the softening of highlights during video shoots, creating a diffused effect on white highlights for a gentle visual appeal, while maintaining brightness in dark tones. The consistent color reproduction across different grades ensures a cohesive imaging effect closer to natural light color rendition. Carefully adjusted soft light layers provide smooth and rounded transitions at object edges, replicating a cinematic feel.

The meticulously polished edges of the White Diffusion Filter offer advantages such as mold, water, oil, and scratch resistance, facilitating easy cleaning and convenient storage. Designed in a standard 4 x 5.65" size, this filter is compatible with commonly available 4 x 5.65" matte boxes in the market.

Note:

1. Exercise caution when using telephoto lenses of 135mm or longer.

2. SmallRig CINE White Diffusion Filter Series is designed to control highlight overflow, to achieve a soft visual effect by spreading highlights, creating a soft overall image.

3. Select the appropriate setting for the White Diffusion Filter based on the desired effect.

title: SmallRig FilMov Phone Shoulder Strap (Black) 4989
desc:
1. Adjustable Length: Adjust the nylon strap for neck or crossbody wear to accommodate different styles.

2. Effortless Portability: Additional multi-purpose hanging point for keys, earphones, sunglasses, etc.

3. Tool-Free Installation: It features a quick release hook for convenience.

4. Wide Compatibility: Fits full-body phone cases or those with lanyard holes and allows unobstructed charging access.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig FilMov Phone Shoulder Strap (Black) 4989

SmallRig FilMov Phone Shoulder Strap is a functional, stylish, and eco-friendly phone lanyard with adjustable length to match different styles. Crafted from genuine leather and nylon rope, it is durable yet lightweight. The minimalist Peruvian knot design allows for length adjustment, suitable for wearing around the neck or across the body. It features a multi-purpose hanging point and a bottom metal hook for attaching accessories like AirPods cases, keys, or charms.

The package includes two lanyards and one tether pad for easy attachment to phone cases, compatible with all full-body cases or those with lanyard holes. Two hanging options are available: 1) Attach the hook or lanyard to the tether pad after inserting the pad into the charging port slot and securing the phone to the case. The ultra-thin pad will not obstruct plug-in charging. 2) Attach the lanyard directly to the case using the lanyard hole. Additionally, two lanyards can be used to hang phone cages, offering more versatility.

Note:

1. Avoid exposure to harsh chemicals to prevent damage.

2. Avoid use during high-intensity sports to prevent accidental drops.

3. Do not untie the Peruvian knot.

Work With

All full-body phone cases or phone cases with lanyard holes

title: SmallRig Magnetic UV Filter for FUJIFILM X half (Black) 5214
desc:
1. Magnetic UV Filter: Enables quick attachment and detachment without vignetting.

2. Optical Glass Lens: Offers 99% light transmittance and low surface reflectivity for true-to-life colors, reducing ghosting and glare.

3. B270 Optical Glass: Dual-sided multi-coating resists water splashes, oil stains, and scratches, making it easy to clean.

4. Lightweight Aluminum Alloy Frame: Provides unobtrusive protection for camera lenses.

5. Black Frame Interior: Utilizes matte oxidation treatment to prevent glare from reflections.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Magnetic UV Filter for FUJIFILM X half (Black) 5214

SmallRig Magnetic UV Filter for FUJIFILM X half (Black) 5214 is designed to protect camera lenses while maintaining optical performance. The filter securely attaches to camera lenses through four built-in magnets, providing reliable protection against bumps and scratches without the risk of accidental detachment.

Precision-engineered with CNC machining, this filter ensures zero vignetting. The optical glass lens features a multi-layer coating that achieves 99% light transmittance for accurate color reproduction, while its low surface reflectivity significantly reduces glare and ghosting.

Constructed from B270 optical glass with dual-sided multi-coating, the filter resists water splashes, oil stains, and scratches, making it easy to clean. The ultra-thin 5mm (0.2in) aluminum frame provides lightweight protection that is virtually unnoticeable during use.

For the Black frame version, the interior is finished with matte oxidation treatment to prevent glare from reflections.

Note: 

1. Clean the lens only with the included cleaning cloth.

2. Please remove the filters when not in use and store it in the provided case.

Work With

FUJIFILM X half

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Magnetic VND Filter ND2 - ND32 for FUJIFILM X half (Black) 5225

SmallRig Magnetic VND Filter ND2 - ND32 for FUJIFILM X half (Black) 5225 is designed to protect camera lenses while maintaining optical performance. The filter securely attaches to camera lenses through four built-in magnets, providing reliable protection against bumps and scratches without the risk of accidental detachment.

Precision-engineered with CNC machining, this filter ensures zero vignetting. The stepless adjustment mechanism allows smooth transitions between ND2 to ND32 (1-5 stops), making it ideal for challenging lighting conditions such as high ISO, wide aperture, or slow shutter speed shooting.

The filter features physical stops and clear markings that prevent cross pattern while enabling precise light control. Constructed from B270 optical glass with dual-sided multi-coating, the filter resists water splashes, oil stains, and scratches, making it easy to clean.

For the silver frame version, the interior is finished with matte oxidation treatment to prevent glare from reflections.

Note:

1. For optimal performance, align the "2" stop marker at the top when mounting the filter.

2. Please remove the filters when not in use and store them in the provided case.

title: SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Canon LP-E6P 5409
desc:
1. Full Decoding Chip: Ensures full compatibility with Canon LP-E6P cameras (including the EOS R5 II) without triggering error prompts, while supporting in-camera battery level displays and charging via original Canon chargers.

2. Extended Battery Life: Each battery offers a true-rated output of 2520mAh, providing longer shooting time for demanding workflows.

3. Dual-Slot Fast Charging: Two independent slots allow simultaneous or individual charging, optimizing efficiency for multi-battery setups.

4. Intelligent LCD Display: Provides real-time monitoring of charging current, charging voltage, charge progression and accumulated power input.

5. Multiple Charging Options: Equipped with both USB-A and USB-A input ports, the charger supports wall adapters, car chargers, and power banks for universal compatibility.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Canon LP-E6P 5409

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Canon LP-E6P 5409 features a full decoding chip, ensuring full compatibility with Canon LP-E6P cameras, including the EOS R5 II. This eliminates pop-up error messages while mirroring OEM battery performance, including accurate in-camera battery level displays and compatibility with original Canon chargers.

Each battery delivers a true-rated output of 2520mAh, providing extended shooting time for demanding workflows. The charger is equipped with two independent slots, allowing for the simultaneous charging of two batteries or a single battery, optimizing efficiency for multi-battery setups. An intelligent LCD display provides real-time monitoring of charging current, charging voltage, charge progression and accumulated power input. Additionally, the charger incorporates both USB-A and USB-A input ports, making it compatible with wall adapters, car chargers, and power banks for versatile charging options.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Hand Strap PAC2456B

SmallRig Hand Strap PAC2456 can effectively protect the safety of your camera and enhance the shooting stability to a certain extent when using a camera cage or an external side handgrip for handheld shooting. The width of its nylon webbing is 12mm and will be compatible with camera cage and external side handgrip with strap slot on both upper and lower sides and its width not exceeding 12mm, such as SmallRig Cage for Blackmagic Design Pocket Cinema Camera 4K & 6K 2203B, SmallRig Aluminum Universal Side Handle HSS2425, and so on. The surface of the hand strap is made of PU material, which makes the strap wear-resisting and durable. It is filled with high-quality EVA material, covered with microfiber fabric, will bring better shock-proof experience and excellent effect of moisture absorption and perspiration, to keep hands dry and comfortable. It supports quick adjustment, which can be quickly tightened without loose with a gentle pull.

Note:
1.Safety load: 12.5kg
2.Do not expose to the sun.
3.Wash by hand and dry in a cool and ventilated place.

title: SmallRig SR-RG2 Wireless Remote Controller 5207
desc:
1. Modular wireless control for Sony, Canon, and Nikon cameras, enabling remote control and creative freedom.

2. Supports firmware updates via SmallRig Up app for seamless compatibility and future enhancements.

3. USB-C charging port with long-lasting battery life - up to 40 hours of continuous use on a full charge.

4. Includes a soft, skin-friendly, and wear-resistant silicone case to protect the remote and extend its lifespan.

5. Includes a wrist strap to keep your hands free and prevent loss.

6. Comes with a Velcro strap for mounting on gimbal handles, enabling simultaneous remote control and smooth camera operation.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig SR-RG2 Wireless Remote Controller 5207

SmallRig SR-RG2 Wireless Remote Controller 5207 is designed for remote camera control. This modular magnetic wireless remote can remotely control photography, recording, focus, zoom, and custom functions on compatible Nikon, Canon, and Sony cameras, with a remote control distance of up to 10 meters / 32.8ft.

The remote features a USB-C charging port, offering long-lasting battery life: it takes 2.5 hours to fully charge and delivers up to 40 hours of continuous operation. Firmware updates via the SmallRig Up app ensure ongoing compatibility with supported cameras.

The package includes a soft, skin-friendly silicone case that’s wear-resistant, protecting the remote and extending its lifespan; a wrist strap for secure handling and convenience; and a Velcro strap compatible with hydraulic gimbal handles (19-39mm / 0.7-1.5in in diameter), enabling simultaneous gimbal operation and camera control. 

Note: When charging the remote controller, ensure the input voltage does not exceed 8V.

title: SmallRig mini Follow Focus F40 3010C
desc:
1. Newly designed silicone gear drives the lens by friction without using follow focus ring.

2. Precise focus control and comfortable feel of damping.

3. Compact and portable, comes with a storage bag.

4. Different mounting positions; compatible with lenses of varying diameters.

5. Freely adjustable AB stops.

6. All-metal locking structure, safe and stable.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig mini Follow Focus F40 3010C

SmallRig mini Follow Focus F40 3010C, with its exquisite and compact design, aims at providing precise and quick focus control for video shooting. It is made of new materials for optimized zoom control and features an anti-sweat, anti-slip focus knob (inspired by a sports car hub) to feel comfortable. In the box, there is Rod Clamp (with NATO rail) 3011, which can be easily locked to the side or the top of most cages via a 1/4”-20 screw to allow reversing the focus action; a lightweight Silicone Gear (3852), which, when working with the M0.8-43T gear, drives lens through friction, without applying a follow focus ring, shortening your rig list and simplifying installation; and an all-metal 15mm rod clamp with jib, which has improved rotation angle to support different lenses. Adjusting A/B stops helps quickly set the focal length you desire. Besides, a storage case is included for more convenience and portability.

Note:

1. The silicone gear is M0.8-43T compatible only.

2. To avoid gear slippage, please ensure the silicone gear fits tightly with the lens ring, particularly for large-damping zoom lenses.

3. The silicone gear only supports SLR / mirrorless lenses. Just remove it before using a cinema lens.

4. The snap-on follow focus gear ring supports the lens with a maximum diameter of 114 mm.

Work With

1: Standard Φ15mm rod

2: Standard NATO rail

3: Standard 0.8 MOD lens and focus gear ring

4: Standard jib and whip pan

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig "Rhinoceros" Basic Cage Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III 3708

SmallRig "Rhinoceros" Basic Cage Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III 3708  is designed to facilitate low-angle shooting, protect the camera, and provide accessory mounting points. The kit includes a cage, a top handle, and an HDMI cable clamp. Both the cage and the top handle are portable for being made of lighter carbon fiber, hence longer handheld shooting. For the cage, a locating pin, a 1/4"-20 screw, and an M2.5 screw together lock the camera firmly. It features a clean streamlined design that gives full access to the top buttons. The handle feels comfortable to carry and take a low-angle shot; and the HDMI cable clamp, tightened via a flat-head screw, protects  the interfaces to ensure stable signal transmission. Also, the kit comes with 1/4"-20 threaded holes for Monitor Mount 2294, cold shoes for the microphone, LED video light, and ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes for Monitor Mount 2903B. A NATO rail and an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate add versatility to the cage. Particularly, the Arca-Swiss plate enables a quick switch between handheld, tripod, and gimbal (DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro) modes.

Note:

1. Please remove the left split D-ring before installing the side lock adapter.

2. HDMI Cable Clamp interferes with the interface of the synchronous terminal when used on the Sony Alpha 7R V camera.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig RM120 RGB Video Light 3808

Powerful and portable, SmallRig RM120 RGB Video Light has a minimalist design and long battery life that lasts 180 minutes at maximum brightness, making it a hassle-free way of long-time shooting in various scenes. It features 0% ~ 100% brightness, 98+ CRI, 98+ TLCI, 2500K ~ 8500K color temperature, 360° Hue adjustment, 100-level saturation adjustment, and 12 lighting effects. You can simply and accurately adjust parameters shown on the integrated OLED display screen via thumbwheels, knobs, and buttons. This Video light comes with a built-in 5000mAh lithium battery, charged by the included USB-C charging cable, one anti-twist 1/4 "-20 threaded hole on one side and at the bottom to attach the camera and cage, as well as a diffuser for scattering the soft light output.

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Fujifilm NP-W235 3822

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Fujifilm NP-W235 3822 includes two batteries and one charger. The battery, equipped with a full decoding chip, supports varied cameras perfectly without causing pop-up windows and has quality fireproof ABS and PC shell frosted to ensure fine touch and durability. It is the same size as the original battery, thus fitting seamlessly into the battery compartment. The dual battery charger can charge two batteries at the same time, with its LCD screen displaying real-time charging voltage, current, and charging capacity. It comes with a built-in USB-A charging cable and USB-C input interface, allowing it to be charged via a USB adapter, car charger, and power bank.

Note:

1. For the best charging experience, power adapter with higher than 5V⎓2.1A output is recommended. Do not use the two input interfaces at the same time.

2. Manually measured weight and size may not be accurate.

3. The kit does not include a USB power adapter.

4. The charger comes with a meter to help display how much you charged (mAh). If the battery is temporarily disconnected, the meter will recalculate its charged capacity(mAh).

Work With

Fujifilm GFX 50S II, GFX 100S, X-T4

title: SmallRig 95mm CPL-VND Filter Kit with Rod Clamp 3864
desc:
1. Multifunctional, quick-release, two-in-one CPL-VND filter.

2. 1-8 stops stepless and adjustable dimming.

3. High-quality optical glass with a multi-layer coating on two sides for low color cast, water, and oil resistance.

4. Perfectly matches universal wireless follow focus, and offers wireless-control experience.

5. Highly compatible with lenses of various diameters.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 95mm CPL-VND Filter Kit with Rod Clamp 3864

SmallRig 95mm CPL-VND Filter Kit with Rod Clamp 3864 is a specialized two-in-one CPL-VND filter system. The two CPLs can be either used separately or magnetically combined to become a VND filter of 1-8 stop stepless and adjustable dimming. The whole filter system can attach SmallRig 95mm Matte Box 3645 and VND Filter Kit 3651 via magnet at the same time to realize the function of VND adjustment when paired with a matte box. Its filters, made of high-quality optical glass, are waterproof, oil-resistant, and feature multi-layer coating on both sides for high definition and low color cast, thus reducing glare and vignetting. The filter frame adopts a standard M0.8 gear design, which allows for manual stop adjustment, or works with wireless follow focus via the included 15mm rod clamp and carbon fiber rod. The filter diameter is 95mm and supports 95mm/82mm/77mm/72mm/67mm lenses through pairing the standard adapter rings.

Note:

1. Lens with a focal length of 16mm or above is recommended.

2. Not compatible with third-party VND filters.

3. Please remove other filters before using this filter system.

4. A cross pattern shadow may appear at the 8 stop due to the parallel rotation of two polarizers.

Work With

1. VND Filter Kit 3651

2. SmallRig 95mm Matte Box 3645

3. 15mm LWS Support 3652

4. Adapter Rings Kit (Φ52/55/58/62/86-95mm) 3383

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Handheld Kit for Canon EOS C70 3899

SmallRig Handheld Kit for Canon EOS C70 3899 is designed to protect the camera and provide accessory mounting points, hence a comfortable handheld shooting experience. It includes: a top plate, a side plate, a base plate, a detachable extended baseplate, a NATO top handle, a cable clamp, etc., among which, the comfortable NATO top handle facilitates camera movement and stabilizes shooting; the top plate, baseplate, and side plate can be assembled into a half cage that supports the original handle unit and microphone holder unit. The half cage’s base consists of a baseplate and a detachable extended baseplate. It can be directly mounted onto DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro stabilizers and Acra-Swiss tripod by merely removing the extended baseplate, allowing a quick switch between handheld, stabilizer, and tripod shooting. The kit also comes with an HDMI cable clamp to prevent accidental signal disconnection and ensure stable data transmission and gives full access to the original camera grip and buttons. Its 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, cold shoe mounts, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes, NATO rails, etc. support Side Handle 3260/2093/2427, Top Handle 2165/1638, Magic Arm 2115/2071, Monitor Mount 3601/2903/2905, Baseplate with Dual 15mm Rod Clamp 1674, Single Rod Clamp 3276, etc. In addition, an Allen wrench is included for easy disassembly and assembly.  

Note:

1. Installation order: baseplate, side plate, camera, top plate.

2. Please remove the detachable extended baseplate before attaching DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Vibe P108 RGB Video Light 4055AC

SmallRig Vibe P108 is one portable, fashionable mini full-color light following the Vibe P96 dual-color temperature video light. The ID and unique compass knob design still continue on this version, and also in terms of the light source and battery life. The actual usage scenarios have been upgraded. In terms of optical parameters, this lamp consists of 108 high-quality lamp beads, including 28 RGB lamp beads, 40+40 cold and warm lamp beads, CRI ≥ 95, and a color temperature range of 2700K-6500K. The fill light has a built-in 2500mAh lithium battery, which is charged through the included USB Type-C charging cable and supports a dual-C port charging solution. When the battery is fully charged, the maximum power can last for 130 minutes of usage. This light can be directly connected to the camera or mobile phone expansion frame through the built-in standard cold shoe interface. In addition, you can also use the cold shoe seat on the side of the fuselage for splicing or expansion. It is a pocket portable full-color fill light with strong playability and performance.

Note: Depending on the working environment and user's habits, the operating life varies.

SmallRig All-in-One Video Kit Basic (2022) 4121

SmallRig All-in-One Video Kit Basic (2022) 4121 proves a lightweight solution to phone vlogging and live-to-stream. The kit includes, among others, a universal phone cage, two side handles, and cable ties. SmallRig Vlogging Tripod Kit for Canon EOS R50 4213

SmallRig Vlogging Tripod Kit for Canon EOS R50 4213, is designed to provide a lightweight yet portable Vlog shooting solution for content creators. It is perfect to achieve high-quality recording, super stable handheld shooting, and easy color adjustment for post-production, includes a furry windscreen, a flexible tripod, and a LED video light. Among them, the furry windscreen features dedicated polyester wool and thickened lining design to reduce wind noise when shooting outdoors. It is securely mounted onto a hot shoe via a cold shoe adapter, which has protective silicone pads at the bottom and a cold shoe mount for LED video light, microphone, etc. Locking the camera through a built-in 1/4"-20 screw, the tripod comes with flexible legs and a ball head, suitable for a variety of scenes and multi-angle shooting. And the portable LED video light can be fitted into the top of the furry windscreen via a cold shoe. title: SmallRig MagEase Magnetic VND Filter ND2-ND32 (1-5 Stop) 52mm 4215
desc:
1. Magnetically and quickly secured.

2. HD glasses from Germany.

3. Waterproof, stain-resistant, mildewproof, and scratch-resistant AR coatings.

4. Large-diameter and ultra-thin filter; no vignetting.

5. No cross pattern in the picture.

6. Magnetically secures SmallRig 52mm magnetic filter adapter ring, safe and stable.

7. Hard stops at ND2 & ND32 for precise control of shooting.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig MagEase Magnetic VND Filter ND2-ND32 (1-5 Stop) 52mm 4215

SmallRig MagEase Magnetic VND Filter ND2-ND32 (1-5 Stop) 52mm 4215 contains two CPLs, stacked and rotated to reduce the amount of light, thereby balancing the exposure time. Its inner polarizer magnetically mounts to the SmallRig filter adapter ring via a bottom locating ring, whereas the outer polarizer can be rotated via an aluminum alloy ring at 1-5 stop variations to reduce the amount of light.

Made of German Schott B270i HD glass, the filter features waterproof, stain-resistant, mildewproof, and scratch-resistant AR coatings, with less color cast, as well as a CNC-machined ultra-thin frame. Large-diameter filter prevents vignetting even in shooting using an ultra-wide angle lens. It can be magnetically and securely attached to SmallRig magnetic filter ring adapter via the bottom anti-deflection design and rotated between a range of hard stops at ND2 & ND32 for precise control of shooting.

SmallRig MagEase Magnetic CPL Filter (52mm) 4216 can eliminate reflection from non-metallic surfaces (such as lakes, windows, waterfalls, glass, buildings, etc.) and thereby improve image saturation. Increased color saturation means a bluer sky and more transparent water. It can also be used as an ND filter, reducing light by 1-2 stops. To eliminate reflection, you just need to rotate the CPL filter properly.

Made of German Schott B270i HD glass, the filter features waterproof, stain-resistant, mildewproof, and scratch-resistant AR coatings, with less color cast, as well as a CNC-machined ultra-thin frame. No vignetting even in shooting using an ultra-wide angle lens. It can be magnetically and securely attached to SmallRig magnetic filter adapter ring.

desc:
1. Integrated bowl base for quick leveling.

2. Carbon fiber legs, are lightweight and stable.

5. Built-in accessory mounting points.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Travel Video Tripod Kit 4221

SmallRig Travel Video Tripod Kit 4221 is specially designed for travel photography. It features reverse-folding carbon fiber legs to be folded down to 41cm and a center column to increase stability. The 4-section legs with quick-release flip locks allow you to adjust the working height to up to 160cm in seconds, and the detachable center column can be reversed for low-angle shots. By disassembling one of the legs and attaching it to the head, you can turn the tripod into a monopod. There is a 3-stop (23° / 55° / 85°) knob for quick angle adjustment to meet your needs. As for Video Head 4170 on the top, it comes with an integrated bowl base that enables 10 / -10° adjustment for quick leveling; a detachable telescopic handle, compatible either on the left or right side, for easier storage and more portability; and a built-in wrench for quick installation or removal of the camera. It also swivels 360° and tilts 90° / -55° to take steady shots from different angles. Besides, this tripod can support accessories like a magic arm via the two 1/4"-20 threaded holes. It weighs only 1.37kg and bears as much as 4kg, making it a good companion for shooting outdoors.

Note:

1. Avoid using it in a sandy and dusty environment, otherwise, there is a risk of damage.

2. Load capacity: 4kg.

3. 37mm head base.

title: SmallRig Wireless Follow Focus Kit (Lite) 4296B
desc:
1. Precision gear assembly design provides a high torque output of around 4.3 kgf·cm, enabling easy control of zoom lenses.

2. Intuitive and user-friendly operation for precise control.

3. Supports PD and QC fast charging protocols, offering up to 21 hours of standby time.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Wireless Follow Focus Kit (Lite) 4296B

SmallRig Wireless Follow Focus Kit (Lite) 4296B is designed to provide a precise and low-latency focusing experience for video shooting. The kit features red and blue light indicators to indicate connection status and channels (blue light - F00-1; green light - F15-1), offering intuitive and user-friendly operation guidance for simple and efficient control. The kit features a memory storage function, eliminating the need to recalibrate lens travel and AB point settings in case of power loss, enhancing shooting efficiency. Equipped with a built-in 1400mAh battery, this device provides approximately 21 hours of extended usage. Constructed with sweat-resistant, non-slip silicone material, the focus wheel ensures a comfortable and stable damping focus experience in various temperature conditions. The Receiver Motor supports a wide voltage input range of 5V-18V, compatible with PD and QC fast charging protocols. Utilizing a precision gear assembly design, it delivers a peak torque of 4.3 kgf·cm for effortless control of zoom lenses.

Note:

1. The blue light (F00-1) and green light (F15-1) are interchangeable with the FIZ Wireless Handwheel Controller (ID: 3263).

2. When the Handwheel Controller and Receiver Motor lights (blue and green) match, it indicates a successful automatic connection.

3. The Wireless Receiver Motor is compatible with the PD and QC protocols. Please use the provided power cord or a USB 3.0 cable to avoid insufficient torque issues.

4. Prolonged high torque zooming may result in the motor surface heating up, which is a normal phenomenon. Please exercise caution to prevent burns.

5. In the event of abnormal motor rotation, please refer to the user manual for instructions on performing a controller reset operation.

6. A flashing red light indicates a low battery or abnormality. Please address any problems promptly.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig "Rhinoceros" Cage Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III 4308

SmallRig "Rhinoceros" Cage Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III 4308 is designed to attach accessories and protect the camera and HDMI port. The cage secures the camera firmly via a locating pin, a 1/4"-20 screw, and an M2.5 screw together. It features a clean streamlined design that gives full access to the top buttons. The HDMI cable clamp is tightened via a flat-head screw, protecting the interfaces to ensure stable signal transmission. There are multiple mounting points for attaching other accessories, including 1/4"-20 threaded holes and ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes for Top Handle 2165C, Side Handle 2093C, one top ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole for Monitor Mount 2903B, cold shoe mounts for the microphone, LED video light, and a bottom QD socket for shoulder strap. The Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the bottom supports DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro stabilizers, DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 stabilizer quick-release plate (height increase pad), and Arca-Type Quick Release Plate 3154. This item also features strap slots on both sides and the bottom, compatible with Hand Strap 3848, Shoulder Strap PSC2428, etc. Besides, a magnetic wrench is included for easy disassembly and assembly.

Note:

1. Please remove the left split D-ring before installing the side lock adapter.

SmallRig Smartphone Vlog Tripod Kit VK-30 Advanced Version 4367 is composed of a tabletop telescoping tripod, Easy Loading smartphone holder, and a Vibe P96 LED Video Light. This compact and portable kit has an impressive load-bearing capacity of 1.5kg / 3.3lb. One 1/4"-20 screw attaches the tripod to the smartphone holder, which features a unique easy-to-retract design for swift smartphone attachment and removal. The 360-degree grip rotation allows a secure and quick switch between portrait and landscape orientations, while a pair of cold shoe mounts allow for the attachment of compatible accessories. The LED video light comes with three cold shoe mounts that allow for the attachment of more accessories. It has a 2700-6500K CT and a battery life of up to 13.5 hours. Besides, the tripod can be folded down to only 16cm / 6.3in.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Crab-Shaped Super Clamp with Ballhead Magic Arm 4373

SmallRig Crab-Shaped Super Clamp with Ballhead Magic Arm 4373 includes a ballhead magic arm, a crab-shaped clamp, an action camera mount, and a phone holder. There is a 1/4"-20 screw on one side of the magic arm for an action camera, monitor, LED video light, microphone, etc. The ball head features anti-slip threads for a firm lock. An anti-twist structure secures the ballhead magic arm to the crab-shaped clamp firm to ensure they do not become loose or fall off while moving. The clamp opens as wide as 54mm/2.1in and is compatible with DJI Ronin, FREEFLY MOVI Pro, and any 30mm rods, with easy adjustment via a knob. The clamp is embedded with pads which effectively protects the clamping object and enhances the stability of the clamping. The entire kit can be used with the included action camera mount to adapt to GoPro Hero Cage 3084C & 3083C, Frame for Insta360 X3 4088B, and Cage for DJI Osmo Action 4119. The phone holder supports 56-86mm wide and no more than 9mm thick smartphones.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig x Brandon Li Mobile Video Kit for iPhone 15 Pro Max Co-design Edition 4407B

SmallRig x Brandon Li Mobile Video Kit for iPhone 15 Pro Max Co-design Edition 4407B includes two handles to ensure stable videoing and vlogging; the wireless control allows “one-click” shooting. The cage has multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes and cold shoes to attach the handle, tripod, microphone, LED video light, etc. They all feature the new SmallRig Quick Release ecosystem for an easy and instant switch between shooting in horizontal and vertical orientations. The cage, in particular, is subtly hollowed out to give full access to the iPhone's buttons, ports, radar and ultra-wide-angle lens and to the MagSafe wireless charger. As an all-metal full cage, it also comes with built-in pads that prevent shocks and scratches. The kit, too, includes a filter ring adapter and a VND Filter ND2-ND32 (5 Stop) to make the image smoother and more cinematic. Besides, the special color and manufacturing process as well as Brandon Li's exquisite signature undoubtedly gives you a unique sense of exclusivity.

title: SmallRig Matte Box with Adjustable Clamp and VND Kit 4411
desc:
1. Featuring a 67-82mm adjustable clamp design with a three-point locking system for fast and reliable attachment and detachment.

2. Equipped with CPL+VND dual-filter functionality, enabling quick and secure magnetic attachment of multiple filters.

3. Innovative hard stop and light transmission limit technologies eliminate the VND X-pattern effect.

4. Delivers high definition throughout the entire focal range, with exceptional color reproduction in the 350-700nm wavelength range and minimal color distortion.

5. Comes with a dustproof cap and lens cover as standard accessories, boasting a meticulous dust protection design.

6. Offers vignette-free performance across focal lengths ≥16mm.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Matte Box with Adjustable Clamp and VND Kit 4411

SmallRig Matte Box with Adjustable Clamp and VND Kit 4411 is designed for video and photo enthusiasts. The unique adjustable clamp design of the matte box features a three-point locking system, allowing for quick assembly and disassembly by pressing the push rods on both sides of the clamp and a locking knob on top. With an adjustable clamp range of 67.0 - 82.0mm (2.6 - 3.2in), it offers broad compatibility with popular mirrorless and cinema lenses. With its slim design, it accommodates circular and square filters seamlessly, ensuring no vignetting at focal lengths ≥16mm (for full-frame cameras and lenses), reducing glare effectively in challenging conditions. The VND Matte Box with Adjustable Clamp offers versatile filter combinations, featuring both CPL and VND dual-filter functionality for seamless magnetic attachment. The VND infinite adjustment range spans from 2 to 5 stops, enhanced by hard stop and light transmission limit technologies to eliminate VND unwanted X-pattern effect. Utilizing high-definition imported glass with a 22-layer dual-sided coating, the filters ensure exceptional color reproduction and minimal color distortion within the 350-700nm wavelength range. The included dustproof cap and lens cover provide a meticulous dust protection solution. Boasting a modular design, this matte box facilitates easy accessory assembly and disassembly in a mere 3 steps. Its sleek, lightweight build not only streamlines the process but also alleviates equipment weight, enhancing comfort during shoots.

Note:

1. Before use, remove the UV filter from the front of the lens.

2. Ensure the top locking knob is securely fastened before use; do not operate without the top knob being locked.

3. This matte box cannot be installed on mirrorless lenses with an outer diameter >88mm or cinema lenses with an outer diameter >85mm.

4. Refer to the user manual for a detailed list of incompatible mirrorless and cinema lenses.

5. Refer to the user manual for instructions on using different filters.

6. The VND does not have clear gear markings.

7. When Combining CPL1 with CPL2/CPL3 to form VND, ensure alignment points are within the VND gear line.

8. CPL filters, ND filters, and Diffusion filters are directional; install products with logos facing outward. CPL filters can also be used individually.

9. Not compatible with 4x4" filters.

SmallRig Filter Kit with Adjustable Clamp 4412 is designed for video and photo enthusiasts. The unique adjustable clamp design of the matte box features a three-point locking system, allowing for quick assembly and disassembly. The Black Diffusion 1/4 filter delivers a delicate, cinematic softness ideal for portrait retouching and creating dreamy atmospheres.

The kit includes dust caps and lens covers for added protection, ensuring a meticulously dust-free experience. Boasting a modular design, this matte box facilitates easy accessory assembly and disassembly in a mere 3 steps. Its sleek, lightweight build not only streamlines the process but also alleviates equipment weight, enhancing comfort during shoots.

Note:

1. Before use, remove the UV filter from the front of the lens.

2. Ensure the top locking knob is securely fastened before use; do not operate without the top knob being locked.
