title: SmallRig Triple Magnetic Suction Cup Mounting Support Kit for Action Cameras 4468
desc:
1. The dual-material design adopts magnetic pull and silicone suction, increasing the product performance by six times that of peers providing firm attachment to the flat iron surface of the car.

2. When shooting with an action camera at high speed, even if the silicone suction cup leaks air due to violent vibration, the magnet can pull the entire bracket with strong magnetic force, effectively avoiding the risk of falling off due to air leakage caused by the leakage of a silicone suction cup.

3. Rubber and silicone dual shock absorber design reduces shakes from dynamic shooting and improves picture stability.

4. The extended design of the ball head locking knob for unobstructed access and easier operation.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Triple Magnetic Suction Cup Mounting Support Kit for Action Cameras 4468

SmallRig Triple Magnetic Suction Cup Mounting Support Kit for Action Cameras 4468 is designed to shoot car scenes using an action camera. It is only recommended to be used on flat iron surfaces, such as iron doors, railings, kitchenware, sports equipment, etc. The exclusive dual-material design combines magnets with a vacuum sucker, ensuring safer, longer-lasting, and more stable shooting. Even in the unlikely case of silicone suction cup leakage due to severe vibration, the magnets can pull the whole mounting support to the surface of an iron car (within the load capacity of 0.35kg / 0.8lb in a dynamic shooting scene with a flat road when maximum speed does not exceed 120km/h or 74mph), effectively avoiding the risk of falling off caused by the leakage of a silicone suction cup. The kit includes triple magnetic suction cups (one for each foot), a ball head, and an action camera mount. The 1/4"-20 screw on one end allows attaching an action camera, monitor, LED video light, microphone, etc., and the built-in spring pins support SmallRig 3084C, 3083C, 4088B, 4119B, and other accessories with locating holes to prevent deflection.  The rubber and silicone dual shock absorber design of the triple magnetic suction cup reduces shakes from dynamic shooting and improves picture stability.

Note:

1. The package does not include a safety rope. Please bring your safety rope when using it for car photography at high speed. It is recommended to keep the speed below 120km/h (74mph) and check the suction force before use and every hour.

2. This product can only be used on iron flat surfaces or other magnetic flat surfaces.  To use it on a flat glass surface, it is recommended to buy 3566 and 4193.

3. It is strictly prohibited to use the Magnetic Suction Cup Mounting Support Kit on the following surfaces: glass (e.g.: car windows, front windshields, etc.), carbon fiber, special alloy metal, painted surfaces,  marble, textured wallpaper, diatom mud walls, unpainted wood, frosted glass, and other rough or textured surfaces.

4. Do not use in the following scenarios: surfing, skiing, or other high-impact sports.

5. Do not use in the following environments: prolonged contact with water, or rain.

6. Do not use it with a mobile phone clamp for dynamic photography.

7. Do not use it with a selfie stick for dynamic photography.

8. Applicable temperature range: -20°C to 60°C / -4 to 140°F.

Packing List

Ball Head x 1

Action Camera Mount x 1

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Quick Release Rotating Side Handle Kit 4485

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Quick Release Rotating Side Handle Kit 4485 is designed to enhance stability for handheld dynamic filming. Its universal design seamlessly integrates with standard NATO rails. The handle features an exclusive quick-release slider with a patented self-locking system, facilitating the process of handle mounting. Bi-directional sliding offers freedom in installation orientation. A single press enables the handle to smoothly rotate 360° in both directions, facilitating comfortable camera maneuvering at any angle. The ergonomic design of the handle grip incorporates eco-friendly silicone with a textured surface for enhanced grip and comfort. Crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum alloy, the handle supports up to 15kg (33.1 lbs), ensuring durability and sturdiness. The handle features built-in 1/4"-20 threaded holes, an H18 quick-release cold shoe mount, and an H21 quick-release slider, allowing for expansion with accessories such as monitor mounts (ID 4487), magic arms (ID 4488), microphones (ID 3487), LED video light, and more to cater to various shooting scenarios. The kit also features a universal H21 quick-release slider with 1/4"-20 screws, compatible with the new and old cages. The slider is equipped with an anti-slip magnetic locking pin to prevent accidental slipping of the kit. In addition, the integrated magnetic Allen wrench facilitates the assembling and disassembling of accessories.

Work With

H21 Quick Release Sliderl: Compatible with cages, plates, and other accessories, featuring two integrated 1/4"-20 threaded holes spaced 9 to 27mm (0.3 to 1.1in) apart.

Top Handle: Compatible with HawkLock cages, plates, and other accessories with sliders.

* This side handle is not compatible with normal NATO rail.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Universal Quick Release Mount Plate Kit 4491

SmallRig HawkLock H21 Universal Quick Release Mount Plate Kit 4491 consists of a top quick-release plate and a base.  Press the button to flare the pins, slide the rail into the groove, and lock it by releasing the button. The precise measurements ensure the perfect fit and stability and prevent accidental falling off. The mount plate kit can hold up to 5kg / 11lb. The quick-release plate supports any equipment with 1/4"-20 threads, such as lightweight mirrorless cameras, monitors, action cameras, etc. Besides, it has two optional locating pins, which can effectively prevent the device from deflecting when used with SmallRig action camera cages (e.g.: 4119B, 3084C, and 4088B). The baseplate features a 1/4"-20 threaded hole and locating hole to attach any equipment with a 1/4"-20 screw, e.g.: mini Ball-Head Mounting Support Kit 2948B, mini Tripod BUT2429, 3905, etc., as well as accessories with locating pins, including Magic Arm 3873, 3874, 3875, 3959, and 4194.

desc:

2. Robust and durable load-bearing parts, such as strap holes, tops, and screws, made of titanium alloy.

3. All-inclusive protection with the three-point locking system for your camera.

4. Featuring multiple mounting interfaces - including an ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole, 1/4"-20 threaded hole, 1/4"-20 locating hole, cold shoe, NATO rail, QD socket, and strap slot - this setup facilitates all your shooting needs.

5. The built-in Arca-Swiss quick release plate at the bottom supports Arca-type tripods and DJI RS gimbals allowing for a seamless switching between handheld, gimbals, and tripod shooting.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for Leica SL3 / SL3-S 4510B

SmallRig Cage for Leica SL3 / SL3-S 4510B is designed to protect the camera and expand your camera with accessories to facilitate your creativity. The three-point locking system fixes the camera through one 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom and two side lock adapters. The built-in silicone pads prevent the camera from scratches, while the logo plate and engraved nameplate make this cage kit more personalized to help you better express yourself. All of the load-bearing parts are made of titanium alloy, making the cage kit robust and durable and giving unobstructed access to all of the camera interfaces. The cage kit features multiple mounting interfaces. There are multiple mounting options available, including a 1/4"-20 threaded hole, an ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole, and a 1/4"-20 locating hole. These options can be utilized to attach various accessories such as the Top Handle (2165C), Side Handle (4015 / 4346), Magic Arm (3875) for a monitor or image transmitter, a mini V-Mount Battery Plate (2987), a Mounting Clamp for Portable Power Banks (2336) for the VB50 mini V-Mount Battery, and a Monitor Mount (2903B / 2904B). as well as a cold shoe mount which can be used for a Microphone (3487) or an LED Video Light (4055). Furthermore, there is a strap slot that is compatible with the Wrist Strap (3848) or Shoulder Strap (PSC2428), a QD socket that supports the QD Quick Release Shoulder Strap (4118), and an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate that provides compatibility with the Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro gimbals. The built-in flat wrench facilitates the assembly and disassembly of accessories. The one-touch release cable clamp provides fast and firm installation to protect the cable interface and prevent accidental disconnection.

Note: Loosen but do not remove the screws on the locating blocks before the cage is installed.

Work With

Leica SL3、Leica SL3-S

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Cage Kit for Nikon Z 6III 4520

SmallRig Camera Cage Kit for Nikon Z 6III 4520 is designed to provide enhanced handheld shooting, portability, and accessory expansion. The kit includes a cage, an HDMI & USB-C cable clamp, and a top handle. The cage features multiple expansion options, such as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, cold shoe mounts, NATO rail, QD mounts, wrist/shoulder strap holes, allowing for the expansion of accessories like monitors, microphones, tripods, follow focuses, handles, and more for versatile video content creation across different scenarios. The cage securely locks the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom and dual M2.5 screws on the sides. The ergonomic handle facilitates on-the-go shooting, providing a comfortable and stable filming experience. It is equipped with an HDMI & USB-C cable clamp that securely fastens with a simple twist of a thumbscrew, preventing accidental signal interruptions and ensuring stable signal transmission. Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the bottom is compatible with Arca-type tripods (ID 4353, 4060) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro/ RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals, which allows for easy transitions between gimbals, handheld and tripod setups. In addition, a magnetic dual-head flat wrench is integrated into the baseplate for easy assembly and disassembly.

Note: please remove the D-rings on the sides of the camera before installing the cage.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig "Night Eagle" Cage Kit for Nikon Z 6III 4522

SmallRig "Night Eagle" Cage Kit for Nikon Z 6III 4522  is designed to provide enhanced low-angle shooting, protective housing, and versatile expansion options for a camera. The cage features a modern design with sleek curves, subtle gold highlights, and a new gunmetal brown color scheme. The kit includes a cage, a top handle, an HDMI & USB-C cable clamp, and a cold shoe mount. The cage can be expanded with monitor mounts (ID 2903B), side handles (ID 3847, 4016, 4015, 2093C), top handles (ID 2165C, 3765), rod clamps (ID 3598), magic arms (3875), tripods (ID 4465, 4060, 4353), LED video lights (ID 3286), microphones (ID 3487), and more. The integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the bottom supports Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro/ RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals, which allows for easy transitions between gimbals, handheld and tripod setups.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III 4538

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III 4538 is designed to facilitate low-angle shots and protect the camera while offering a wide range of accessory mounts. It includes a cage, an HDMI cable clamp, a NATO rail, and a top handle. The patented self-developed quick-release structure (named HawkLock) covers cold shoes, NATO rail, and arca swiss, which is used with HawkLock eco-accessories to realize solid and no false position, one push to load, release to lock, and improve the disassembly efficiency. The top handle feels comfortable and enables easy carrying and a low-angle shot. 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes, cold shoes and NATO rails QD socket support monitor mount 2294, microphones, LED lights, monitor mount 2903B, NATO accessories. The HDMI cable clamp, mounted onto the left side of the cage via one 1/4"-20 screw, prevents deflection and fixes cables with a thumbscrew to protect interfaces and ensure stable signal transmission. In addition, holes on both sides of the cage allow attaching hand straps. The cage comes with a built-in magnetic flat-head screwdriver & hex spanner for easy disassembly and assembly.

Note:


1. After fixing the 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom of the cage, remove the anti-deflection pin from the staging hole in the battery compartment position and fix it to the corresponding position.

2. To use the side lock adapter of the cage, please remove the split ring on the left side of the camera first.

3. HDMI Cable Clamp interferes with the synchroterminal interface when used on the Alpha 7R V camera.

title: SmallRig SR-RG2 Multifunctional Wireless Shooting Grip 4551
desc:

3. Stable support for various camera models, featuring a load capacity of 1.5kg (3.3lb) when used as a tripod and 0.8kg (1.76lb) as a selfie stick.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig SR-RG2 Multifunctional Wireless Shooting Grip 4551

SmallRig SR-RG2 Multifunctional Wireless Shooting Grip 4551 combines a camera grip, selfie stick, and desktop tripod into one versatile device, making it an ideal tool for vlogging, live streaming, and daily filming.

Equipped with modular magnetic wireless control, the grip allows remote operation for selected Nikon, Canon, and Sony cameras, including shutter release, recording, focus, zoom, and custom settings, with a control range of up to 10m (32.8ft). It can be extended to 14.6cm (5.7in) for wider framing and offers 360° pan and 180° tilt (90° forward and backward) for various shooting angles and scenarios.

This grip attaches to the camera using 1/4”-20 screws, with rubber pads on the mount to prevent the camera from scratches. It can also be transformed into a tripod, supporting cameras on a desktop during live streaming or filming. With a load capacity of 1.5kg (3.3lb) when not extended and 0.8kg (1.76lb) when extended, the grip offers stable support for various camera models. The remote control features a USB-C charging port, allowing for a full charge in 2.5 hours, which provides up to 40 hours of use. Furthermore, it can be upgraded via the SmallRig Up App for broader camera compatibility.

Compact and lightweight, the grip fits easily into your bag, and a complimentary wrist strap with a 5kg (11lb) load capacity offers convenient portability.

Note: Remote control charging input voltage must not exceed 8V.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit (For GoPro 9/10/11/12) 4565

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit (For GoPro 9/10/11/12) 4565 includes three high-capacity 1720mAh batteries and a charging case, ensuring prolonged usage. The robust PD 27W ultra-fast charging case enables simultaneous full charging of the three fast-charging batteries within just 1.5 hours, delivering efficient and potent charging capabilities.

Equipped with a TFT color screen, the charging case allows real-time monitoring of each battery's power levels within the compartment. The batteries are fully decoded, ensuring seamless compatibility with GoPro 9 / 10 / 11 / 12 models, guaranteeing uninterrupted filming without pop-up windows.

Constructed with reliable battery cells and circuitry, the kit incorporates comprehensive internal safety protection systems, including short circuit, overcurrent, over-discharge, overcharge,  high and low temperature, and ESD protections. These features ensure stable charging input and power output, providing essential support for your filming.

Crafted from fire-retardant ABS+PC materials, the kit ensures both safety and durability.

The charging case offers storage for up to four memory cards, featuring two push-in card slots on the top and two self-ejecting card slots on the side, enabling comfortable shooting and secure card storage solutions.

The unique pop-up unlock button design on the charging case allows for easy release and secure fastening, enhancing safety and convenience during operation. The Camera Battery and Charger Kit (For GoPro 9/10/11/12) 4565 caters to your comprehensive power needs, making it the ideal choice for your outdoor filming adventures.

SmallRig Cage Kit for Sony BURANO 4571

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Basic Cage Kit for Blackmagic Design Cinema 6K (Full-Frame) 4574

SmallRig Basic Cage Kit for Blackmagic Design Cinema 6K (Full-Frame) 4574 is designed to provide creators with a comfortable low-angle shooting experience, protect the camera, and offer multiple accessory expansion options. The kit includes a cage, a top handle, an HDMI & USB-C cable clamp, an SSD mount bracket, and a lens adapter support. Three-point locking system secures the camera via two 1/4"-20 screws at the base and a 1/4"-20 screw on the top, while integrated silicone pads prevent scratching. The cage provides unobstructed access to all camera interfaces, card slots, the flip screen, and the battery compartment. The lens adapter support is compatible with Sigma MC-31, Sigma MC-21, and similar lens adapters, preventing the camera's mount from damage. The kit is also equipped with HDMI & USB-C cable clamps to protect the camera's ports and prevent signal loss. The ergonomic ARRI-type top handle provides a comfortable low-angle shooting experience for creators, making it easy to handle the camera. The SSD mount bracket is compatible with Samsung T5/T7 SSDs and features a built-in cold shoe mount for quick assembly and disassembly. With multiple mounting options like 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, cold shoe mounts, NATO rail, and QD mounts, the kit accommodates accessories such as magic arms, side handles, top handles, rod clamps, baseplates, LED video lights, microphones, and more.

title: SmallRig Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Cage Kit 4601
desc:
1. Compact, lightweight, and form-fitting cage for Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra.

2. Varied accessory mounts for a microphone, LED video light, handle, tripod, strap, etc. to facilitate mobile phone shooting.

3. Adopts SmallRig's new HawkLock quick-release ecosystem to connect accessories more instantly.

4. Features a 67mm magnetic quick-release backplate, enabling quick attachment of filters.

5. 2-Stop filter lock ensures no vignetting at wide-angle and telephoto lens use.

6. Supports such lenses as T-mount lenses and 17mm threaded mount lenses.

7. Maintains unobstructed access to all buttons, ports, radar, and ultra-wide-angle lenses.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Cage Kit 4601

SmallRig Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Cage Kit 4601 is a multifunctional mobile phone cage specially designed for Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra to enable high-level video recording, live streaming, and vlogging. Compact and lightweight, snug fit, weighing only 106g / 3.7oz; features a range of 1/4”-20 anti-rotation threaded holes and cold shoe mounts for expanding handles, tripods, microphones, and lighting equipment, enhancing the professionalism of your shots. It also adopts an innovative SmallRig HawkLock quick-release interface design for more efficient connections. The side features a wrist strap hole compatible with professional straps under 2mm (0.07in) in diameter. The kit comes with a standard T-mount quick-release backplate and a 17mm threaded backplate to expand external lenses for richer shooting scenes. It also includes a 67mm magnetic filter adapter for quick installation and replacement of filters, offering a 2-stop lock to ensure no vignetting at wide-angle and telephoto ends. Precise matching provides unobstructed access to phone buttons, ports, radar, ultra-wide-angle lens, and S Pen. The easy-to-use locking mechanism of the cage provides more convenient and secure locking, ensuring the phone stays locked in place and won't pop out due to accidental touches. Solid all-metal aluminum alloy frame with built-in anti-slip and anti-scratch silicone pads provide comprehensive protection for the phone. After installing the phone into the cage, it supports both portrait and landscape shooting.

Note:

1. When installing and removing the mobile phone, please be sure to carefully handle it to prevent scratches. Compatible with T-mount lenses and 17mm threaded lenses. To use a 37mm threaded lens, you need to use an adapter. Incompatible with mobile phones in cases. Keep it away from acidic liquids.

2. When using a filter, it is necessary to utilize the 2-stop lock on the backplate to ensure that both wide-angle and telephoto lenses have no vignetting.

3. The T-mount backplate is compatible with Moment T-mount lenses only and does not support FotorGear T-mount lenses. 

Work With

Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra

title: SmallRig VND Filter Kit 4649
desc:
1. Dual CPL+VND filter function with quick-release magnetic attachment for safety and reliability.

2. When using CPL1 with CPL2, it achieves a VND effect of 2 to 5 stops; when using CPL1 with CPL3, it achieves a VND effect of 6 to 9 stops.

3. Innovative hard stop and light transmission limit technologies eliminate the VND X-pattern effect.

4. Delivers high definition throughout the entire focal range, with exceptional color reproduction in the 350-700nm wavelength range and minimal color distortion.

5. Comes with a dustproof cap and lens cover as standard accessories, boasting a meticulous dust protection design.

6. Offers vignette-free performance across focal lengths ≥16mm.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig VND Filter Kit 4649

SmallRig VND Filter Kit 4649 is designed for users seeking a lightweight and quick filter assembly experience. The unique adjustable clamp design of the matte box features a three-point locking system, allowing for quick assembly and disassembly by pressing the push rods on both sides of the clamp and a locking knob on top. With an adjustable clamp range of 67.0 - 82.0mm (2.6 - 3.2in), it offers broad compatibility with popular mirrorless and cinema lenses. With its slim design, it seamlessly accommodates circular filters, ensuring no vignetting at focal lengths ≥16mm (for full-frame cameras and lenses), effectively reducing glare in challenging conditions. All filters from the kit can be freely combined, with CPL filters magnetically stackable. When using CPL1 with CPL2, it achieves a VND effect of 2 to 5 stops; when using CPL1 with CPL3, it achieves a VND effect of 6 to 9 stops, offering infinite adjustability. Combined with hard stops and light transmission limit technology, these filters effectively eliminate the VND X-pattern effect. Utilizing imported high-definition glass and 16-layer dual-coating technology, the filters deliver highly accurate color reproduction and minimal color distortion within the 350-700nm wavelength range.

Note:

1. Before use, remove the UV filter from the front of the lens.

2. Ensure the top locking knob is securely fastened before use; do not operate without the top knob being locked.

3. This matte box cannot be installed on mirrorless lenses with an outer diameter >88mm or cinema lenses with an outer diameter >85mm.

4. Refer to the user manual for a detailed list of incompatible mirrorless and cinema lenses.

5. Refer to the user manual for instructions on using different filters.

6. The VND does not have clear gear markings.

7. When Combining CPL1 with CPL2/CPL3 to form VND, ensure alignment points are within the VND gear line.

8. CPL filters, ND filters, and Diffusion filters are directional; install products with logos facing outward. CPL filters can also be used individually.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Black Diffusion Filter Kit 4650

SmallRig Black Diffusion Filter Kit 4650 is designed for video and photo shooting, catering to users who aim to create a delicate and soft film-like texture, enhance skin tones, and produce halo effects. The Black Diffusion Filter Kit includes 1/8, 1/4, 1/2, and 1-stop filters, totaling 4 pieces, to meet various levels of softness. The Black Diffusion filters can be used independently with the mini matte box (ID: 4409, 4411, 4412) or combined with CPL1, CPL2 polarizers, VND filter (ID: 4649), and ND filter series (4799) by magnetic stacking. The circular magnet provides a strong attachment for quick filter changes, ensuring stable shooting conditions. The aluminum alloy edge frames the filters offering protection against accidental impacts and fingerprints.

Note:

1. Exercise caution when using telephoto lenses of 135mm or longer.

2. The Black Diffusion series soft-focus filters are specifically engineered to control highlights and enrich shadow intricacies, Commonly used in large aperture daytime/nighttime candlelight, lighting, and other environments.

3. Use the Black Diffusion filters only with a Matte Box with Adjustable Clamp or the Multifunctional VND Filter Kit (ID: 4415).

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig CFexpress 9 in 1 Photography Docking Station (B) 4662

SmallRig CFexpress 9 in 1 Photography Docking Station (B) 4662 is crafted for photographers who require seamless connectivity across multiple interfaces. This professional 9-in-1 dock features one 10Gbps CFexpress Type B slot, one UHS-II SD 4.0 and microSD 4.0 slot, one 10Gbps USB-C data port, two 5Gbps USB-A data ports, one 4K@30Hz HDMI port, one Gigabit Ethernet port, and one 100W PD-IN port. It facilitates easy file access and multi-port functionality, streamlining both work and entertainment.

It includes a 50cm / 19.7in dual-head USB-C high-speed cable that supports 10Gbps data transfer for improved work efficiency. The independent dock accommodates cables of different lengths, promoting a tidy workspace. Additionally, the bionic fin-like structure provides effective heat dissipation for safe use. Compact and portable, this docking station is ideal for an efficient digital lifestyle.

Note:

1. Not compatible with Nintendo Switch.

2. Does not support XQD cards.

3. Do not plug or unplug the PD charger during data transfer, as varying PD protocols may interrupt transmission. Please ensure a stable power supply.

4. Using SD with microSD and CFexpress Type B slots may result in slower transfer speeds, with a maximum theoretical speed of 10Gbps.

5. Ensure the memory card is inserted correctly before use.

6. Using multiple ports simultaneously may cause the device surface temperature to rise; this is normal.

7. The PD port supports power input; an input voltage greater than 5V is recommended to ensure proper operation. Improper use may damage the product.

8. The upstream port is primarily for charging output, with a maximum power of 90W, other ports are mainly for data transfer, with a maximum power of 11W.

9. Avoid contact with water or exposure to rain.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage Kit for FUJIFILM GFX100S II 4715

SmallRig Cage Kit for FUJIFILM GFX100S II 4715 is designed to protect the camera and attach various accessories. The kit includes a cage and a HDMI & USB-C cable clamp. The cage securely fastens the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom and dual M2.5 screws on the sides, while integrated pads prevent scratching. The cage provides unobstructed access to all camera interfaces, card slots, a flip screen, and a battery compartment. The cage features various mounting options, such as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes, NATO rail, cold shoe mount, QD mount, wrist/shoulder strap holes, and more. It is compatible with various accessories such as the side handles (ID 2093C/ 4016 / 3847), top handle (ID 3765), monitor mounts (ID 2903 / 2904), mini V-mount battery plate (ID 2987), single rod clamp (ID 3598), magic arm (ID 3873), microphone (ID 3468), LED video light (ID 4055), and more. The integrated cold shoe mount supports attaching SSD holders (ID 2343 / 3272) allowing for versatile storage options. Additionally, the cage features a wrist strap hole, compatible with a hand strap (ID 3848) and neck strap (ID 3485), as well as QD mounts that are compatible with a shoulder strap (ID 4118). Arca-Swiss quick release plate on the bottom allows for easy transitions between Arca-type tripods, DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro gimbals, and handheld shooting. The HDMI & USB-C cable clamp, featuring a thumbscrew attachment, ensures stable signal transmission to prevent any accidental disruptions. For ease of assembly and disassembly, a magnetic dual-head flat wrench is integrated at the bottom of the cage.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Follow Focus F50 4745

SmallRig Follow Focus F50 4745 delivers precise focus control for video production. Its ingenious adjustable driving gap design eliminates backlash, ensuring a seamless focus experience. The one-touch stepless damping lever allows dynamic damping control within a range of 0.3kgf–1.0kgf, catering to diverse lens damping preferences, while 2-step A/B stop switching and 360° swift push-pull zoom enhance versatility.

Included is a silicone gear (ID 3852) that enables friction-driven focus for mirrorless lenses, along with a compact silicone handwheel for a non-slip grip and fine-tuned control. This follow focus mounts using a Φ15mm rod and a single rod clamp (ID 1549) on the left or top of the lens, with adjustable angles for flexible configurations. Its modular design ensures a quick and precise setup for handheld, tripod, and various shooting scenarios.

Note:

1. Ensure the silicone gear fits tightly with the lens ring. If slippage occurs with high-damping zoom lenses, check for looseness between the silicone gear and the lens.

2. The silicone gear is compatible only with DSLR and mirrorless lenses. Please remove it before using cinema lenses.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 5-in-1 Memory Card Reader for Travel Photography 4746

SmallRig 5-in-1 Memory Card Reader for Travel Photography 4746 is designed for effortless management and backup of photos, videos, and files on mobile devices while on the go. Featuring a 65W PD interface, it enables high-speed pass-through charging, ensuring stable data transfer. The included 120cm (47.2in) cable supports 5Gbps data transfer, allowing simultaneous data transfer and charging without interrupting phone use.

With dual 5Gbps USB-C and USB-A ports, it facilitates speedy file transfers of 1GB in just two seconds. The dual SD / TF card slots support simultaneous reading and writing, with a maximum read speed of 100MB/s, accommodating SD, SDHC, SDXC, Micro SD, Micro SDXC, and Micro SDHC cards. Additionally, it offers universal compatibility with Android, iOS, Windows, and macOS.

Note:

1. Supports USH-II standard memory cards but operates at USH-I speeds.

2. Do not plug or unplug the PD charger during data transfer, as varying PD protocols may interrupt transmission. Please ensure a stable power supply.

3. For Android devices, keep the file manager running in the background to prevent interruptions in data transfer.

4. Transfer speeds will be limited to USB 2.0 standards when using a USB 2.0 interface.

5. Using SD and microSD cards together may result in slower transfer speeds, with a maximum theoretical speed of 104 MB/s.

6. Ensure the memory card is inserted correctly before use.

7. If transfer issues occur, verify that the memory card is properly inserted. Remove the memory card, then reinsert it into the SD card reader and try again.

8. Avoid contact with water or exposure to rain.

title: SmallRig Filter Kit for DJI Osmo Pocket 3 4776
desc:
1. Magnetic snap-on installation for swift shooting initiation.

2. Compact and lightweight design that doesn't hinder gimbal rotation or storage.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Filter Kit for DJI Osmo Pocket 3 4776

SmallRig Filter Kit for DJI Osmo Pocket 3 4776 is a dedicated filter kit designed for the DJI Osmo Pocket 3. The kit includes a VND2-5 filter, an ND16 / CP filter, a light pollution filter (LPF filter), and a tempered screen protector. The VND2-5 filter combines variable neutral density and polarization functions, allowing for easy exposure adjustments in different lighting conditions, resulting in excellent shooting effects. The ND16 / CPL filter combines the functions of an ND filter and a polarizing filter, reducing light entering the camera in bright environments and eliminating reflections for richer, more vibrant colors. The LPF filter effectively reduces light pollution and color distortion in urban nightscapes, enhancing the purity and delicacy of night photography. The tempered screen protector offers durability and clarity, effectively protecting the screen from scratches.

title: SmallRig 82mm UV & VND Filter Kit 4781
desc:
1. The VND filter offers 8K high resolution, replacing conventional 2-6 stop ND filters with ultra-high color reproduction and minimal color deviation.

2. The VND filter offers a 2-9 stop adjustment, utilizing light limit technology to eliminate the X-pattern effect.

3. The UV filter boasts waterproof and anti-glare features.

4. Pairing the UV filter with the adapter enables swift magnetic attachment.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 82mm UV & VND Filter Kit 4781

SmallRig 82mm UV & VND Filter Kit 4781 is designed for 82mm wide aperture lens photo and video shooting. This kit includes the 82mm UV filter, adapter, high-resolution 8K VND filter, and dust cover. The UV filter utilizes a dual-sided 22-layer coating technology enhancing both waterproof and anti-glare features, facilitating swift cleaning from dust and water, while effectively preventing glare.

The VND filter offers a versatile 2-9 stop adjustment range. It also features a dual-sided 22-layer coating using imported B270 glass and incorporates an ultra-thin polarizing film and optical bonding layer, delivering 1-6 stop ultra-low color deviation. Moreover, this VND filter can serve as an alternative to traditional single-piece ND filters, employing advanced light limit technology to eliminate the X-pattern. The VND filter boasts an 8K resolution, enabling 8K RAW format recording.

The filter kit features a magnetic quick-release mechanism, allowing seamless and secure attachment to UV filters, while also enabling magnetic attachment for various filters.

Additionally, the dust-proof cover magnetically attaches to the filter, protecting against dust and scratches. This filter kit also includes a compact and stylish filter pouch for convenient storage of filters.

Note:

1. Not compatible with UV filters or VND filters of different specifications. UV filters are sold separately.

2. The included VND filter is compatible with ID 4409, 4411, 4412, 4415.

3. The kit is compatible with black diffusion filter kits (ID 4650, 5652) and the ND filter kit (ID 4799).

4. Only compatible with 82mm specifications lens.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Neutral Density Filter Kit 4799

SmallRig Neutral Density Filter Kit 4799 is designed for users to capture scenes like waterfall cascades, sunrise, sunset, etc. This kit comprises ND8, ND64, and ND1000 filters. The ND8 filter is ideal for enhancing water textures in tide and waterfall shots, while the ND64 is perfect for balancing exposure in early morning or late evening outdoor settings. The ND1000 is primarily used for capturing solar eclipses. The ND8 and ND64 filters can also be combined with CPL1 / CPL2 polarizers to reduce reflections on glass and metal surfaces, enhancing details.

These filters feature imported high-definition glass with multi-layer dual-sided coating technology, providing highly accurate color reproduction and minimal color deviation within the 350-700nm wavelength range. Equipped with a circular magnetic design for quick attachment and stability during shooting, the filters come with protective aluminum alloy edges to safeguard against accidental impacts and fingerprints.

Note: The ND8, ND64, and ND1000 filters can only be used in conjunction with an adjustable clamp or the Multifunctional VND Filter Tray (ID: 4415).

desc:
1. The cage kit features a streamlined design with unobstructed access to camera buttons.

2. The dedicated HDMI cable clamp with the thumbscrew ensures interface protection for stable signal transmission.

3. Three-point locking system includes a bottom 1/4"-20 threaded hole and dual side locating blocks to lock the camera in place to provide secure stability.

4. The cage kit features versatile interfaces, including built-in 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, cold shoe mounts, strap holes, and QD interfaces for attaching accessories like handles, microphones, lights, monitors, shoulder and wrist straps.

5. The integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate at the bottom enables a seamless transition between handheld, tripod, and stabilizer (DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro) shooting scenarios.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage Kit for Sony ZV-E10 II 4867

SmallRig Cage Kit for Sony ZV-E10 II 4867 is designed to provide mounting solutions for additional accessories, protect the camera body, and secure the HDMI port. The cage kit includes a cage and an HDMI clamp. The two-point locking system securely fixes the cage to the camera with a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and a right-side M2.5 screw to prevent any deviation, while the all-around padding prevents scratches on the camera. The battery compartment features a hinged door that conforms better to the curves of the camera body, solving the issue of where to place the little finger and enhancing the grip.

The HDMI cable clamp mounts on the left side of the cage with a thumbscrew, allowing for convenient installation and removal of cables with a simple twist, ensuring the protection of the camera's HDMI port and stable signal transmission.

The cage features multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes for attaching accessories such as top handles (ID 4757) and side handles (ID 4755), assisting with handheld shooting. The top ARRI locating hole enables the installation of a monitor with the monitor mount (ID 2903B). Additionally, it includes a built-in cold shoe mount for attaching microphones, lights, and other accessories.

The bottom of the cage is equipped with a 1/4"-20 threaded hole for mounting a mini tripod and is compatible with the DJI RS Mini quick-release plate, facilitating camera stabilization. An integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate accommodates Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals, allowing seamless transitions between handheld, gimbal, and tripod shooting scenarios.

The cage also features strap holes on the sides and bottom for attaching accessories such as the wrist strap (ID 3848) and shoulder strap (ID PSC2428), while the integrated QD holes are compatible with QD shoulder straps.

To enhance convenience, the kit is equipped with a built-in magnetic Allen wrench at its base, ensuring quick access and facilitating easy assembly and disassembly.

Note: When using the DJI RS 3 Mini stabilizer, ensure to first attach the DJI RS Mini quick-release plate to the base of the cage.

Work With

Sony ZV-E10 II

title: SmallRig SD4.0 Memory Card Reader 4870
desc:
1. Dual SD / TF card slots support simultaneous reading and writing.

2. USB 4.0 high-speed transfer at 312MB/s, transferring 1GB of data in 6 seconds.

3. Attachable design facilitates stable and seamless data transfer.

4. 90° angled connector ensures a secure connection and easy cable management.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig SD4.0 Memory Card Reader 4870

SmallRig SD4.0 Memory Card Reader 4870 is designed for efficient data transfer and backup on mobile devices and computers. It supports various memory cards, including SD, SDHC, SDXC, TF, Micro SD, Micro SDXC, and Micro SDHC, allowing for simultaneous reading and writing of SD and TF cards. This feature facilitates seamless data synchronization, transfer, and copying, streamlining file management. 

With USB 4.0 high-speed transfer at 312MB/s, 1GB of data can be transferred in just 6 seconds, making bulk photocopying and large file transfers a breeze. The reader easily attaches to iPhones using attachable features, enabling one-handed operation anytime, anywhere. Its 90° angled connector ensures a secure fit and simplifies cable management, while its compact design allows for easy storage and portability.

Note:

1. For Android devices, keep the file manager running in the background to prevent interruptions in data transfer.

2. Transfer speed is limited to USB 2.0 or 3.0 standards when using a USB 2.0 or 3.0 interface.

3. Using SD and microSD cards together may result in slower transfer speeds, with a maximum theoretical speed of 312 MB/s.

4. Ensure the memory card is inserted correctly before use.

5. If transfer issues occur, verify that the memory card is properly inserted. Remove the memory card, then reinsert it into the SD card reader and try again.

6. Hot swapping can result in data loss; please read the installation steps in the manual carefully.

7. Fragile. Handle with care.

8. Avoid contact with water or exposure to rain.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Basic Cage Kit for Canon EOS C400 4947

SmallRig Basic Cage Kit for Canon EOS C400 4947 is designed to provide filmmakers with a comprehensive set of features and versatile shooting solutions. This kit comprises a top plate, dual side plates, a baseplate, an extension module for the original handle, a cheese backplate, a sun shade, and a handle locking knob.

The modular design of the kit (top plate, side plates, and baseplate) allows for seamless adaptation to various shooting scenarios. The cage kit features multiple built-in mounting interfaces such as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, dual rod clamps, QD interfaces, NATO rails, cold shoe mounts, ARRI rosettes, and more. Combined with the tripod (ID 4463), it facilitates swift landscape-to-portrait orientation switching. The kit can also attach the QD shoulder strap (ID 4118), enabling convenient portability.

Attaching the 15mm dual rods (ID 1053) facilitates the use of the wireless follow focus (ID 3918), while the cheese backplate allows for mounting V mount batteries (ID 4292).

The extension module for the original handle not only enhances palm support but also provides additional mounting options on the top handle to extend with accessories like magic arms (ID 3875, 3874), 15mm rod clamps (ID 4171), monitors, audio receivers, and more.

The cheese backplate features multiple mounting options such as 1/4”-20 locating holes, 1/4”-20 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, compatible with magic arms (ID 3875, 3874) and V-mount plates (ID 2987) to attach monitors, V mount batteries, and more.

The kit includes an LCD sun shade to block out excess light, ensuring a clear screen view in bright conditions.

Additionally, it features a thumbscrew knob that can replace the original locking screw on the handle enabling the tool-free handle mounting.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig "Black Mamba" Cage Kit for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4976

SmallRig "Black Mamba" Cage Kit for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4976 is designed to enhance handheld shooting stability, portability, and accessory expansion. This kit includes a cage, USB-C & HDMI cable clamp, and a HawkLock top handle. Embodying the sleek "Black Mamba" style, the kit combines aesthetics with photographers' shooting needs. The comfortable grip of the top handle facilitates camera portability and low-angle shooting.

The kit is equipped with a range of expansion interfaces such as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, cold shoe mounts, Arca-Swiss quick release plate, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes, QD interfaces, and strap slots, allowing for the attachment of monitors, microphones, tripods, follow focuses, handles, and other accessories for versatile video content creation.

The built-in Arca Swiss quick-release plate enables seamless mounting on Arca-type tripods (ID 4353, 4060) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, facilitating swift transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups.

An ergonomic anti-slip and anti-freeze "Black Mamba" top handle with silicone padding ensures a comfortable and stable handheld shooting experience. The HDMI & USB-C cable clamp securely fastens with a single thumbscrew, preventing signal interruptions and ensuring stable signal transmission.

The cage comes with a durable scratch-resistant tempered glass screen protector with a surface hardness of 9H and an IK03 impact resistance test rating.

Note:

1. Remove the side locating blocks on both sides of the cage before mounting.

2. The tempered glass screen protector is intentionally designed to be slightly smaller than the screen edges to prevent dust from entering through larger gaps, constituting a normal design feature.

title: SmallRig FilMov Lightweight Photography Case Kit for iPhone 16 Pro Max 4987
desc:
1. Enhanced Camera Control with the Phone CapGrip: The grip is designed to elevate your shooting experience by offering improved tactile feedback and control of the Capture Button and additional mounting options through 1/4"-20 threaded holes.

2. Quick Release Optical Accessory Expansion: The detachable lens backplate allows for the attachment of external lenses or filters. Comes with a standard T-mount backplate for swift lens swapping.

3. Instant Switch to Professional Shooting: The phone case can be quickly mounted into the SmallRig phone cages, enhancing protection while significantly boosting the expandability for professional shooting.

4. Strong Magnetic Attraction Compatible with MagSafe: An incorporated powerful N52 magnet, ensures fast and stable wireless charging. Compatible with various types of MagSafe chargers and accessories when used as a standalone phone case.

5. Advanced Protective Design: Features raised edges for the screen and lens, offering superior drop and impact protection.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig FilMov Lightweight Photography Case Kit for iPhone 16 Pro Max 4987

SmallRig FilMov Lightweight Photography Case Kit for iPhone 16 Pro Max 4987 is a sophisticated mobile protective case designed for mobile content creation, offering seamless compatibility with the optical ecosystem. Crafted with premium leather material and meticulous spray painting techniques, it boasts an exquisite appearance, enhancing the user's sensory experience.

The ergonomic CapGrip for the lower part of the phone, designed to enhance the grip and control of the Capture Button, ensures comfortable one-handed operation, allowing users to effortlessly capture moments with enhanced stability. Equipped with a locking button for secure attachment to the phone case, CapGrip also features a 1/4"-20 threaded hole for easy mounting onto the support stands and tripods.

The detachable lens backplate of the case can be swiftly interchanged with an included standard T-mount lens backplate for effortless installation and removal of T-mount lenses and lens accessories. It can also be replaced by a 67mm filter adapter or a 17mm threaded backplate for expanded compatibility with various optical accessories.

Providing essential daily protection for the phone, the case also features a magnet on the back for compatibility with a range of MagSafe accessories. Additionally, the case features a lanyard hole on the side for convenient attachment of lanyards or wrist straps, facilitating easy portability.

Note:

1. Slide the lens backplate from top to bottom and securely lock it before attaching external lenses.

2. Lock the CapGrip by pushing the locking button downwards after installation; unlock by pushing it upwards before removal.

3. Avoid forceful impacts on the phone when using the CapGrip or attaching lenses.

4. Avoid contact between the leather and sharp objects to prevent any damage to the exterior of the phone case.

Work With

iPhone 16 Pro Max

title: SmallRig Matte Box Kit With CPL&VND Filters 5011
desc:
1. Dual CPL&VND functionality with magnetic quick-release attachment for secure and reliable operation.

2. Hard stop and light transmission limit technologies eliminate VND cross patterns.

3. Modular design for swift two-step assembly.

4. ≥16mm focal length with no vignetting.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Matte Box Kit With CPL&VND Filters 5011

SmallRig Matte Box Kit With CPL&VND Filters 5011 is designed for mirrorless camera video shooting, maintaining depth of field while adjusting external light flux to preserve exposure balance and prevent glare and flares from sunlight or other strong light sources.

The VND filter frame features dual CPL+VND filter functionality with a magnetic attachment for various CPL and VND combinations. The VND features 2-5 stops with infinite adjustment.  Incorporated hard stop and light transmission limit technologies effectively eliminate VND cross patterns.

The filters utilize imported high-definition glass with a 22-layer dual-sided coating technology, providing highly accurate color reproduction and minimal color distortion within the 350-700nm wavelength range. Optional black diffusion filter kits (ID 4650, 4652) and ND filter kits (ID 4799) are available to meet all your needs.

The VND filter frame features an automatic locking system that can be quickly released with a single press.  With its lightweight and slim design and front-mounted lens compatibility, it achieves attaching ≥16mm focal length without vignetting (while using with full-frame camera and lens setups). This kit also includes four common threaded adapters (Φ67-95mm; Φ72-95mm; Φ77-95mm; Φ82-95mm) and a 4x5.65" filter frame to cater to different lens and filter specifications.

Note:

1. Compatible only with ID 3556, 3645, 3641, 3646.

2. The filter frame's inner lens-mounted design is compatible with a wider range of focal lengths.

3. VND lacks explicit stop markings.

4. When combining CPL1 with CPL2/CPL3 to form VND, ensure alignment points are within the VND range line.

5. CPL filters, ND filters, and softboxes are directional and need to be installed with the logo facing outward.

description:

SmallRig Camera Leather Case Kit for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 5015

SmallRig Camera Leather Case Kit for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 5015 is designed to protect your camera while preserving its classic appeal. The kit includes a leather case and wrist strap, both crafted from durable and breathable top-grain leather. The plush interior lining protects the camera from scratches.

A 1/4"-20 thumbscrew at the bottom allows for tool-free camera mounting. The design of the case ensures unobstructed access to camera interfaces and buttons such as the battery compartment, focus mode, and card slot. Featuring an integrated aerospace-grade aluminum inner frame, the case not only ensures a snug fit but also protects the camera from impacts and bumps. The locking screw at the bottom features a built-in 1/4"-20 threaded hole for direct tripod mounting without removing the case.

title: SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage Kit for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 5029
desc:
1. Dedicated handheld kit for smooth operation and convenient portability.

2. Features an ergonomic HawkLock quick-release handle with silicone padding for a comfortable, non-slip, and stable shooting experience.

3. Equipped with a thumbscrew-tightened HDMI & USB-C cable clamp to protect camera interfaces and ensure stable signal transmission.

4. The kit features various interfaces for versatile shooting scenarios: 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes, HawkLock quick release cold shoe mounts, HawkLock quick release NATO rails, QD interface, strap slots, and more.

5. The incorporated Arca-Swiss quick-release baseplate is compatible with Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers.

6. Includes durable scratch-resistant 9H hardness tempered glass screen protector, featuring  IK03 impact resistance test rating.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage Kit for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 5029

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage Kit for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 5029 is designed to enhance handheld shooting stability, portability, and accessory expansion. The kit includes a cage, USB-C & HDMI cable clamps, and the HawkLock quick-release handle.

The kit has incorporated HawkLock quick-release interfaces for swift and secure mounting. It features the H21 quick-release NATO rail, H18 quick-release cold shoe mount, H38 Arca-Swiss quick-release plate, 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 1/4"-20 locating holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI  3/8"-16 locating holes, cold shoe mounts, NATO rails, QD interfaces, strap slots, and more for attaching monitors, microphones, tripods, follow focus systems, handles, and other accessories to enhance video content creation in various scenarios.

The cage secures the camera in place with a single 1/4"-20 screw at the base and two locating blocks on the sides, incorporating built-in silicone pads to prevent scratches on the camera. The built-in Arca Swiss quick-release plate enables seamless mounting on Arca-type tripods (ID 4353, 4060) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, facilitating swift transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups.

The ergonomic HawkLock quick-release handle with silicone padding ensures a comfortable and stable handheld shooting experience. The HDMI & USB-C cable clamp securely fastens with a single thumbscrew, preventing signal interruptions and ensuring stable signal transmission.

Additionally, the cage comes with a durable scratch-resistant tempered glass screen protector with a surface hardness of 9H and an IK03 impact resistance test rating.

Note:

1. Remove the side locating blocks on both sides of the cage before mounting.

2. The tempered glass screen protector is intentionally designed to be slightly smaller than the screen edges to prevent dust from entering through larger gaps, constituting a normal design feature.

Work With

Canon EOS R5 Mark II

title: SmallRig Modular Follow Focus F60 5163
desc:
1. Wide-range stepless damping adjustment: 0.6kgf-1.8kgf.

2. Zero-backlash sync drive for precise focus control.

3. 3-step quick switch to reversible rotation.

4. Classic style with wooden texture.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Modular Follow Focus F60 5163

SmallRig Modular Follow Focus F60 5163 is engineered for precise and smooth lens focus control during video shooting. Notably, its optimized core drive mechanism ensures zero-backlash focus tracking for exceptional accuracy. The innovative stepless damping adjustment allows dynamic damping control within a range of 0.6kgf-1.8kgf, catering to users' preferences for different lens damping levels. It also supports 3-step quick lens reversal switching and 2-step A / B stops setting and release, along with 360° quick push-pull zoom. This modular follow focus includes a silicon gear (ID: 3852) that directly drives focusing on mirrorless camera lenses through friction. Redesigned for a refined appearance, it offers improved damping adjustment and a wider range of focus angles, significantly enhancing the overall user experience.

Note:

1. Variations in wood grain color may occur compared to promotional images.

2. Ensure the silicone gear fits tightly with the lens ring. If slippage occurs with high-damping zoom lenses, check for looseness between the silicone gear and the lens.

3. The silicone gear is compatible only with DSLR and mirrorless lenses. Please remove it before using cinema lenses.

title: SmallRig Magnetic 67mm VND Filter ND64-ND400 (6-9 Stop) 5169
desc:
1. This VND filter offers 6-9 stop adjustable dimming, providing optimal exposure settings and motion blur effects for video shooting.

2. Multi-layered German-imported optical glass for high definition and clarity.

3. Effectively eliminates the "X" cross shadow in the images.

4. Features a rotating limit design to prevent filter deflection during adjustments.

5. Designed with hard stops at both ND64 & ND400 ends.

6. Magnetic attachment enables quick mounting and replacement of the filter.

7. Compatible with SmallRig mobile phone cages or cases that work with 67mm magnetic filter adapters.

8. Includes a standard threaded adapter for compatibility with 67mm lenses.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Magnetic 67mm VND Filter ND64-ND400 (6-9 Stop) 5169

SmallRig Magnetic 67mm VND Filter ND64-ND400 (6-9 Stop) 5169 is a variable neutral density filter that provides adjustable dimming and optimal exposure for various video scenarios and professional photography needs. Featuring multi-layered German-imported optical glass, it ensures exceptional optical quality eliminating cross pattern.

The filter adopts magnetic attachment for quick installation and efficient replacement. It’s compatible with SmallRig mobile phone video kits that work with 67mm filter adapters, including the iPhone 16 series, Samsung S24 Ultra, Vivo X100 Ultra, etc. Additionally, it comes with a standard threaded adapter for 67mm lenses.

Note:

1. This filter significantly reduces vignetting, but it cannot guarantee the absence of vignetting in all shooting conditions and camera settings.

2. A threaded adapter is required to mount the filter on 67mm threaded camera lenses.

Work With

67mm Attachable Filter Adapter (ID 4585, 4587, 4993, 5010, 5171)

desc:

2. The black mist filter reduces image sharpness and contrast while enhancing details in the shadows.

3. Multi-layered German-imported optical glass for high definition and clarity.

4. Effectively eliminates the "X" cross shading in the images.

5. Features a rotating limit design to prevent filter deflection during adjustments.

6. Designed with hard stops at both ND2 & ND32 ends.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Magnetic 67mm VND Filter ND2-ND32 (1-5 Stop) & Black Mist 1/4 Filter 5170

SmallRig Magnetic 67mm VND Filter ND2-ND32 (1-5 Stop) & Black Mist 1/4 Filter 5170 combines features of a VND filter that provides adjustable dimming and optimal exposure for various video scenarios and professional photography needs, and a black mist filter that reduces image sharpness and contrast while enhancing details in the shadows. Featuring multi-layered German-imported optical glass, it ensures exceptional optical quality eliminating cross pattern.

The filter adopts magnetic attachment for quick installation and efficient replacement. It’s compatible with SmallRig mobile phone video kits that work with 67mm filter adapters, including the iPhone 16 series, Samsung S24 Ultra, Vivo X100 Ultra, etc. Additionally, it comes with a standard threaded adapter for 67mm lenses.

Note:

1. This filter significantly reduces vignetting, but it cannot guarantee the absence of vignetting in all shooting conditions and camera settings.

2. A threaded adapter is required to mount the filter on 67mm threaded camera lenses.

SmallRig HPS99 Handheld Power Stick Kit 5249

SmallRig HPS99 Handheld Power Stick Kit 5249 combines high-efficiency power delivery with a portable design. Featuring 100W fast-charging technology, it fully recharges in just 2.5 hours while providing reliable power for professional photography equipment. Its innovative QD quick release interface allows for instant shoulder strap attachment with a single click, preventing accidental drops, and the side-mount design enables convenient waist carry when not in use. The power stick offers versatile mounting options with a top 1/4"-20 screw and a bottom 1/4"-20 threaded hole for seamless compatibility with various accessories.

Built with premium LG battery cells for consistent output and multiple safety protections, this power stick includes dual USB-C ports (100W + 65W) and a D-Tap port to power multiple devices simultaneously in demanding shooting scenarios. The ergonomic cylindrical design ensures a secure and comfortable grip, while the real-time power display keeps you informed of remaining capacity at a glance. title: SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Canon LP-E6P 5409
desc:
1. Full Decoding Chip: Ensures full compatibility with Canon LP-E6P cameras (including the EOS R5 II) without triggering error prompts, while supporting in-camera battery level displays and charging via original Canon chargers.

2. Extended Battery Life: Each battery offers a true-rated output of 2520mAh, providing longer shooting time for demanding workflows.

3. Dual-Slot Fast Charging: Two independent slots allow simultaneous or individual charging, optimizing efficiency for multi-battery setups.

4. Intelligent LCD Display: Provides real-time monitoring of charging current, charging voltage, charge progression and accumulated power input.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Canon LP-E6P 5409

SmallRig Camera Battery and Charger Kit for Canon LP-E6P 5409 features a full decoding chip, ensuring full compatibility with Canon LP-E6P cameras, including the EOS R5 II. This eliminates pop-up error messages while mirroring OEM battery performance, including accurate in-camera battery level displays and compatibility with original Canon chargers.

Each battery delivers a true-rated output of 2520mAh, providing extended shooting time for demanding workflows. The charger is equipped with two independent slots, allowing for the simultaneous charging of two batteries or a single battery, optimizing efficiency for multi-battery setups. An intelligent LCD display provides real-time monitoring of charging current, charging voltage, charge progression and accumulated power input. Additionally, the charger incorporates both USB-A and USB-A input ports, making it compatible with wall adapters, car chargers, and power banks for versatile charging options.

desc:

2. Compatible with DJI Osmo Action 5 Pro / 4.

3. Snap-on design enables direct attachment without lens removal.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Filter Kit for DJI Osmo Action 5 Pro / 4 5412

SmallRig Filter Kit for DJI Osmo Action 5 Pro / 4 5412 is specifically designed for the DJI Osmo Action 5 Pro and Action 4 cameras. Constructed from high-quality Rainbow high-alumina glass, these filters offer exceptional durability, with excellent impact resistance and scratch protection. This material ensures strong chemical stability for reliable performance in various environments while effectively filtering stray light that can degrade image quality. Each filter features advanced multi-layer coatings on both sides to enhance color accuracy, along with water, oil, and smudge resistance for easy maintenance.

This kit includes a 1/4 black mist filter, an ND16 & CPL filter, a film simulation filter, a star-cross filter, and a silicone lens cover. The 1/4 black mist filter softens highlights for a dreamy, cinematic effect. The ND16 & CPL filter eliminates reflections while ensuring true color reproduction, making it ideal for landscape and architectural photography in bright conditions. The film simulation filter creates analog film tones, perfect for portraits, street photography, and vintage-style imagery. The star-cross filter transforms point light sources into dramatic 6-point starbursts during nighttime scenes. For added convenience and protection, the kit includes a soft silicone lens cover that shields your camera's lens from scratches and dust when not in use.

title: SmallRig Cage Kit for Sony FX2 5589
desc:
1. Unlimited Expansion: Multiple interfaces accommodate handles, mics, lights, monitors, straps, and other accessories. Built-in “HawkLock” NATO rail allows for quick attachment of “HawkLock” accessories such as side handles (ID 4485), top handles (ID 4483), and monitor mounts (ID 4487).

2. Precision Engineering: Provide full access to all camera buttons and ports, ensuring unobstructed EVF tilt.

3. Detachable NATO Rail (Top Plate): Compatible with Sony’s XLR top handle or SmallRig’s rotating top handle (ID 4152) for seamless EVF operation.

4. Secure Dual-Lock Protection: Two-point locking mechanism securely fixes the camera.

5. Integrated Arca-Swiss Quick Release Plate: Effortlessly switch between handheld, tripod, and gimbal setups (compatible with DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro).

6. EVF-Friendly Rotating Top Handle: Features one-touch rotation to quickly reposition the handle, ensuring unobstructed access to the viewfinder during handheld shooting.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage Kit for Sony FX2 5589

SmallRig Cage Kit for Sony FX2 5589 is expertly designed to provide comprehensive protection and rich mounting options, while enhancing the camera’s original EVF operation. This kit includes a cage, a top plate, a rotating top handle, a wrist strap, and an HDMI cable clamp.

Featuring precision cutouts, the cage ensures that the camera’s tiltable EVF, buttons, and ports remain fully accessible for seamless operation. The rotating top handle (ID 4152) features one-touch 360° rotation to quickly reposition the handle, ensuring unobstructed access to the viewfinder during handheld shooting.

The detachable top plate features a NATO rail, accommodating Sony’s XLR top handle or SmallRig’s rotating top handle (ID 4152) without interfering with the EVF. The cage incorporates multiple mounting points, including 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 ARRI locating holes, and a “HawkLock” NATO rail for quick attachment of accessories like side handles (ID 4485) and top handles (ID 4483). A cold shoe mount allows for attaching devices like the DJI Mic 2 or LED lights, while a QD socket at the base accommodates shoulder straps for enhanced portability. The base is also equipped with a magnetic Allen wrench, facilitating quick assembly and disassembly.

The bottom quick release plate, paired with the “HawkLock” H38 Arca-Swiss quick release mount plate (ID 4486), allows for rapid slide-in attachment with an auto-locking mechanism. It also enables seamless transitions between handheld, tripod, and gimbal setups (compatible with DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers). Additionally, an included HDMI cable clamp secures the cable for stable data transmission.

Note: Please open the HDMI port cover before installing the HDMI cable clamp.

Work With

Sony FX2

title: SmallRig x Mikevisuals Tracking POV Kit MD4362
desc:
1. Complete solution to tracking shot, where the subject remains motionless in the shot while the environment rotates around it.

2. Allows equipment at both ends to be freely adjusted by 360˚ and fixed, and the included two 11” rosette arms provide more multi-faceted adjustment.

3. 70-49cm / 27.6-19.5in extension range meets demands for a focal length of a lens in different shooting scenes.

4. Stable and portable, able to be shortened to 37cm for easy storage.

5. Built-in 1/4"-20 threaded hole, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole, and NATO rail for various accessories.

6. Built-in 11” NATO clamp allows quick release and mounting.

9. Either end can bear up to 3kg / 6.6lb.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig x Mikevisuals Tracking POV Kit MD4362

SmallRig x Mikevisuals Tracking POV Kit MD4362 is co-designed by Mikevisuals, who engages in filming movies, tourism, science, and technology, under the SmallRig’s DreamRig Program. It aims to facilitate tracking shots, zooming in and out, etc. The adjustable arm comes with such accessory mounts as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes as well as NATO rails that quickly connect magic arms to help adjust shooting distance. It can be extended by 49-70cm / 19.5-27.6in, and shortened to 37cm for easy storage, with either end load-bearing capacity of 3kg / 6.6lb. Both NATO rails are 20.5cm / 8.1in long, suitable for different focal lengths of lenses, and feature scales for recording distance data. The 11’’ rosette arm, with a load-bearing capacity of 3kg / 6.6lb, also features a 1/4“-20 screw with locating pins and NATO rail.

Note: Please hold the arm stationary with your hand before locking/tightening or loosening the rosette!

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Universal Mobile Phone Cage 2791B

SmallRig Universal Mobile Phone Cage 2791B  is a perfect cage for vlogging, live streaming, and mobile filmmaking. It works perfectly with most mobile phone models  in the market and will be compatible with mobile phones in a width range from 57mm to 90mm, with or without an outer case. It’s a screw tighten instead of the pressure fit, which will provide a more stable clamping effect. It features four  cold shoe mounts for a microphone and a LED light. Multiple 1/4 threaded holes can be used to attach a tripod, a top handle, or  a side handgrip. The 1/4 threaded holes in the front can be used to attach the power bank holder, which enables clamping a power bank to the rig when a sustainable charging solution is required. It supports both horizontal shooting and vertical shooting. Inbuilt rubber pads help absorb shocks and prevent your phone from scratching. Two cable ties are attached, which can be used to sort out the messy data cord and microphone cord during shooting. It’s lightweight and easy to hold.

Note:

1. Please make sure to put and take out the mobile phone gently.

2. Prevent falling or collisions, which may cause damage to your phone.

3. To use the wireless charge function, please take your phone out of the cage.

Work With

Phone in the width range of 57mm-90mm, thickness within 17mm, which means a phone with a case or a magnetic card holder

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Basic Shoulder Rig Kit 2896C

SmallRig Basic Shoulder Rig Kit 2896C is designed to provide a comfortable solution for shoulder shooting. The ergonomic shoulder pad is crafted from a highly elastic, curved sponge, offering an exceptionally comfortable shooting experience. Included in the kit is a Bottom Mount Plate with a Dual 15mm Rod Clamp, enabling compatibility with various camera types. The handles of the rod clamp can be adjusted up to 360° to accommodate different shooting modes. The rod clamp can be easily secured using a single thread, ensuring convenient and swift operation. The Bottom Mount Plate with Dual 15mm Rod Clamp features built-in 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes at the bottom. This allows for seamless integration with a quick-release plate, enabling rapid transitions between shoulder shooting and tripod setups. Additionally, the 1/4"-20 threaded holes at the end of the shoulder pad can be utilized for attaching the V-Mount Battery Mount Plate 2988. This not only expands the power supply solution but also aids in counterbalancing the center of gravity.

SmallRig Swivel and Tilt Adjustable Monitor Mount with ARRI-Style Screw mount 2903B

SmallRig Swivel and Tilt Adjustable Monitor Mount with ARRI-Style Screw Mount 2903 is designed to hold your monitor for easy monitoring. It comes with a bottom ARRI locating screw for accessories with ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes and a top 1/4"-20 screw for monitor, microphone, light, etc. The mount can tilt 180° and swivel 360°. Its tilt axis is quickly tightened via a knob to suit the different weights and features tested durability, with tilt load capacity decreased by no more than 20% after 10,000 tilts, while its pan axis is 360° adjustable via an Allen wrench. Bouncy locating pins on the top help secure Ninja V/ V+, and 1/4"-20 threaded holes at the bottom allow attaching Magic Arm 2070, etc. The thumbscrews have holes for Allen's wrench to facilitate assembly and disassembly.

Note:

SmallRig mini Ball-Head Mounting Support Kit with Removable Cold Shoe (2pcs) 2948B is designed to attach video accessories to the camera, such as microphones, LED lights, monitors, action cameras, etc. It can be mounted onto the camera's hot shoe or the cold shoe of the cage or handle via the bottom cold shoe, with one 1/4"-20 screw on the top to attach accessories and then locked by a knob. description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate (Lite) 3018

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate (Lite) 3018 is designed to provide greater battery life for your camera rig via a Sony NP-F battery. It provides different output ports, including a 12V DC (5.5/2.5mm) output port and a 7.4V DC (5.5/2.1mm) output port. It features an LED indicator that will turn red when the battery level is less than 30 percent. When the indicator flashes, it means the battery level is less than 10 percent, and you need to replace the battery. The plate features a rubber pad on the bottom for a more stable installation. 

Specifications:

Maximum operating power of the whole machine: ≤ less than battery power (based on NP-F battery capacity)

DC5521 7.4V output port: 6.4V-8.4V MAX:2A

DC5525 12V output port: 12V±5% MAX:1.5A

Note:

1. Please do not use it in a damp environment to avoid a short circuit.

2. This product does NOT include charging cables or an NP-F battery.

3. Please note the product has no built-in battery.

4. The 3018 base is compatible with BMPCC 4K/6K, but not compatible with BMPCC 6K Pro.

Work With

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Quick Release Plate with Arca-Swiss for DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / Ronin-S / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro 3061

SmallRig Quick Release Plate with Arca-Swiss for DJI RS 2 / RSC 2/ Ronin-S / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro 3061 is designed to assist users in directly installing an Arca-Swiss standard L bracket and cage on the gimbal, which can switch quickly between tripods and gimbal, thereby saving users time. The quick-release plate is Manfrotto type with a built-in Arca-Swiss base and can be locked quickly by thumbscrew without any tools. It has an adjustable anti-drop design, which can still achieve the anti-drop function when matched with the original Arca plate. It can also be pressed to adapt to the standard Arca-Swiss L bracket and cage on the market. The quick-release plate adopts the original camera plate design and is compatible with the original Arca-Swiss plate, The focus rod mount equipped with DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro, and has a gear rack at the bottom, allowing the quick-release plate for slight adjustment.

title: SmallRig Cage for GoPro Hero 13 / 12 / 11 / 10 / 9 Black 3084C
desc:
1. All-in-one full cage with press-on flap lock for quick disassembly.

2. Two cold shoe mounts, compatible with a microphone and LED video light.

3. Bottom 1/4”-20 threaded hole for a tripod.

4. Foldable GoPro mount for the original GoPro baseplate.

5. Removable quick-release side plate.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for GoPro Hero 13 / 12 / 11 / 10 / 9 Black 3084C

SmallRig Cage for GoPro Hero 13 / 12 / 11 / 10 / 9 Black 3084C is designed to protect the camera and provide accessory mounts. The cage fits the camera so well that it does not block the screen, buttons, and USB-C port. It can be quickly locked by pressing the cover and released by pushing the button and comes with two cold shoe mounts on the top and right side, compatible with a microphone and LED video light. Its hollow-carved cold shoe design does not block the GPS signal. On the bottom, there is a GoPro mount and a 1/4"-20 threaded hole that support the original GoPro accessories (Including the GoPro ND Filter Kit for HERO 13 Black, GoPro Ultra Wide Lens Mod for HERO 13 Black GoPro Macro Lens Mod for HERO 13 Black, and GoPro Contacto Power Door for HERO Action Cameras.) or Tripod 3991, Magic Arm 3873 / 3874 / 3959, Crab-shaped Clamp 3757B / 4102B, Suction Cup Mount 3565 / 4193. The side plate can also be quickly locked by pressing the cover and released by pushing the button for battery switches it gives access to the type-c port; it features magnetic EVA to be easily mounted or removed. You can keep the side plate in place without disassembling the original one for better protection of the camera.

Note:

1. Install the camera first, then install the Max lens mod.

2. Please don’t use the cage in seawater because it has no acid and corrosion resistance.

3. The 3084C is not compatible with the GoPro Magnetic Latch Mount.

4. Please remove the side plate of the cage in advance when using it with the GoPro Contacto Power Door.

5.The cage is not compatible with the GoPro Light Mod.

Work With

GoPro Hero 13 / 12 / 11 / 10 / 9 Black

title: SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate (Advanced Edition) 3168B
desc:
1. Fully compatible with NP-F batteries on the market.

2. Aluminum alloy and gold-plated electrical contacts make it more durable and conductive.

3. Allows to access two devices with DC 7.4V and 12V dual outputMaximum DC and USB-C output: 36W.

4. The USB-C interface supports bi-directional input and output with 36W power.

5. Features automatic wake-up and sleep modes to avoid damage to the camera.

6. Comes with USB-C mode and power indicators for easy viewing of charging and state of charge.

7. Each output port features a short circuit and high current protection to ensure safety during use.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate (Advanced Edition) 3168B

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate (Advanced Edition) 3168B is designed to enable NP-F batteries on the market (including original Sony and third-party batteries) to power BMPCC 4K/6K/6K Pro, Canon R5 C, and various mirrorless cameras and made of aluminum alloy with gold-plated electrical contacts to be more durable and conductive. The plate has a self-locking button for quick and secure battery installation and a 1/4''-20 threaded hole for easy attachment to the cage. There are 36W 7.4V / 12V DC output on its sides and a 36W USB-C port, which can output current or charge an NP-F battery. All ports have short circuit protection and automatic wake-up and sleep functions. In addition, this item features LED lights indicating USB charging and discharging state, battery connection, and battery life.

Button/Indicator Function Display:

Power Display Button: Touch to check the battery level

Working Indicator Light:

USB-C port charging and discharging indicator light: Orange - slow charge/slow discharge, ice blue light - fast charge/fast discharge

battery indicator: Four LEDs, one light flashes when below 10%, one light on when 10%-25%, two lights on when 25%-50%, three lights on when 50%-75%, four lights on when 75%-100%

Specifications:

Maximum operating power of the whole machine: ≤ less than battery power (based on NP-F battery capacity)

Standby power (static reference power): ≤0.2W

DC5521 7.4V output port: 6.4V-8.4V MAX:3A

DC5525 12V output port: 12V±5% MAX:3A
