description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Advanced V-Mount Battery Mount Plate with Adjustable Arm 3204B

SmallRig Advanced V-Mount Battery Mount Plate with Adjustable Arm 3204B can quickly mount onto a 15mm LWS rod system. This item features a standard V-mount, compatible with most V-mount batteries on the market, six 1/4"-20 threaded holes and ten M4 threaded holes on the back, five 1/4"-20 threaded holes on the top and bottom, which support dual rod clamp and many other accessories. It comes with a PD protocol compatible USB-C input/output (65W Max.) port and a QC protocol compatible USB-A output (36W Max.) port for fast charging/discharging; a D-Tap input/output (14.8V) port; and three DC output ports (DC5521 8V x 1 / DC5525 12V x 2). The power indicator light and charging/discharging indicator light indicate working status and fast/slow charging mode; the power on / off button can simultaneously control multiple ports. Besides, the aluminum alloy plate has a comfortable texture, with wonderful heat dissipation performance and durability.

Certification: Quality Inspection Report / FCC / UKCA / CE / RoHS / ISED

Note: Product weight and dimensions may have measurement errors.

Charging / Discharging: USB-C charging

Indicator Light: orange light—slow charging/discharging, ice blue light—fast charging/discharging

Power Indicator Light:

Light on—powered on

light off—powered off

light flashing—working temperature exceeds 65℃

Power on / off Button:

Power on—tap the button; power off—long press the button for 2 seconds

D-Tap, USB-A, and DC output are unavailable after powering off

D-Tap input and USB-C input/output available after powering off

Key Features

1. Do not use it in a damp environment to avoid short circuits.

2. When the indicator light keeps blinking, it means the working temperature exceeds 65℃. Please suspend its use.

3. Please do not drop the product, or use it under high temperatures or when a short circuit occurs.

title: SmallRig Cage with Side Handle for Sony Alpha 7C Camera 3212B
desc:
1. Dedicated full cage for Sony Alpha 7C.

2. Ergonomic silicone side handle for comfort grip.

3. New patented side locking system to prevent twists.

4. Built-in Arca-type plate on the bottom to directly connect DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro gimbal.

5. Built-in 1/4''-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes, and cold shoe mount.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage with Side Handle for Sony Alpha 7C Camera 3212B

SmallRig Cage with Side Handles for Sony Alpha 7C  Camera 3212B  is designed to provide mounting points for accessories like  monitors, microphones, and LED lights in professional video shooting. It comes with a built-in silicone  handle which is ergonomically designed to improve the grip experience. The cage secures to the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom. To further prevent twisting, can also use the right side lock by pushing up the slider and securing the attached small screw to the strap hole of the camera. The cage features multiple 1/4''-20 threaded holes and ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes, allowing to mount Top Handle 2165, Cold Shoe Extension 2879, and Tripod BUT2664 for vlog shooting; the top built-in cold shoe suits microphones, LED lights; the bottom built-in Arca-type quick release plate fits DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro gimbals for quick switch between handheld shooting and stabilizer shooting. Besides, there is a built-in magnetic screwdriver on the bottom of the cage for an easy  user experience. The cage fits seamlessly the camera without blocking the battery door, screen, card slot, and buttons. Fully maintains the original functions of the camera.

Note: To use the side lock, please remove the split ring on the right side of the camera first.

Work With

Sony A7C

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Lightweight Fluid Video Head 3457B

SmallRig Lightweight Fluid Video Head 3457B is specially designed for videoing and photography. It features panoramic panning and is Arca-swiss QR system compatible, allowing being fitted directly with Arca-swiss cages and L brackets. You may adjust its center of gravity back and forth by turning the side knob when using large lenses or mounting the camera horizontally. The head comes with a removable telescopic handle that supports a 360° swivel and one 1/4''-20 threaded hole to fit a magic arm for such devices as a monitor, microphone, image transmitter, or even camera. A built-in spanner is also included for removing or installing quick-release plates.

Note: Heavy cameras and lenses may affect the tilt experience of the head.

title: SmallRig Forevala W60 Wireless Microphone 3487
desc:
1. Dual-channel, low-latency wireless audio transmission, signal range of up to 100m (no obstacles).

2. Long battery life of up to 8 hours on a single charge.

3. Professional and high-performance omnidirectional condenser microphone for high-definition and high-quality recording.

4. Switch between mono and stereo; stereo recording and sound reproduction enhance post-editability.

5. Low cut function: eliminates low-frequency noise below 200Hz to make purer audio output.

6. Gain adjustment: input and output volumes of TX-A and TX-B are partitioned and independently adjustable.

7. Three-screen display: power/signal/volume/low cut function all displayed on screens.

8. Plug and play, smart pairing.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Forevala W60 Wireless Microphone 3487

SmallRig Forevala W60 is a 2.4G wireless microphone with low-latency audio transmission and a must-have for photo and video enthusiasts. Featuring industry-leading DSP for noise and sound processing, it supports such gears as smartphones, cameras, stabilizers, action cameras, computers, recorders, video cameras, recording pens, and tablets to deliver professional quality recordings.

The product is sturdy and smart and comes with RX and TX equipped with a large-capacity Li-polymer battery that allows a battery life of up to 8 hours on a single charge. The stable wireless audio transmission boasts a maximum signal range of 100 meters (no obstacles); switch between mono and stereo, stereo recording and sound reproduction enhance post-editability; input and output volume of TX-A and TX-B are partitioned and independently adjustable; low-frequency noise below 200Hz can be eliminated to make purer audio output. It is plug and play and features smart pairing to be widely used in outdoor live streaming, mukbang, interview recording, video recording, and online teaching, bringing users a professional audio experience.

title: SmallRig V Mount Battery Adapter Plate (Basic Version) with Dual Rod Clamp 3498B
desc:
1. Standard V-Mount, compatible with most V-Mount batteries.

2. Two USB-C input/output ports (65W Max) support PD protocols, allowing for powering cell phones, image transmitters, etc.

3. D-Tap (14.8V x 2) and DC (8V x 1 / 12V x 1) power ports.

4. Quickly mounts onto a 15mm rod system using the dual 15mm rod clamp.

5. Multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching a dual rod clamp and other accessories.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig V Mount Battery Adapter Plate (Basic Version) with Dual Rod Clamp 3498B

SmallRig V Mount Battery Adapter Plate (Basic Version) with Dual Rod Clamp 3498B can be quickly attached to a 15mm rod system. This battery adapter plate features a standard V-Mount lock that is compatible with most V-Mount batteries. It incorporates six 1/4"-20 threaded holes and ten M4 threaded holes on the back, as well as five 1/4"-20 threaded holes on the top and bottom, allowing for the attachment of a dual rod clamp and other accessories.

It is equipped with two USB-C input/output ports (65W Max.) that support PD protocol, and one USB-A output port, that supports QC protocol, for fast charging and discharging. Additionally, it has two D-Tap input/output ports (14.8V) and two DC output ports (DC5521 8V x 1 / DC5525 12V x 1) for versatile power solutions.

The power and charging mode indicator lights show the working status and whether fast or slow charging is in effect. The power on / off button can control multiple ports simultaneously. Furthermore, the adapter plate is constructed from high-strength aluminum alloy, providing robust durability and excellent heat dissipation.

Certifications: FCC、CE、ISED、RoHS

Note:

1. Do not use it in a damp environment to avoid short circuits.

2. When the indicator light keeps flashing, it means the working temperature exceeds 65℃ / 149°F. Please suspend its use.

3. Please do not drop the product, use it under high temperatures or when a short circuit occurs.

Functions Description:

USB-C Charging / Discharging Indicator Light:

Orange Light: Slow charging/discharging

Blue Light: Fast charging/discharging

Power Indicator Light:

Light On: Powered on

Light Off: Powered off

Flashing Light: Working temperature exceeds 60℃ / 140°F

Power On / Off Button:

Power On: Tap the button

Power Off: Press the button for 2 seconds

USB-C, D-Tap, and DC Output Unavailable after Powering Off; D-Tap and USB-C Input Available after Powering Off

Work With

V-Mount Battery

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Drop-in HawkLock Universal mini Quick Release Plate and Clamp 3513C

SmallRig Drop-in HawkLock Universal mini Quick Release Plate and Clamp 3513C comprises a quick-release plate and a baseplate. The quick-release plate supports devices with 1/4"-20 threads, such as cameras, monitors, cages, mounting plates, etc.; the quick-release plate is reserved for 2 optional dowel pins, which can be removed and installed as needed to effectively prevent the devices from deflection.  Its 1/4"-20 threaded holes on the bottom allow attaching devices with 1/4"-20 screws, like tabletop tripods, ball heads, etc. It can buckle vertically and stably into the baseplate, causing no deflection. The whole kit, featuring a maximum dynamic load capacity of 5kg, is easy to lock and unlock for multiple shooting scenes. With built-in silicone pads on the top to prevent deflection and scratches.

Note:

1. In order to prevent accidental contact from causing unlocking, the structure of HawkLock Quick Release is designed to prevent accidental contact, and the wrench also has a certain free movement in the locked state. The situation mentioned above is not a quality problem without affecting normal use.

2. The dowel pins are only compatible with Atomos Ninja V, Ninja V +, and Atomos Shinobi 7; The dowel pins need to be removed when using other brands of monitors.

Work With

Universal

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 7R IV / Alpha 1 with VG-C4EM Battery Grip 3594

SmallRig Cage for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 7R IV / Alpha 1 with VG-C4EM Battery Grip 3594 is designed to protect the camera and provide accessory mounts. Secured by one 1/4''-20 screw at the bottom and two side lock adapters via the shoulder strap holes on each side. The cage maintains access to buttons, card slots, a battery door, and a flip screen. Features 1/4''-20 threaded holes and ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes to attach Top Handle 1638 and 2165 for a low-angle shot, Monitor Mount 2904 and 2903 as well as Side Handle 2093. The cold shoe mount on the top supports microphones or LED lights, and the NATO rail on the left fits NATO Handle 2427 and 3260. Two 1/4''-20 threaded holes on the front bottom support Rod Clamp 1943 for matte box, follow focus, lens support, etc., one of the front threaded holes features a small locating hole that suits Rod Clamp 3276 for follow focus. Arca quick release plate enables quick switch between tripod and handheld shot; the bottom 1/4''-20 threaded holes allow for mounting DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro Quick Release Plate (Upper) with 2 screws for greater stability. Optional Cable Clamp 3000 is separately available for Sony A7 IV and A7S III to protect cable ports and prevent signal disconnection. The cage features multiple rubber pads inside to prevent scratches and comes with a magnetic spanner for easy disassembly and assembly. The package contains four side lock adapters, the black ones for Sony A7 IV, and A7R and silver gray ones for Sony A7S III, A7R IV, and A1.

Note:

1. This product is only compatible with the Sony VG-C4EM Battery Grip.

2. Please remove the camera’s triangle split rings on both sides before installing the cage.

3. The HDMI Cable Clamp 3000 is not compatible with Alpha 1 and Alpha 7R IV cameras and will interfere with the synchro terminal interface when used on the Alpha 7R V camera.

SmallRig Baseplate for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV 3666B

SmallRig Baseplate for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV 3666B aims to improve grip experience and enable tripod and handheld shooting while protecting the bottom of the camera. It attaches to the bottom of the camera via a 1/4" -20 screw and locating pin, with features a built-in silicone pad to prevent scratches and twisting. There is a spindle spanner at the battery door which fits the camera curve and leaves room for a little finger for a comfortable grip; embedded select genuine leather in the baseplate integrates into the camera body. 1/4"-20 threaded holes and cold shoes at the bottom support mini tripods and microphones. Besides, the Arca compatible baseplate allows quick switching between the tripod, stabilizer (DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro), and handheld shooting. An accessible built-in magnetic spanner facilitates disassembly and assembly.

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Heavy-Duty Fluid Head Tripod AD-01 3751B

SmallRig Heavy-Duty Fluid Head Tripod AD-01 3751B is designed for videoing. It features a new generation of head design, an updated quick-release plate with a built-in spanner to allow the camera to be placed quickly. Thanks to the fluid head featuring quick disassembly and oblique installation, placing the camera is less than 1 second and fixed after the front and rear adjustments. The head plate slot has built-in screw holes; the head comes with a hidden 1/4''-20 threaded hole for accessory attachment. Built-in damping and balancing system enable 360° horizontal and +90°/-60° vertical movements and hold equipment of up to 8KG. 3/8"-16 threaded holes in the head base support most tripods, arms, slides, and other accessories with 3/8"-16 screws. This tripod, featuring a built-in bubble level, works with a 75mm bowl base for leveling and easy management of frame level. It includes a 3-section extender to meet different height demands in indoor and outdoor scenarios; and a user-friendly quick-release flip-lock. A dedicated bag protects the tripod and makes it easy to carry around for whatever you want to create.

Note: Comes with a bubble level.

Universal

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Multifunctional Cage for FUJIFILM X-H2 / X-H2S with FT-XH / VG-XH Battery Grip 3933

SmallRig Multifunctional Cage for FUJIFILM X-H2 / X-H2S with FT-XH / VG-XH Battery Grip 3933  is designed to protect the camera and provide varied mounting points. It locks the camera via one 1/4''-20 screw at the bottom and two side lock adapters and also features several rubber cushions to prevent scratches. The cage gives full access to buttons, a card slot, a battery door, and a flip screen. It comes with 1/4 "-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes for Top Handle 2165 & 1638, Side Handle 2093 & 2425, HDMI Cable Clamp 1693 for stable data transmission, Monitor Mount 2903 & 2904 for attaching monitor, Magic Arm 2115; two cold shoe mounts for microphones, LED lights, etc. Its bottom Arca-Swiss quick-release plate supports the Arca-Swiss tripod and  DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro for quick switch among handheld, stabilizer, and tripod shootings. description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cage for FUJIFILM X-H2 / X-H2S 3934B

SmallRig Cage for FUJIFILM X-H2 / X-H2S 3934B is designed to provide protective features for the camera while offering a variety of expansion interfaces. The cage securely fastens the camera using a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and dual side positioning blocks, along with multiple built-in anti-slip silicone pads to prevent scratching. Also, it does not obstruct access to the camera's interfaces, LCD screen, or battery compartment.

The cage features multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes and ARRI locating holes for attaching various accessories, such as side handles (ID 2093, 4015, and 2913), top handles (ID 3765, 4483), magic arms (ID 3959, 3873), monitor mounts (ID 2903B, 4487), Manfrotto baseplates (ID 4638, 3158B), and more. Additionally, it includes a built-in cold shoe mount for attaching accessories like microphones (ID 3468) and LED video lights (ID 4660). The cage also features a built-in NATO rail for attaching accessories like side handles (ID 4485, 3260, 3813), as well as magic arms (ID 3875).

An integrated strap hole allows for attaching wrist straps (ID 3848, 2456), while the QD interface allows for attaching shoulder straps (ID 4118).

Furthermore, there is a built-in Arca-Swiss quick-release plate for direct mounting on Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, enabling quick transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups.

The cage is equipped with an HDMI cable clamp to prevent accidental signal disconnection and ensure stable signal transmission. The integrated dual head wrench at the bottom facilitates quick assembly and disassembly of the cage.

Note: Please remove the positioning blocks on both sides of the cage before installation.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig V-Mount Battery Mount Plate Kit (Advanced)  4063B

SmallRig V-Mount Battery Mount Plate Kit (Advanced) 4063B is a compact, lightweight, convenient, all-in-one mounting solution for  V-Mount batteries. The System includes a V-Mount battery plate, an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate, a V-Mount plate, 15mm / 0.6in rods, and a chest pad. The baseplate can be stretched to fit mirrorless / DSLR cameras of various sizes. Tool-free installation and adjustment make the process quick and time-saving. Beyond any cage with a built-in Arca-type mount, it can directly support cameras and DJI RS series gimbals via the Arca-Swiss quick-release plate. The built-in 1/4"-20 threaded holes and a V-Mount plate provide more power supply solutions by attaching a Battery Adapter Plate Professional Edition (3168), Mounting Clamp for Portable Power Banks BUB2336, etc. A detachable Arca-type plate at the bottom allows quick switching between handheld and tripod shooting. The rotatable structure of the V-Mount battery plate allows 90° backward rotation facilitating screen usage and adopts damping to prevent your device from falling. There is a chest pad at the end of the 15mm / 0.6in rods ensuring more stable handheld shooting. Besides, the folding design of the V-Mount plate increases compactness and portability. The included aluminum-alloy V-Mount Backplate can replace the plastic V-Mount Plate on the back of other V-mount batteries.

Note: Load-bearing capacity: 5kg / 11.0lb

Work With

Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 7C / FX3 / FX30

SmallRig Super Clamp with 360° Ball Head Mount for Action Cameras 4102B

SmallRig Super Clamp with 360° Ball Head Mount for Action Cameras 4102B is made of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy and stainless steel, CNC process anodized and carved to increase sturdiness and durability. It features a skeletal design and shark clamp with stronger clamping force as well as widely compatible 1/4"-20 threaded holes, and 3/8"-16 threaded holes. The clamp, which supports a rod of a minimum diameter of 14mm and a surface with a maximum thickness of 65mm, can quickly attach cameras, monitors, LED video lights, etc. to round pipes, tables, handlebars, tripods, and stabilizer handheld rings. Anti-slip threads help the ball head lock easily and a one-piece connection secures the ball head mount to the clamp to prevent disconnection.  In addition, built-in cushions provide protection and clamping stability. This item also includes a removable action camera adapter, with a special holder and a long rod screw to work with GoPro Hero 11 / 10 / 9 Black Camera Cage 3084C or Camera Cage for DJI Osmo Action 3 4119.

Note:

title: SmallRig 6″ Suction Cup Camera Mount 4114
desc:
1. Industrial-grade suction cup mount, locked by hand pump, safe and reliable.

2. Unique material, excellent  airtightness,  and wear resistance for continuous, stable, and high-strength suction force  to ensure safety.

3. Powerful suction that lasts 24 hours, load capacity of 80 kg.

4. Multiple accessory mounting points, including 1/4"-20 threaded holes and ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 6″ Suction Cup Camera Mount 4114

SmallRig 6″ Suction Cup Camera Mount 4114  consists of a suction cup mount, sucker, hand pump, and dust cover. The suction cup mount, made of robust and wear-resistant NBR, can work at -20° C to 60° C. It is not easily deformed and features excellent airtightness, suitable for clean, dry, and smooth surfaces. With powerful suction force, it has maximum horizontal suction of 80 kg and maximum vertical suction of 60 kg.  The aluminum-alloy suction cup mount comes with accessory mounting points: 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8”-16 threaded holes, and ARRI 3/8"-16 locating holes. It supports attaching magic arms (3873, 3874, 3875, 2906B, 2070B, 2115C, etc.) for enhanced expandability. When not in use, put on the dust cover to avoid dusting for longer service life.

Disclaimer: Please mount it onto recommended surfaces and check at least every four hours.

Note:

1. Suitable for clean, dry, and smooth surfaces, not for rough, wet, uneven, dirty, or fragile surfaces.

2. Please always keep the sucker and filter cotton intact and clean.

3. Please apply it carefully to coated surfaces.

4. When the safety-line indicator shows, it means vacuum loss. Pump the plunger until 100% vacuum pressure.

Key Features

Warnings:

1. The 6″ Suction Cup Camera Mount, when adhering to a still object, has a tested maximum horizontal suction of 80 kg and maximum vertical suction of 60 kg. Please check the suction force every 24 hours.

2. It is recommended, when adhering to a vehicle, the 6″ Suction Cup Camera Mount work with a cable tether and bears no more than 8 kg. Please run the vehicle smoothly at a speed of below 80 km/h and check the suction force every 2 hours.

3. Suitable for dry, flat, glossy, solid surfaces, not for painted surfaces, natural marble, old tiles, breathable wallpaper, diatom mud walls, unpainted wood, frosted glass, and other rough or breathable materials.  

4. Works at -20°C to 60°C.

5. When the safety-line indicator shows, it means vacuum loss. Pump the plunger until 100% vacuum pressure.

6. Please follow the instructions. Products that are damaged due to improper use are not eligible for after-sales service.

Note:  According to the indoor experiment, the vertical load capacity is up to 8kg while using with 14" lever arm. The laboratory data is for reference only, actual product may vary due to product enhancement.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector (22") 4126

SmallRig 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector  is a lightweight and portable lighting accessory essential for photography. It provides gold, silver, white, and black surfaces and a diffusion panel, suitable for lighting objects and portraits. It also comes standard with a black carrying bag for easy storage and transport.  

Applications and Functions:

White reflector: reflects less light to provide a neutral soft reflection.

Silver reflector: bright and mirror-like, offers very high reflective qualities that render a snappy high-contrast look even in darkness.

Gold reflector: like a mirror in sunlight but reflects a very warm quality, just opposite to a white reflector.

Black reflector: blocks out unwanted light.

White diffusion panel: generally placed between the subject and the light source to make the subject look softer.

title: SmallRig Shoulder Rig Kit for Sony FX6 4125B
desc:
1. Ergonomic silicone shoulder pad for a comfortable shoulder shooting experience.

2. Built-in VCT-14 quick-release baseplate for quick switch between shoulder mode and tripod mode.

3. Cage kit protects the camera; V mount battery plate for extra power supply for prolonged operating time.

4. Adjustable extension arm meets different needs.

5. The wooden grip looks fancy and feels comfortable.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Shoulder Rig Kit for Sony FX6 4125B

SmallRig Shoulder Rig Kit for Sony FX6 4125B is designed to provide a comfortable and convenient solution to shoulder shooting. It consists of Cage Kit for Sony FX6 4124, Shoulder Pad Pro 2837B, Extension Arm 1870, Handgrip Rosette Adapter 3403, Left-Side Wooden Grip 1891, LCD Screen Mounting Clamp Adapter 1831, Lens Support 2681, and Aluminum Alloy Rod 1051.

Among these parts, the ergonomic silicone shoulder pad provides a comfortable shooting experience. It features a two-layer quick-release plate on the top, a vertically adjustable 15mm rod clamp at the front for rebalancing the camera and attaching 15mm rods, as well as a VCT-14 quick-release baseplate at the bottom, which works with VCT-14 Quick Release Tripod Plate 2169 to switch between shoulder mode and tripod mode.

The form-fitting cage kit protects Sony FX6, offering solutions to V-mount battery, vertical shooting, and accessory attachment. The extension arm is retractable to meet different needs and for easy storage. With the handgrip rosette adapter, the original SONY FX6 handle can be repositioned for shoulder shooting. Besides, the ergonomic left-side grip, made of rosewood, looks fancy and feels comfortable. The LCD screen mounting clamp adapter, an updated version of the original one of SONY FX6, is more durable and safer to use. The lens support well protects the lens mount while further stabilizing shooting.

Note: Incompatible with VCT-U14 plate.

Work With

Sony FX6

title: SmallRig Camera Cage for Canon EOS R3 3884
desc:
1. All-in-one full cage protects the camera.

2. Locked via one 1/4''-20 screw at the bottom and two side lock adapters on both sides.

3. Bottom and left Arca-Swiss quick release plates for quick switch between horizontal and vertical shooting.

4. Equipped with multiple 1/4''-20 and 3/8''-16 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes, and cold shoe mounts for multi-scene shooting.

5. Bottom Arca-Swiss quick release plate supports DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro stabilizers.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Cage for Canon EOS R3 3884

SmallRig Camera Cage for Canon EOS R3 3884 is designed to provide protection and multiple mounting points. Securing the camera via one 1/4''-20 screw at the bottom and two side lock adapters on both sides; the cage features silicone cushions to prevent scratches and maintains access to buttons, card slots, battery door, and flip screen. It comes with 1/4"-20 threaded holes and 3/8"16 threaded holes for Top Handle 2165, 1638, Side Handle 2093, 2425, Monitor Mount 2903, 2904, Magic Arm 2115; Two cold shoe mounts for the microphone, LED light; The bottom and left Arca-Swiss quick release plates can be easily mounted onto a tripod for horizontal and vertical shooting; The bottom Arca-Swiss quick release plate can be directly mounted onto DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro stabilizers to quickly achieve handheld, tripod, and stabilizer shooting. Its two front 1/4''-20 threaded holes allow attaching Dual 15mm Rod Clamp 942 for such accessories as matte box and lens support, and the front 1/4''-20 threaded locating hole supports 12mm/15mm Single Rod Clamp 3276 for follow focus solution. In addition, a flat-head screwdriver is included for easy assembly and disassembly.

Note:

1. Left mounting points of the cage are not available in vertical shooting on an Arca-Swiss tripod.

2. The flip screen can tilt 50° forward or 50° backward when the cage is installed.

Work With

Canon EOS R3

title: SmallRig RA-D120 Parabolic Softbox 4140
desc:
1.  The latest  generation of quick-release chuck design,  with rods lifted and snapped into place within 15 seconds, saving setup time and effort.

2. Industrial-grade double-lining Oxford cloth with highly-reflective coating makes the light more even and softer while retaining its original CT and CRI.

3. The 16-sided shape of the softbox imparts a wraparound light quality with deep and large falloff; all umbrella ribs, made of military-grade steel, are heat-resistant and durable enough to withstand tens of thousands of presses without deformation.      

4. Umbrella ribs are externally mounted to ensure smooth and even coating on the inner side for less light loss and a brighter and softer lighting effect and to avoid displacement or poking holes.

5. Comes standards with a honeycomb grid (for directional control) and two high-quality diffusions to meet different needs for lighting.

title: SmallRig Rotatable Horizontal-to-Vertical Mount Plate Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 7R IV 4148
desc:
1. Quick switch between horizontal and vertical modes.

2. Gives full access to ports and LCD screen.

3. Arca-type plate and Manfrotto RC2 plate.

4. Quick-release plate supports handle in handheld mode.

5. Baseplate can be used separately for a better grip experience.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Rotatable Horizontal-to-Vertical Mount Plate Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 7R IV 4148

SmallRig Rotatable Horizontal-to-Vertical Mount Plate Kit for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 7R IV 4148 is designed to quickly switch between horizontal and vertical modes without adjusting the lens optical axis. It locks the bottom of the camera via a 1/4"-20 screw and anti-twist pin and maintains full access to the LCD flip screen and ports and features built-in pads that prevent scratches and twisting. Compatible with Arca-type / Manfrotto RC2 tripod, the mounting plate can rotate by 90 degrees by unlocking a knob to switch between horizontal and vertical shooting. It's bottom 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes also support Handle 2093C, etc. to enhance stability in handheld mode. The base plate can be used separately to meet your various needs, with a hinge arm at the battery door fitting the camera body perfectly for a better grip experience. It also comes with a strap slot, a 1/4"-20 threaded hole for the wrist strap, a quick-release plate, etc.; and a magnetic double-head wrench for easy installation and release.

Note:

1. Only supports lens adapter ring of less than 63mm in outer diameter. Please first remove the lens adapter ring support (if any).

2. This product is not compatible with Tamron lenses with USB-C ports, such as：

Tamron 20-40mm f/2.8 Di III VXD（Sony E）

Tamron 28-75mm f/2.8 Di III VXD G2（Sony E）

Tamron 35-150mm f/2-2.8 Di III VXD（Sony E）

Tamron 50-400mm f/4.5-6.3 Di III VC VXD（Sony E）

Not compatible with Sony compact lenses,  such as：

Sony FE 24mm f/2.8 G

Sony FE 40mm f/2.5 G

Work With

Sony Alpha 7R V

Sony Alpha 7R IV

Sony Alpha 7 IV

Sony Alpha 7S III

desc:
1. One-piece full cage protects the camera.

2. Locks the camera via one 1/4 "-20 screw and two side lock adapters.

3. Accessory mounting points: 1/4"-20 threaded hole, 3/8"-16 threaded hole, ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole, HawkLock H18 cold shoe mount, HawkLock H21 NATO rail, QD socket, hand/shoulder strap hole, etc.

4. Built-in HawkLock H21 NATO rails for quick attachment of NATO clamp accessories.

5. Two 1/4"-20 threaded holes on the right side ensure stable vertical shooting.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Canon EOS R6 Mark II 4159B

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Canon EOS R6 Mark II 4159B is designed to provide protection and attach accessories. It locks the camera via one 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom and one side lock adapter on both sides, with rubber pads preventing scratches. The cage maintains access to the camera button, card clot, screen, and battery door and comes with multiple accessory mounts. They include, among others, a 1/4"-20 threaded hole, 3/8"-16 threaded hole, and ARRI 3/8"-16 locating hole that supports Side Handle 2093 & 3814, Top Handle 3765, Monitor Mount 2903 & 2904, Manfrotto Bottom Plate 1280 & 2458, Holder for Portable Power Banks 2336 and mini V Mount Battery Plate 2987. 1/4"-20 locating holes on both sides fit Single Rod Clamp 3598  and Magic Arm 3873, and two 1/4"-20 threaded holes in the horizontal direction on the right side ensure stable vertical shooting. On its top and left side are HawkLock H21 NATO rails for NATO Top Handle 3766, 4438, Monitor Mount 2906B, and Rotating NATO Side Handle 3847, 4485. The cage also features a HawkLock H18 cold shoe mount to attach microphone, LED video light, etc., strap holes for Hand Strap 3848 & 2456, as well as a QD socket, an innovative strap slot for downward hanging for extra lens protection compatible with the Quick Disconnect System for shoulder strap. Another highlight is the HawkLock H38 Arca-Swiss quick-release plate, which supports Arca-type tripods or DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers for a quick switch between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod modes. Besides, there is a double-head wrench for easy disassembly and assembly.

Work With

Canon EOS R6 Mark II

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for Canon EOS R6 Mark II / R5 / R5 C / R6 4160B

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for Canon EOS R6 Mark II / R5 / R5 C / R6 4160B is designed to facilitate switch between horizontal and vertical modes, and to improve grip experience. It locks camera via one 1/4 "-20 screw at the bottom and two locating pins, with rubber pads preventing scratches, and has a hinge arm at the battery door that fits camera curve to enhance grip. There are multiple accessory mounts: an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate for Arca-type tripods or DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro stabilizers, 1/4 "-20 threaded holes at the bottom that support Side Handle 2093 & 3847 for vertical handheld shooting, Quick Release Plate 1280, and strap holes for Hand Strap 3848 & 2456. The plate also features a QD socket to attach the Quick Disconnect System for shoulder strap, 1/4"-20 threaded holes, suitable for Cold Shoe Mount BUC2736 for microphone, as well as a stretchable side plate that allows cables through in vertical shooting and 90-degree rotation of the flip screen with the notch design. Besides, a magnetic wrench is included for easy disassembly and assembly.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Portable Suction Cup Mount Support for Action Cameras SC-1K 4193

SmallRig Suction Cup Camera Mount Kit for Action Cameras SC-1K 4193 is designed for car photography using an action camera. It can adhere to dry, smooth, and clean surfaces and supports any action camera that features a universal mount. For secure, stable, and long-lasting support, the mount comes with a patent double-layer suction cup, which is quickly removed and installed via the one-button press design. With the adjustable dual ball head, you can take shots in different scenarios at any angle as needed. Besides, a special suction cup dust cover is included to prevent dust, thus prolonging its service life.

Note:

1. Suitable for dry, smooth, and clean surfaces.

2. Do not mount onto the coated surface, marble, porous wallpaper, mud walls, unpainted wooden wall, frosted glass, or other rough, and breathable surfaces.

3. Dynamic load: 0.3 kg; static load: 1kg.

4. When using it in a car, please attach a lanyard and drive the car at less than 60km/h, and check the suction force every hour.

5. The suction cup mount is only suitable for non-impact activities. Please do not use it for surfing, skiing, or other impact sports.

6. Not recommended for use with a selfie stick.

7. Operating temperature: -10℃~45°C.

Work With

Action camera with a universal mount

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector with Handles (42") 4131

SmallRig 5-in-1 Collapsible Circular Reflector is a lightweight and portable lighting accessory essential for photography. It provides gold, silver, white, and black surfaces and a diffusion panel, suitable for lighting objects and portraits. It also comes standard with a black carrying bag for easy storage and transport.  

Applications and Functions:

White reflector: reflects less light to provide a neutral soft reflection.

Silver reflector: bright and mirror-like, offers very high reflective qualities that render a snappy high-contrast look even in darkness.

Gold reflector: like a mirror in sunlight but reflects a very warm quality, just opposite to a  white reflector.

Black reflector: blocks out unwanted light.

White diffusion panel: generally placed between the subject and the light source to make the subject look softer.

title: SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX Hydraulic Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit (Origin Series) 4259
desc:
1. The X-Clutch hydraulic technology for instant single-action extension of all legs.

2. Stepless tilt and pan damping alongside the 4-step dynamic counterbalance for precise control.

3. The compact design fits perfectly in standard luggage.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX Hydraulic Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit (Origin Series) 4259

SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX Hydraulic Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit (Origin Series) 4259 is designed for professional outdoor videography, offering swift and convenient operation. Featuring X-Clutch hydraulic technology, squeezing a single clutch allows all legs to rapidly unfold, adjust the angle, and automatically lock in just one second, providing photographers with a seamless experience. The clutch can also be adjusted to 45° and 90° to accommodate various shooting scenarios. Constructed with carbon fiber, both the legs and center column ensure lightweight design while delivering exceptional stability and high load-bearing capacity. Operating altitude ranges from 27cm (10.6in) to 168cm (66.1in), and a compact storage length of 79cm (31.1in). The center column features a quick-lock design for easy height adjustments, with a detachable Allen wrench built into the other side of the hook for convenient camera equipment assembly/disassembly, and the option for low-angle shooting at a minimum height of 27cm (10.6in). The compact design of the tripod allows it to fit in any standard luggage (28").

The kit includes a compact and lightweight hydraulic fluid head featuring an adjustable 4-step counterbalance system. When the gravitational center height is set at 55mm (2.2 inches), the 4-step counterbalance system effectively stabilizes cameras or other equipment (up to 6kg / 13.2lbs) while providing precise control over camera tilt. The fluid head allows seamless, stepless adjustments for tilt and pan damping, catering to filmmakers' varying shooting preferences. The fluid head adopts a new Touch-and-Go quick-release mount plate design which does not require alignment and is more efficient than traditional slide-in plates. The plate is compatible with 501 quick-release plates and DJI RS series quick-release plates, facilitating swift transitions between stabilizers and tripods during filming. The user-friendly detachable telescopic handle enables easy control of the head when attached to either the left or right side, ensuring compatibility with any grip. The fluid head also features three 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching accessories like magic arms, along with a built-in flat head screw for convenient camera installation and removal. The tripod also includes quick-release rubber feet with integrated spikes, allowing for seamless adaptation to various terrains.

Note:

1. Before shooting, make sure the head and tripod locking status are in normal condition.

2. Avoid use in sandy or dusty environments to prevent the risk of damage.

3. After using the short center column, mounted on the center column, need to ensure the locking status.

4. Max payload of head: 6kg / 13.2lb (center column raised, leg angle at 23°, height at 168cm / 66.1in).

5. The weight capacity of the tripod head is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity.

SmallRig Lateral Center Column Tripod CT200 4288

The 4-section legs with lever locks allow you to adjust the working height to up to 185cm in seconds, and the detachable center column can be reversed for low-angle shots. description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate Kit for Canon EOS R5 / R5C and BMPCC 4K / 6K  (Advanced Edition) 4340

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate Kit for Canon EOS R5 / R5C and BMPCC 4K / 6K  (Advanced Edition) 4340 is designed to enable NP-F batteries on the market (including Sony original and third-party batteries) to power BMPCC 4K/6K, Canon R5 C, and various mirrorless cameras, the set can achieve long-lasting power supply. The NP-F Battery Plate is made of aluminum alloy with gold-plated electrical contacts to be more durable and conductive. The plate has a self-locking button for quick and secure battery installation and a 1/4''-20 threaded hole for easy attachment to the cage. There are 36W 7.4V / 12V DC output on its sides and a 36W USB-C port, which can output current or charge an NP-F battery. All ports have short circuit protection and automatic wake-up and sleep functions. In addition, this item features LED lights indicating USB charging and discharging state, battery connection, and battery life.

Certification: FCC、UKCA、CE、ISED、RoHS

NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Specifications:

Maximum operating power of the whole machine: ≤ less than battery power (based on NP-F battery capacity)

Standby power (static reference power): ≤0.2W

DC5521 7.4V output port: 6.4V-8.4V MAX:3A

DC5525 12V output port: 12V±5% MAX:3A

USB-C input/output port charging input: 5V / 3A,9V / 2.7A,12V / 2.1A (MAX:25W)

USB-C input/output port discharge output: 5V / 3A, 9V / 3A 12V / 3A (MAX:36W)

Charging operating temperature: 0℃~40℃

Working humidity range: Relative humidity 20%~90%RH without condensation

Storage temperature: -40℃~70℃

USB-C supports protocols:

Input: PD3.0、QC2.0、QC3.0、SCP、FCP、AFC

Output: PD3.0、QC2.0、QC3.0、SCP、FCP、AFC

LP-E6NH Dummy Battery Specifications:

Input Voltage: 7.6~8.4V

Input Current: 3A

Output Voltage: 7.6~8.4V

Output Current: 2A (Max)

NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Button/Indicator Function Display:

Power Display Button: Touch to check the battery level

Working Indicator Light:

USB-C port charging and discharging indicator light: Orange - slow charge/slow discharge, ice blue light - fast charge/fast discharge

battery indicator: Four LEDs, one light flashes when below 10%, one light on when 10%-25%, two lights on when 25%-50%, three lights on when 50%-75%, four lights on when 75%-100%

Work With

3168B NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate: Sony NP-F battery

LP-E6NH Dummy Battery Power Cable: Canon EOS 5D Mark II / 5D Mark III / 5D Mark IV / 6D / 6DMark II / 7D / 7DMark II / 60D / 60Da / 70D / 80D / 90D / XC10 / XC15 / 5DS / 5DSR / R / R5 / R6 / R5C / R7 / R6 Mark II 和BMPCC 4K / 6K

title: SmallRig RT25 Tube Light 4343
desc:
1. The quick-release design and built-in battery make it a truly cordless light, helping users boost efficiency significantly.

2. Compact and easy to transport for on-the-go convenience.

3. Multiple power supply options for worry-free endurance.

4. Seamlessly designed for ergonomic handheld use, with convenient multi-interface installation and high lighting efficiency.

5. Professional color rendering, precise tuning to replicate natural daylight.

6. Durable construction with meticulous craftsmanship, IP54 dust, and water resistance.

7. Silent cooling system.

8. Ideal for soft portrait lighting.

9. Simulates 2500K-10000K daylight, 36000 RGB colors, 18 common special effects, 8 common color modes, and supports quick switching between 5 preset modes.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig RT25 Tube Light 4343

SmallRig RT25 Tube Light 4343 is the first-generation RGBWW handheld tube light introduced by SmallRig. Thanks to the quick-release design, you can seamlessly connect the tube light, battery grip, and lighting control accessories for wireless lighting on the go, significantly boosting efficiency. When compacted, the tube light is a mere 42cm / 16.5in long, with the handle weighing just 900g / 31.7oz, making it 75% lighter than comparable products. The lightweight design allows for effortless storage in any camera backpack or toolbox, ensuring swift and convenient transportation. The device offers various power supply solutions, including a built-in 45Wh battery handle that delivers up to 2 hours of continuous full-power usage on a single charge. Furthermore, both the light stick and handle are equipped with USB-C ports for PD fast charging, enabling uninterrupted shooting while powering up.

The versatile mounting options allow for handheld lighting using the handle or other setups connected via 1/4" and 3/8" standard ARRI locating pins, NATO rails, and other interfaces for easy installation and flexible lighting configurations. Its distinctive triangular cross-section lanyard design improves ergonomics, minimizing fatigue during prolonged handheld use and preventing accidental drops when placed on a flat surface. Even with a 0.5m/5600K setup and a PC diffuser, the light maintains an illuminance of 2,350lux, excelling in color accuracy with a CRI Ra of 96+ and TLCI of 98+. The color deviation (△UV) ranges between -0.0005 to +0.0005 at 2700K and 5600K, ensuring professional color performance and accurate reproduction of natural daylight.

The tube light boasts an anodized aluminum alloy body and a spacious curved PC diffuser, with the handle crafted from a robust blend of PC and ABS covered with silicone coating to ensure durability, effective heat dissipation, and silent operation. With meticulous craftsmanship, it holds an IP54 rating for dust and water resistance, making it suitable for challenging outdoor shooting conditions and unforeseen situations during night shooting. The soft, uniform light with a broad beam angle is perfect for capturing seamless and elegant moments in portrait photography. Featuring versatile adjustment knobs, dedicated control buttons, and a 0.96" OLED screen, you can precisely and swiftly fine-tune light settings including bi-color light, RGB, special effects, color modes, preset modes to simulate 2500K-10000K daylight, 36000 RGB colors, 18 common special effects, and 8 common color filters. Additionally, it supports quick switching between 5 preset parameters.

The product comes equipped with essential light modifiers, including barn doors (standard with the battery grip version), as well as optional softbox and honeycomb grid attachments. It also features versatile mounting accessories such as standard 3/8" ARRI light stand adapters and connectors (additional accessories will be available soon)and power enhancement accessories like the handle with the built-in battery. For added convenience, it includes a portable storage bag, offering a comprehensive solution for users seeking superior output quality, efficiency, portability, durability, easy installation, precise light control, and reliable performance.

title: SmallRig Suction Cup Mounting Support for Action Cameras 4347
desc:
1. The exclusive dual-material design adopts magnetic pull and silicone suction, increasing the product performance by six times that of peers, and providing firm attachment to the flat iron surface of the car.

2. When shooting with an action camera at high speed, even if the silicone suction cup leaks due to violent vibrations, the magnet can pull the entire bracket with strong magnetic force, effectively avoiding the risk of falling off due to air leakage caused by the leakage of a silicone suction cup.

3. 360°adjustable with 180° adjustable tilt for easy multi-angle shooting.

4. Includes an action camera mount and a mobile phone clamp, enabling shooting with a variety of devices.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Suction Cup Mounting Support for Action Cameras 4347

SmallRig Suction Cup Mounting Support for Action Cameras 4347 is designed for action camera car shooting users. It is only recommended to be used on flat iron surfaces, such as iron doors, railings, kitchenware, sports equipment, etc. The special magnetic silicone all-in-one suction cup, combining magnets with a vacuum sucker, ensures safer, longer-lasting, and more stable shooting. Even in the unlikely case of silicone suction cup leakage due to severe vibration, the magnets can pull the whole mounting support to the surface of an iron car (within the load capacity of 0.35kg / 0.8lb in a dynamic shooting scene with a flat road when maximum speed does not exceed 120km/h or 74mph), effectively avoiding the risk of falling off caused by the leakage of a silicone suction cup. The package includes an all-in-one magnetic suction cup, a rotating adapter, an action camera mount, and a mobile phone clamp. The 1/4"-20 screw on one end allows attaching an action camera, LED video light, etc. It can also be used with a mobile phone clamp to attach mobile phones with a width of 56-86mm / 2.2-3.4in and a thickness of less than 9mm / 0.4in. The included action camera mount supports GoPro Cage 3084C / 3083C, Frame for Insta360 X3 4088B, and DJI Action 4 Cage 4119B. Similar products from SmallRig include 3566, 4193, and other camera mount supports.

Note:

1. The package does not include a safety rope. Please bring your safety rope when using it for car photography at high speed. It is recommended to keep the speed below 120km/h (74mph) and check the suction force before use and every hour.

2. This product can only be used on iron flat surfaces or other magnetic flat surfaces.  To use it on a flat glass surface, it is recommended to buy 3566 and 4193.

3.  It is strictly prohibited to use the Magnetic Suction Cup Mounting Support Kit on the following surfaces: glass (e.g.: car windows, front windshields, etc.), carbon fiber, special alloy metal, painted surfaces,  marble, textured wallpaper, diatom mud walls, unpainted wood, frosted glass, and other rough or textured surfaces.

4. Do not use in the following scenarios: surfing, skiing, or other high-impact sports.

5. Do not use in the following environments: prolonged contact with water, or rain.

6. Do not use it with a mobile phone clamp for dynamic photography.

7. Do not use it with a selfie stick for dynamic photography.

8. Applicable temperature range: -20°C to 60°C / -4 to 140°F.

Packing List

Magnetic Suction Cup x 1

Rotating Adapter x 1

Phone Clamp x 1

Action Camera Mount x 1

title: SmallRig RT25 Handheld Tube Light with Battery Handle Grip 4342
desc:
1. The quick-release design and built-in battery make it a truly cordless light, helping users boost efficiency significantly.

2. Compact and easy to transport for on-the-go convenience.

3. Multiple power supply options for worry-free endurance.

4. Seamlessly designed for ergonomic handheld use, with convenient multi-interface installation and high lighting efficiency.

5. Professional color rendering, precise tuning to replicate natural daylight.

6. Durable construction with meticulous craftsmanship, IP54 dust, and water resistance.

7. Silent cooling system.

8. Ideal for soft portrait lighting.

9. Simulates 2500K-10000K daylight, 36000 RGB colors, 18 common special effects, 8 common color modes, and supports quick switching between 5 preset modes.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig RT25 Handheld Tube Light with Battery Handle Grip 4342

SmallRig RT25 Handheld Tube Light with Battery Handle Grip 4342 is the first-generation RGBWW handheld tube light introduced by SmallRig. Thanks to the quick-release design, you can seamlessly connect the tube light, battery grip, and lighting control accessories for wireless lighting on the go, significantly boosting efficiency. When compacted, the tube light is a mere 42cm / 16.5in long, with the handle weighing just 900g / 31.7oz, making it 75% lighter than comparable products. The lightweight design allows for effortless storage in any camera backpack or toolbox, ensuring swift and convenient transportation. The device offers various power supply solutions, including a built-in 45Wh battery handle that delivers up to 2 hours of continuous full-power usage on a single charge. Furthermore, both the light stick and handle are equipped with USB-C ports for PD fast charging, enabling uninterrupted shooting while powering up.

The versatile mounting options allow for handheld lighting using the handle or other setups connected via 1/4" and 3/8" standard ARRI locating pins, NATO rails, and other interfaces for easy installation and flexible lighting configurations. Its distinctive triangular cross-section lanyard design improves ergonomics, minimizing fatigue during prolonged handheld use and preventing accidental drops when placed on a flat surface. Even with a 0.5m/5600K setup and a PC diffuser, the light maintains an illuminance of 2,350lux, excelling in color accuracy with a CRI Ra of 96+ and TLCI of 98+. The color deviation (△UV) ranges between -0.0005 to +0.0005 at 2700K and 5600K, ensuring professional color performance and accurate reproduction of natural daylight.

The tube light boasts an anodized aluminum alloy body and a spacious curved PC diffuser, with the handle crafted from a robust blend of PC and ABS covered with silicone coating to ensure durability, effective heat dissipation, and silent operation. With meticulous craftsmanship, it holds an IP54 rating for dust and water resistance, making it suitable for challenging outdoor shooting conditions and unforeseen situations during night shooting. The soft, uniform light with a broad beam angle is perfect for capturing seamless and elegant moments in portrait photography. Featuring versatile adjustment knobs, dedicated control buttons, and a 0.96" OLED screen, you can precisely and swiftly fine-tune light settings including bi-color light, RGB, special effects, color modes, preset modes to simulate 2500K-10000K daylight, 36000 RGB colors, 18 common special effects, and 8 common color filters. Additionally, it supports quick switching between 5 preset parameters.

The product comes equipped with essential light modifiers, including barn doors (standard with the battery grip version), as well as optional softbox and honeycomb grid attachments. It also features versatile mounting accessories such as standard 3/8" ARRI light stand adapters and connectors (additional accessories will be available soon)and power enhancement accessories like the handle with the built-in battery. For added convenience, it includes a portable storage bag, offering a comprehensive solution for users seeking superior output quality, efficiency, portability, durability, easy installation, precise light control, and reliable performance.

Usage Scenarios: Ideal for creating visually appealing photos of events, travel, weddings, comic conventions, and fashion shows, as well as for filming self-produced media, interviews, documentaries, music videos, small to medium-sized TV commercials, and live streaming. 

WARNING: High temperatures on the aluminum body during extended use. Handle with care to avoid burns.

It features reverse-folding aluminum alloy legs to be folded down to 42cm for convenient portability, while these three-section legs can also extend and stop via flip locks to meet your needs for height and stability. title: SmallRig LITE Matte Box with Adjustable Clamp 4409
desc:
1. Featuring an adjustable 67.0 - 82.0mm / 2.6 - 3.2in clamp design for better compatibility.

2. Secure a three-point locking system for fast and reliable attachment and detachment.

3. Offers vignette-free performance across focal lengths ≥16mm.

4. Mini, slim design for compact storage space.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig LITE Matte Box with Adjustable Clamp 4409

SmallRig LITE Matte Box with Adjustable Mount 4409 is designed for video and photo enthusiasts. The unique adjustable clamp design of the matte box features a three-point locking system, allowing for quick assembly and disassembly by pressing the push rods on both sides of the clamp and a locking knob on top. With an adjustable clamp range of 67.0 - 82.0mm (2.6 - 3.2in), it offers broad compatibility with popular mirrorless and cinema lenses. With its slim design, it accommodates circular and square filters seamlessly, ensuring no vignetting at focal lengths ≥16mm (for full-frame cameras and lenses), reducing glare effectively in challenging conditions. Additionally, you can meet your diverse filter needs for video and photo shoots by selecting from optional CPL, ND (ID:4799), VND (ID:4649), Black Diffusion Filter Kit (ID:4650), and White Diffusion Filter Kit (ID:4652). Boasting a modular design, this matte box facilitates easy accessory assembly and disassembly in a mere 3 steps. Its sleek, lightweight build not only streamlines the process but also alleviates equipment weight, enhancing comfort during shoots.

Note:

1. Before use, remove the UV filter from the front of the lens.

2. Ensure the top locking knob is securely fastened before use; do not operate without the top knob being locked.

3. This matte box cannot be installed on mirrorless lenses with an outer diameter >88mm or cinema lenses with an outer diameter >85mm.

4. Refer to the user manual for a detailed list of incompatible mirrorless and cinema lenses.

5. Refer to the user manual for instructions on using different filters.

6. The VND does not have clear gear markings.

7. When Combining CPL1 with CPL2/CPL3 to form VND, ensure alignment points are within the VND gear line.

8. CPL filters, ND filters, and Diffusion filters are directional; install products with logos facing outward. CPL filters can also be used individually.

9. Not compatible with 4x4" filters.

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Lightweight Video Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit AD-50 Pro 4420

SmallRig Lightweight Video Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit AD-50 Pro 4420 is designed for professional outdoor videography. Featuring FreeSpeed technology, adopt a one-step locking system - operating a single toggle can lock two sections of legs quickly. Constructed with carbon fiber, both the legs and center column ensure lightweight design while delivering exceptional stability and high load-bearing capacity. Operating Altitude ranges from 31cm (12.2in) to 151cm (59.4in), and a compact storage length of 68cm (26.8in). The center column features an integrated bowl base that enables adjustment for quick leveling, with a detachable Allen wrench built into the video head for convenient camera equipment assembly/disassembly, and the option for low-angle shooting at a minimum height of 31cm (12.2in). The compact design of the tripod allows it to fit in any standard luggage.

The kit includes a compact fluid head, featuring a damping system, that allows you to pan the camera smoothly. When its center of gravity height is put at 50mm, the panning, and pre-set fixed counterbalance system can help precisely control the camera or other rigs weighing up to 4kg for great counterbalance. The video head can carry as much as 6kg (13.2lb). It has a newly designed snap-on quick-release plate mount, a more efficient mounting solution than traditional slide-on ones, which is DJI RS series quick-release plate and 501PL quick-release plate compatible to realize a free switch between stabilizer shooting and tripod shooting. The kit also features 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching accessories like magic arms, along with a built-in flat head screw for convenient camera installation and removal. It weighs only 3.2kg.

Note:

1. Before shooting, make sure the head and tripod locking status are in normal condition.

2. Avoid use in sandy or dusty environments to prevent the risk of damage.

3. After using the short center column, mounted on the center column, need to ensure the locking status.

4. Max payload of head: 6kg / 13.2lb (center column raised, leg angle at 23°, height at 151cm / 59.4in).

5. The weight capacity of the tripod head is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity.

6. Max payload of tripod: 15kg / 33lbs (center column not raised, tripod head detached, leg angle at 23°, height at 119cm / 46.8in).

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Heavy-Duty Video Head DH12 4464

SmallRig Heavy-Duty Video Head DH12 4464 is a professional fluid head to facilitate video shooting. The fluid head features an adjustable 6-step counterbalance system. When the height of the gravitational center is 55mm / 2.2", the 6-step counterbalance system balances the camera or other rigs (up to 8kg / 17.6lb) and accurately controls the camera tilt. The adjustable step-less hydraulic damping system enables swivel and tilt adjustment and provides smooth pan and tilt camera movements. The fluid head DH12 adopts a new Touch-and-Go quick-release mount plate design which does not require alignment and is more efficient than traditional slide-in plates. The head easily switches between Manfrotto and DJI RS quick-release plates. The user-friendly detachable telescopic handle allows rotation attaching it to both left and right sides, making it suitable for any grip. The head also comes with one 1/4"-20 threaded hole to support the magic arm and other accessories and a built-in wrench to help install and release the camera.

Note:

2. Maximum locking force of tilt/pan: 12kg/24lb.

2. Compatible with the traditional cold shoe, NATO clamp, and Arca-Swiss clamp, save money, save worry.

3. A hinged arm at the battery door fits the camera curve and enhances the grip experience.

4. Multiple mounting points: 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes, cold shoe mounts, NATO rail and QD socket support handles, microphones, LED lights, monitors, etc.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 1 / Alpha 7R IV 4481

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Sony Alpha 7R V / Alpha 7 IV / Alpha 7S III / Alpha 1 / Alpha 7R IV 4481 is designed to provide accessory mounts and protect the camera. The patented self-developed quick-release structure (named HawkLock) covers cold shoes, NATO rail, and arca swiss, which is used with HawkLock eco-accessories to realize solid and no false position, one push to load, release to lock and improve the disassembly efficiency. It locks the camera via one bottom locating pin, one 1/4"-20 screw, and one M2.5 screw on the left side. The side lock adapters need to be adjusted in the installation direction to fit different camera types, printed with “A7 IV” is for Alpha 7 IV and Alpha 7R V while printed with “A7S III” is for Alpha 7S III / Alpha 1 / Alpha 7R IV. Built-in all-around protective spacers prevent the camera from being scratched. The cage gives access to interfaces, dials, buttons, or battery doors. There is a spindle spanner in the battery compartment which fits the camera curve and leaves room for a little finger for a comfortable grip. 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes and HawkLock cold shoe mounts support top handle 2165C, side handle 2093, monitor mount 2903, microphones, LED lights, monitors, etc. The bottom QD socket supports the QD shoulder strap. HawkLock Arca-Swiss quick-release plate at the bottom is compatible with DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro,  the quick-release plate (riser plate) of DJI RS 2/RSC 2 stabilizer for stabilizer shooting, and the Arca-Swiss quick release plate 3154. Holes on the sides and bottom of the cage allow attaching such accessories as hand strap PAC2456. Besides, the cage comes with a built-in magnetic spanner that facilitates disassembly and assembly.

Note:

1. After fixing the 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom of the cage, remove the anti-deflection pin from the staging hole in the battery compartment position and secure it to the corresponding position.

2. To use the side lock adapter, please remove the split ring on the left side of the camera first.

2. The bottom of the quick-release adapter features anti-detachment pins and a through groove to firmly lock the adapter, ensuring smooth and safe assembly and effectively preventing installation slippage.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock H18 Quick Release Support with Cold Shoe 4500

SmallRig HawkLock H18 Quick Release Support with Cold Shoe 4500 consists of a quick-release cold shoe adapter and a quick-release cold shoe baseplate. With one click, the anti-detachment column at the bottom of the quick-release adapter, combined with the groove design on the top of the baseplate, locks the cold shoe in place, effectively preventing it from slipping and ensuring smooth and safe assembly. It can hold up to 800g / 28.2oz. The top of the quick-release cold shoe adapter is equipped with silicone pads to avoid scratches on the cold shoe accessories while ensuring a more stable connection and reducing shaking. The adapter can convert ordinary cold shoe accessories (such as LED video light, microphone, etc.) into those featuring quick-release design, making it more efficient and time-saving. The base plate is equipped with spring-loaded locating pins to support SmallRig action camera cages like 4119B, 3084C, 4088B, and various others with locating holes to ensure safety and stability.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig "Night Eagle" Cage for Nikon Z 6III 4521

SmallRig "Night Eagle" Cage for Nikon Z 6III 4521 to provide protective housing and versatile expansion options for a camera. The cage features a modern design with sleek curves, subtle gold highlights, and a new gunmetal brown color scheme. It adopts a three-point locking system that secures Nikon Z 6III via a bottom 1/4 "-20 screw and two M2.5 screws on both sides, while built-in silicone pads prevent the camera from scratches. It provides unobstructed access to buttons, card slots, flip screens, and battery compartments. The detachable cold shoe mount features anti-deflection positioning pins at the bottom. It can be attached to the sides and top of the cage, allowing for versatile expansion with microphones, lights, and other accessories. The cage features various expansion interfaces, such as 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes and ARRI locating holes, compatible with side handles (ID 2093, 4015), top handles (ID 3765), monitor mounts (ID 2903, 2904), tripods (ID 3989, 4465), power bank holders (ID 2336) and mini V-mount battery plates (ID 2987). Incorporated 1/4"-20 locating holes on the sides allow for the attachment of accessories such as the single rod clamp (ID 3598), magic arm (ID 3873), and side handle (ID 4346). Featuring a built-in NATO rail on the left for rapid attachment and detachment of side handles (ID 3847, 4017). The cage also features built-in wrist strap slots for use with wrist straps (ID 3848, 2456), as well as an integrated QD interface compatible with a shoulder strap (ID 4118). Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the bottom is compatible with Arca-type tripod and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro/ RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals, which allows for easy transitions between gimbals, handheld and tripod setups. Additionally, a dual-head flat wrench on the base simplifies assembly and disassembly.

Note: Please remove the D-rings on the sides of the camera before installing this cage.

title: SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for Nikon Z 6III 4523
desc:
1.  Dual Arca-Swiss design with quick release plates on both the base and side of the L-Shape Mount Plate, enabling smooth transition between landscape and portrait orientations on tripods.

2. Three-point locking system ensures stability and prevents twisting by securing the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the base, a locating block, and the left shoulder strap ring.

3. The locating block features a cold shoe mount to maintain stability with no side plate deformation while vertical shooting.

4. The side plate extends by 22.5mm for convenient cable routing in portrait orientation.

5. Integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the base supports Arca-type tripods or DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals.

6. Versatile built-in interfaces include 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, QD mounts, and wrist/shoulder strap holes for diverse shooting scenarios.

Notice: This item is not sold in the U.S.A.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for Nikon Z 6III 4523

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for Nikon Z 6III 4523 is designed to facilitate a quick transition between landscape and portrait orientations, enhancing both shooting versatility and camera grip. Three-point locking system ensures stability and prevents twisting by securing the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the base, a locating block, and the left shoulder strap ring, while integrated pads prevent the camera from scratching. The locating block with the built-in cold shoe mount provides support to stabilize the cage and prevent distortion after extending the side plate in portrait mode. It is also compatible with accessories with cold shoe mounts, such as microphones (ID 3487), LED video lights (ID 3286B), image transmission systems, flashlights, etc., providing a lightweight solution to photography or shooting. The side plate can be extended by 22.5mm (0.9in) for convenient cable routing in portrait orientation. Integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the base supports Arca-type tripod (ID 4353, 4060) or DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbals. The bottom features built-in 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes, allowing seamless compatibility with side handles (ID 2093, 3847) for handheld vertical shooting solutions, as well as the tripods (ID 3989, 3751). The bottom is equipped with a strap hole, compatible with wrist/shoulder straps (ID 3848, 2456). A built-in QD interface supports shoulder straps (ID 4118). description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Gimbal Control Wheels for DJI RS Series 4525

SmallRig Gimbal Control Wheels for DJI RS Series 4525 is engineered to enhance precision control for DJI RS2, RS3 Pro, RS4, and RS4 Pro stabilizers. Weighing only 2.76kg / 6.06lb, it’s portable and perfect for on-the-go shooting. The control wheel is equipped with a user-friendly panel featuring knobs for speed, smoothness, and damping adjustments, as well as direction control levers and a TRP axis adjustment. The damping knobs allow users to fine-tune the damping level of the control wheels to suit various shooting scenarios. The device supports dual power supply options: NP-F and USB-C. Additionally, multiple expansion interfaces on top enable the attachment of monitor mounts (ID 2903B) and magic arms (ID 4194), facilitating seamless integration with monitors and transmitters for real-time monitoring.

Note:

1. Ensure the product remains dry and avoid exposure to water or liquids.

SmallRig “Retro” Cage for FUJIFILM X100VI 4557

The retro-style cage mounts to the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the bottom and one side lock on the left, and the silicone pads prevent scratches. It also comes with a shutter release button to ensure a soft and comfortable finger touch.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Horizontal-to-Vertical Mount Plate Kit for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 4570

SmallRig Horizontal-to-Vertical Mount Plate Kit for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 4570 is designed to quickly switch between horizontal and vertical modes without adjusting the lens's optical axis. It locks the bottom of the camera via a 1/4"-20 screw and anti-twist pin and maintains full access to the LCD flip screen and ports and features built-in pads that prevent scratches and twisting. Compatible with Arca-type / Manfrotto RC2 tripod, the mounting plate can rotate by 90 degrees by unlocking a knob to switch between horizontal and vertical shooting. It's bottom 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes also support Handle 2093C, etc. to enhance stability in handheld mode. The base plate can be used separately to meet your various needs, with a hinge arm at the battery door fitting the camera body perfectly for a better grip experience. It also comes with a strap slot, a 1/4"-20 threaded hole for the wrist strap, a quick-release plate, etc.; and a magnetic flat-head screwdriver for easy installation and release.

Note:

1. Only supports lens adapter ring of less than 63mm in outer diameter. Please first remove the lens adapter ring support (if any).

desc:

4. Extended minimum focus distance facilitates capturing images of insects.

5. The lens features multiple high-definition glass elements for clear, sharp image quality.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 75mm Macro Lens for Mobile Phone (T-mount) 4588

SmallRig 75mm Macro Lens for Mobile Phone (T-mount) 4588 is designed to elevate your mobile photography by seamlessly working with your phone's main camera to deliver stunning macro photos with enhanced color reproduction and image clarity surpassing standard lenses. Experience high-quality, shallow depth-of-field images with minimal distortion, rivaling professional DSLR results. Extend your shooting capabilities with an increased minimum focus distance to facilitate capturing dynamic subjects like insects.  Attach this external lens to your phone's telephoto lens for super macro shots, revealing intricate details and creating breathtaking close-up images.

Precautions:

1. Not compatible with mobile phone ultra-wide-angle lenses.

2. Handle the lens carefully to prevent scratches that may affect image quality.

3. Only compatible with devices with T-mount.

4. Keep away from strong acidic liquids.

5. Please gently adjust the lens clip position if slight vignetting occurs.

2. When used on the main camera of the latest flagship models from Oppo Find X6/X7, Vivo X100Pro/Ultra, Xiaomi 14 Ultra, and SamsungS23-S24 Ultra, slight vignetting may occur.

title: SmallRig RC 220B Pro COB LED Video Light (EU) 4621
desc:
1. Modular Body Design (Three Patents: V Mount Adapter - Utility Model; Combination of Light and Adapter - Utility Model; Overall Body - Design Patent)

The adapter and light body are connected via a V mount quick release mechanism, revolutionizing traditional connection methods for enhanced convenience and efficiency (swift attachment and convenient storage; the adapter features an integrated gallium nitride chip for reduced size, making it 37.5% shorter in length compared to the previous generation;  4% increase in conversion efficiency).

2. Multiple Power Supply Options

It supports adapters, V mount batteries, and NP-F970 (requires NPF adapter), providing three versatile power supply options, enabling flexibility and unrestricted usage in various settings.

3. Ultra-High Brightness

Customized optical lens design results in a 10% decrease in power consumption compared to the previous generation while with the same brightness. Incorporating Three Times Optics for high brightness, uniform light distribution, and a high color rendering index of 95+.

4. Low Color Deviation

Incorporates a new COB light source ensuring consistent color temperature throughout (DUV value of ±0.0015), minimizing color deviation within the effective color temperature range.

5. Damping Design

Features support column damping design to facilitate gradual descent of the light.

6. Diverse Control Options

It supports four control methods: manual control on the light body via app, control panel, and DMX.

(Adjustable locking handle; umbrella mount hole; ultra-quiet operation with 28dB noise level at a 1-meter distance; all-metal support components; 6-meter power cord for extended reach; portable storage bag; versatile Bowens mount, offering a wide range of compatibility with different accessories)
description:

SmallRig RC 220B Pro COB LED Video Light (EU) 4621

SmallRig RC 220 Pro series represents a new generation of COB lighting products built upon the foundation of the RC 220. Featuring a creative modular body design and supporting multiple power options including V mount batteries, this product is equipped with customized optical lenses coupled with a new light source, promising an unparalleled user experience. 

Target Audience and Scenarios:
