title: SmallRig RF 10C Portable Focusable LED Video Light 4634
desc:
1. Crafted with ABS and aluminum alloy for a lightweight and compact design.

2. Equipped with four-color LED beads (sunset orange, blue, white, and red) to create a variety of color effects.

3. Adjustable brightness for customized lighting.

4. Comes with over 20 light filters to produce a multitude of effects and elevate the visual appeal.

5. Front push-pull structure convex mirror allows for beam size adjustment (adjustable angle approximately 10°-60°).

6. Features smooth zoom adjustment with excellent damping for seamless control over the aperture range.

7. Anti-misoperation design necessitates the knob rotation to activate the light.

8. Smaller product diameter enhances the grip experience.

9. Features multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes for smooth accessory mounting.

10. Approximately three hours of full-power continuous lighting for uninterrupted shooting.

11. Perfect for backlighting (weddings, live streaming) and background lighting (live streaming, content creation) during mobile phone shooting.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig RF 10C Portable Focusable LED Video Light 4634

SmallRig RF 10C Portable Focusable LED Video Light 4634 is an integral component of SmallRig's portable lighting ecosystem. Crafted from aluminum alloy in a sleek dark color scheme, this compact and lightweight video light is both stylish and practical, fitting easily into any photography backpack. Featuring four-color LED lamp beads (sunset orange, blue, white, and red), with a maximum power of 10W and a CRI Ra≥96, TLCI≥98, illuminance reaches 1,570lux@0.5m / 5600K, this high-quality light source ensures professional color rendering and brightness adjustment to meet various shooting requirements. Equipped with 20+ light filters, it supports a variety of atmospheric projection effects, enhancing your lighting setup for more creative possibilities. The convex mirror's front push-pull design facilitates beam size adjustment, providing the capability for precise focusing in a smaller range (adjustable focus angle of approximately 10°-60°). The zoom adjustment offers smooth control and excellent damping for seamless aperture range adjustments. With a new anti-misoperation feature, the light requires button rotation to power on, effectively averting inadvertent activation that could result in unnecessary power consumption. With a mere 4.3cm (1.7in) diameter, the handle offers a comfortable and ergonomic grip. Featuring three 1/4"-20 threaded holes on the side and rear, this light enables versatile lighting configurations, catering to various shooting scenarios. Equipped with a built-in 27.75Wh lithium battery that supports USB-C charging, this light provides approximately 3 hours of continuous full-power lighting, ensuring uninterrupted support for your shooting needs.

Application Scenes: Backlighting and background light for smartphone video shooting (weddings, live streaming, content creation).

Note: Power on by rotating this button half a turn within a second.

Warning: During prolonged operation, especially under intensive use, the device may generate high temperatures. Please handle this with care to prevent accidents.

Work With

1. Compatible with accessories featuring a 1/4"-20 threaded adapter.

2. Compatible with RA-S200 Light Stand.

title: SmallRig Carbon Fiber Tripod FT-S303 4645
desc:
1. FreeSpeed-Twist Quick-tightening & Quick Adjustment.

2. Lightweight and sturdy carbon fiber legs with a large load capacity.

3. Minimalist style and compact.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Carbon Fiber Tripod FT-S303 4645

SmallRig Carbon Fiber Tripod FT-S303 4645 is a carbon fiber tripod designed for professional outdoor videography. The legs feature a FreeSpeed-Twist quick-tightening design, allowing for easy and efficient setup by tightening double knobs to lock all three sections. Operating Altitude ranges from 17cm (6.7in) to 140cm (55.1in), and a compact storage length of 64cm (25.2in). The use of a 30mm diameter for the legs ensures a lightweight design without compromising stability and load-bearing capacity. This tripod, featuring a built-in bubble level, works with a 65mm bowl base for leveling and easy management of frame level. The tripod also features 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes for attaching accessories like magic arms, along with a built-in flat head screw for convenient camera installation and removal. It weighs only 2.1kg (4.6 lbs).

Note:

1. Before shooting, make sure the tripod locking status is in normal condition.

2. Avoid use in sandy or dusty environments to prevent the risk of damage.

3. The weight capacity of the tripod is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity.

4. Max payload of tripod: 15kg / 33lbs ( Leg angle at 23°, height at 140cm / 55.1in).

Work With

65mm Flat Base, 65mm Bowl Base

title: SmallRig Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit FT-S303 4643
desc:
1. FreeSpeed-Twist Quick-tightening & Quick Adjustment.

2. Lightweight and sturdy carbon fiber legs with a large load capacity.

3. Minimalist style and compact.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit FT-S303 4643

SmallRig Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit FT-S303 4643 is a carbon fiber tripod designed for professional outdoor videography. The legs feature a FreeSpeed-Twist quick-tightening design, allowing for easy and efficient setup by tightening double knobs to lock all three sections. Operating Altitude ranges from 27cm (10.6in) to 150cm (59.0in), and a compact storage length of 74cm (29.1in). The use of a 30mm diameter for the legs ensures a lightweight design without compromising stability and load-bearing capacity. This tripod, featuring a built-in bubble level, works with a 65mm bowl base for leveling and easy management of frame level. The kit includes a compact fluid head, featuring a damping system, that allows you to pan the camera smoothly. When its center of gravity height is put at 50mm, the panning, and pre-set fixed counterbalance system can help precisely control the camera or other rigs weighing up to 4kg for great counterbalance. The video head can carry as much as 6kg (13.2lb). It has a newly designed snap-on quick-release plate mount, a more efficient mounting solution than traditional slide-on ones, which is DJI RS series quick-release plate and 501PL quick-release plate compatible to realize a free switch between stabilizer shooting and tripod shooting. The kit also features 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes for attaching accessories like magic arms, along with a built-in flat head screw for convenient camera installation and removal. It weighs only 2.9kg (6.4 lbs).

Note:

1. Before shooting, make sure the head and tripod locking status are in normal condition.

2. Avoid use in sandy or dusty environments to prevent the risk of damage.

3. Max payload of head: 6kg / 13.2lb (leg angle at 23°, height at 150cm / 59.0in).

4. The weight capacity of the tripod head is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity.

5. Max payload of tripod: 15kg / 33lbs ( Tripod head detached, leg angle at 23°, height at 140cm / 55.1in).

Work With

501PL Quick Release Plate

DJI RS Series Quick Release Plate

SmallRig Filter Support 4654

SmallRig Filter Support 4654 is designed for landscape photography enthusiasts using 100mm filters in conjunction with the Matte Boxes with Adjustable Clamps (ID: 4409/4411/4412). Aligning with the adjustable clamp, the filter Support securely locks with a single press, allowing for easy disassembly by pushing the top slider. title: SmallRig Vibe P48 Detachable Mobile Phone LED Video Light (Black) 4656
desc:
1. Instant attachment and detachment with MagSafe.

2. Mini dual-axis head enables 360° to fill light coverage.

3. Compact design akin to a powder compact for effortless portability.

4. Features a built-in glass mirror for convenience.

5. Bi-color LED light featuring soft light and eye-catching effects, enabling skin and eye beautification.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Vibe P48 Detachable Mobile Phone LED Video Light (Black) 4656

SmallRig Vibe P48 Detachable Mobile Phone LED Video Light (Black) 4656 is the first SmallRig detachable MagSafe-compatible fill light. It offers seamless quick attachment and detachment to Apple phones through MagSafe. Alternatively, it can be swiftly installed on Android phones using the included metal ring sticker.

Featuring a built-in mini dual-axis head, this light enables 360° pan and 270° tilt adjustments, ensuring complete 360° fill light coverage. Compact and lightweight, it's akin to a women's powder compact, making it effortlessly portable. The built-in glass mirror instantly transforms the unit into a handy makeup mirror!

Users can easily customize their lighting with five adjustable brightness levels and four color temperature options (warm yellow / yellow / white / cold white). This bi-color temperature high-quality light source guarantees a high color rendering index and faithful color reproduction. The broad soft light paired with eye-catching effects delivers even light, resulting in a beautification effect on the skin and eyes.

Equipped with an 850mAh polymer lithium battery, it supports USB-C charging and provides up to 90 minutes of continuous use at full power. This product is a one-stop solution that meets the efficiency, lighting effects, portability, and battery life needs of hobbyist photographers, personal bloggers, and mobile live streamers.

Application Scenarios: Tailored to facilitate content creation, including tabletop figurine photography, half-body selfies, short videos, vlogs, and live streaming.

Note: This product can not be used while charging.

Work With

iPhone 12, iPhone 13, iPhone 14, iPhone 15  and 15 Pro, and 15 Pro Max

Compatible with Android phones (through metal ring sticker)

title: SmallRig Vibe P96 Pro mini LED Video Light (Black) 4660
desc:
1. User-friendly interface with an embedded color screen for easy single-handed brightness adjustment.

2. Multiple mounting options for enhanced efficiency and flexible lighting setups.

3. Professional color rendering performance to illuminate inspiration, delivering exceptional lighting.

4. 1.2 hours of battery life at full power, up to 3 hours for regular shooting.

5. High-strength materials, including ABS, PC, and textured anodized aluminum alloy, ensure sturdiness and durability.

6. Suitable for flat-lay photo and video content creation, including tabletop and figurine photography, portraits, short videos, vlogs, and store exploration videos.

7. Simulates 2500K-6500K daylight and offers 5 special effects.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Vibe P96 Pro mini LED Video Light (Black) 4660

SmallRig Vibe P96 Pro mini LED Video Light (Black) 4660 is the second-generation product in SmallRig's Vibe LED Light series. Inheriting the iconic ring-shaped metal step-less knob design, it now features an embedded LCD color screen for a clear display of parameters such as color temperature and brightness, allowing for easy single-handed adjustment. The light features a quick-release cold shoe base that enables seamless switching between various lighting setups like top-mount, handheld, or desktop stand, significantly enhancing flexibility and efficiency. Premium 5W Bi-Color Light Source with CRI > 95 and TLCI > 98, delivering 1160Lux @ 0.3m/5600K. Equipped with an integrated rectangular soft light panel for a seamless transition between horizontal and vertical soft lighting setups. Featuring a range of built-in special effects options, this light excels in professional color rendering, igniting creativity with its brilliant illumination. Built-in 1500mAh lithium polymer battery supports USB-C charging, providing up to 1.2 hours at full power and 3 hours for regular shooting. Equipped with various mounting options including 1/4"-20 threaded holes and a cold shoe mount, it provides convenient and flexible lighting configurations. The light body features a high-strength ABS frame, anodized aluminum alloy knobs, and an ABS/PC softbox, ensuring durability. The soft light panel provides uniform and wide light dispersion, capturing smooth and silky soft light moments for portrait photography effortlessly. With built-in cool/warm light and special effects modes, it can simulate 2500K-6500K daylight and five special effects (lightning, TV, fireworks, candlelight, pulse). This product meets all user needs for control experience, disassembly efficiency, light source performance, battery life, installation efficiency, light control accuracy, and quality stability in one convenient package.

Usage: Lightweight solution for photo and video content creation,  covering tabletop or small-space flat-lay shoots like desk photography, figurine photography, and portraits, as well as video content production (short videos, vlogs, store exploration, live streaming).

Warning: The device's body temperature may elevate during prolonged use, particularly in continuous operation. Exercise caution when handling to prevent accidents.

Work With

Compatible with the upcoming P96Pro/P108Pro silicone softbox

Compatible with accessories featuring a 1/4"-20 threaded adapter

desc:
1. Integrated bowl base for quick leveling.

2. Easily transforms into a monopod.

3. Telescopic handle for easy storage.

4. Quick angle adjustment.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig FreeBlazer Aluminum Alloy Video Tripod CT190 4319

SmallRig FreeBlazer Aluminum Alloy Video Tripod CT190 4319 is delicately designed for videoing, live streaming, vlogging, etc., particularly in outdoor scenarios. It features reverse-folding Aluminum alloy legs to be folded down to 45cm and a center column to increase stability. The 4-section legs with knob locks allow you to adjust the working height to up to 184cm in seconds, and the detachable center column can be reversed for low-angle shots. By disassembling one of the legs and attaching it to the head, you can turn the tripod into a monopod. There is a 3-stop (23° / 55° / 79°) knob for quick angle adjustment to meet your needs. As for Video Head 4170 on the top, it comes with an integrated bowl base that enables 10 / -10° adjustment for quick leveling; a detachable telescopic handle, compatible either on the left or right side, for easier storage and more portability; and a built-in wrench for quick installation or removal of the camera. It also swivels 360° and tilts 90° / -55° to take steady shots from different angles. Besides, this tripod can support accessories like a magic arm via the two 1/4"-20 threaded holes. It weighs only 1.8kg and bears as much as 4kg, making it a good companion for shooting outdoors.

Note:

1. Avoid using it in a sandy and dusty environment, otherwise there is a risk of damage.

2. Load capacity: 4kg.

3. 37mm head base.

SmallRig Lightweight Video Tripod Kit AD-50 Lite 4684

SmallRig Lightweight Video Tripod Kit AD-50 Lite 4684 is a lightweight video tripod kit to facilitate video shooting. The tripod comes with an anti-deflection 1/4"-20 threaded hole for the expansion of external devices such as a magic arm, microphone, monitor, or image transmitter.

title: SmallRig Power Banks Mount Plate Kit for Mirrorless Cameras 4695
desc:
1. Complete power supply solution for power banks, lightweight, compact, and easy to store.

2. The back-mounted design balances the center of gravity of the lens and saves energy for handheld shooting.

3. 270° angle adjustment for unobstructed flip screen and viewfinder access.

4. Dual Arca-Swiss design, to cater to more scenarios.

5. Strong compatibility, compatible with most mirrorless cameras and power banks.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Power Banks Mount Plate Kit for Mirrorless Cameras 4695

SmallRig Power Banks Mount Plate Kit for Mirrorless Cameras 4695 is designed to provide compact, lightweight and fast all-in-one power banks supply solution for mirrorless cameras users.The Mount Plate adopts back-mounted design, effectively balancing the center of gravity of the lens, handheld shooting more energy; foldable design, portable and easy to store. The Mount Plate built-in Arca-Swiss clamp, the cages that built-in Arca-Swiss plate can be slid directly into the installation. The Mount Plate has a built-in Arca-Swiss quick release plate at the bottom, which can be quickly mounted to an Arca-Swiss tripod for quick switching between handheld and tripod; the Arca quick release plate has a built-in anti-drop pin, which effectively prevents the device from falling. The Mount Plate can be rotated by about 270°, which is convenient for using the LCD screen and viewfinder; the pivot position adopts a damping design to prevent the equipment from falling down suddenly and protect the equipment; the rotary locking knob adopts a pull-out design, which is both compact and easy to use. All adjustment and locking parts of the Mount Plate do not require tools, fast and time-saving. The Power Banks Holder width adjustable 60~90mm, compatible with most of the power banks; According to the use of the need, the Power Banks Holder can be adjusted 360 ° rotation, to ensure that different power banks can be used compactly. The Mount Plate has built-in 1/4“-20 threaded holes and 3/8”-16 threaded hole, which can be mounted with accessories such as magic arms and quick-release plates. Comes with a built-in anti-drop pin Arca-Swiss quick release plate, can be used without cage.

Note:

1. When used with the Canon EOS R5C, the Mount Plate cannot be used in a vertical (90°) position.

2. When used with the SmallRig Sony FX3 cages (without the included Arca-Swiss quick-release plate), the Mount Plate cannot be used in the vertical (90°) position.

Work With

Compatible with most mirrorless cameras

Compatible with power banks with a width of 60~90mm and a thickness of ≤40mm

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Heavy-Duty Fluid Head Tripod Kit AD-01S 4686

SmallRig Heavy-Duty Fluid Head Tripod Kit AD-01S 4686, is a video tripod kit to facilitate video shooting. The tripod has adjustable legs, quickly retracted and extended via flip locks, with a height ranging from 84 cm to 187cm and a folded length of 88cm. The video head has an adjustable step-less damping system on TILT and a fixed counterbalance system to provide smooth pan and tilt camera movements; The video head load capacity is 6kg (13.2lb). When its center of gravity height is put at 55mm, the panning, and pre-set counterbalance system can help precisely control the camera or other rigs weighing up to 4kg for great counterbalance. It has a newly designed snap-on quick-release plate mount, a more efficient mounting solution than traditional slide-on ones, which is DJI RS Series quick-release plate and 501PL quick-release plate compatible to realize a free switch between stabilizer shooting and tripod shooting. There is a pan bar that suits both left-handed and right-handed users. The video head also comes with two anti-deflection 1/4"-20 threaded holes to support the magic arm and other accessories and a built-in wrench to help install and release the camera. The tripod is equipped with an anti-dislodgement foot spiked design, and the spiked feet mode can be switched through the rotating foot pads, which can meet the needs of different scenarios. Other features include aluminum alloy tripod legs, and a customized carrying bag for better storage, protection, and carrying around.

Note:

1. Not sand dust resistant.

2. Before shooting, make sure the head and tripod locking status are in normal condition.

3. Video head max load capacity: 6kg (13.2lb).

4. The weight capacity of the tripod head is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity.

5. Tripod leg max load capacity: 15kg (33lb).

Work With

Manfrotto 501PL Quick Release Plate / DJI RS Series Quick Release Plate

75mm / 2.95in Bowl Adapter

title: SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate Kit for Mirrorless Cameras 4696
desc:
1. Complete power supply solution for NP-F batteries, lightweight, compact, and easy to store.

2. Back-mounted design balances the center of gravity of the lens and saves energy for handheld shooting.

3. Rotatable design for easy access to LCD screen and viewfinder.

4. Dual Arca-Swiss design, to cater to more scenarios.

5. Built-in dual DC output interface, convenient for multiple equipment power supply.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate Kit for Mirrorless Cameras 4696

SmallRig NP-F Battery Adapter Mount Plate Kit for Mirrorless Cameras 4696 is designed to provide a compact, lightweight, and fast all-in-one NP-F battery supply solution for mirrorless camera users. The Mount Plate adopts a back-mounted design, effectively balancing the center of gravity of the lens, handheld shooting more energy; foldable design, portable, and easy to store. The Mount Plate built-in Arca-Swiss clamp, and the cages that built-in Arca-Swiss plate can be slid directly into the installation. The Mount Plate has a built-in Arca-Swiss quick-release plate at the bottom, which can be quickly mounted to an Arca-Swiss tripod for quick switching between handheld and tripod; the Arca quick-release plate has a built-in anti-drop pin, which effectively prevents the device from falling. The Mount Plate can be rotated, which is convenient for using the LCD screen and viewfinder; the pivot position adopts a damping design to prevent the equipment from falling down suddenly and protect the equipment; the rotary locking knob adopts a pull-out design, which is both compact and easy to use. All adjustment and locking parts of the Mount Plate do not require tools, fast and time-saving. The Mount Plate has built-in 1/4“-20 threaded holes and 3/8”-16 threaded holes, which can be mounted with accessories such as magic arms and quick-release plates. The Mount Plate has a built-in dual DC output interface (7.4V and 12V) to power multiple devices simultaneously. Comes with a built-in anti-drop pin Arca-Swiss quick-release plate, and can be used without a cage.

Note: When used with the Canon EOS R5C, the Mount Plate cannot be used in a vertical (90°) position.

Work With

Compatible with most mirrorless cameras

Compatible with NP-F batteries

title: SmallRig Wildlife Photography Kit (Touch & Go Plate S) 4722
desc:
1. Tailored for wildlife photography enthusiasts and widely compatible with popular telephoto lenses and cameras from Sony, Canon, and Nikon for enhanced productivity.

2. Touch & Go Plate S quick-release plate and rod clamp base combined design effectively reduces weight, ensuring a lighter shooting experience.

4. The lens support features a lens strap hole for convenient on-the-go carrying, enabling efficient shooting transitions and doubling productivity.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Wildlife Photography Kit (Touch & Go Plate S) 4722

SmallRig Wildlife Photography Kit (Touch & Go Plate S) 4722 is tailored for wildlife photography enthusiasts, offering compatibility with a variety of telephoto lenses and cameras from popular brands such as Sony, Canon, and Nikon, enhancing creative efficiency. The Touch & Go Plate S features a compact design integrating a quick-release plate and a dual rod clamp base, effectively reducing weight and eliminating the need for adapters, enabling seamless attachment to tripods for an efficient shooting process. The snap-on lens support design ensures easy installation, providing secure protection for the lens mount, while the lens support wheel design allows unrestricted movement regardless of focus ring position.

The camera body is connected to the dual rod system through a hinge, offering flexible and adjustable compatibility with various camera models (detailed compatibility is listed in the 'Compatibility' below). Along with two additional connection points, the three-point support system for the camera body, camera mount, and lens enables stable lateral movement for steady shooting and uninterrupted subject tracking.

The carbon fiber construction of the dual rods ensures high strength while remaining lightweight.

The lens support features a lens strap hole for convenient carrying on the go, enhancing efficiency by allowing for quick transitions. The entire kit can effectively support up to 6kg / 13.2lb.

Additionally, there is an optional Manfrotto (501PL) quick-release plate (ID 4429) available for selection.

title: SmallRig SH73 Grip Handle Designed Powerbank 4767
desc:
1. Split-type design for quick battery replacement and extended usage.

2. Dual interfaces, compatible with a wide range of video lights.

3. 1/4"-20 screw with locating pins for quick installation and universal compatibility.

4. Ergonomic design for comfortable grip and even weight distribution.

5. Includes a 73Wh battery module that supports 45 minutes of 100W PD output.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig SH73 Grip Handle Designed Powerbank 4767

SmallRig SH73 Grip Handle Designed Powerbank 4767 features a split-type design, differentiating it from other power handles. Its V-mount battery base is universally compatible with standard V-mount batteries, enabling quick battery replacement for extended power supply.

This power handle features an internal conversion circuit that enables V-mount battery BP input to be converted into USB-C PD/DC output. With USB-C and D-TAP interfaces, it supports up to 100W USB-C PD output and up to 168W D-TAP to DC output, making it compatible with most portable video lights on the market.

Additionally, the top of the handle is equipped with anti-twist 1/4"-20 screw with locating pins, allowing compatibility with video lights that feature standard 1/4"-20 locating holes. Its ergonomic design provides a comfortable grip and ensures even weight distribution.

The handle also comes with a 73Wh battery module, which can support 45 minutes of 100W PD output for the RC 100B video light.

Usage Scenarios: Designed for handheld power supply for video lights, ideal for scenarios such as mobile video shooting (content creation, short videos, short films) and mobile photography (comic conventions, wedding photography, travel photography).

Note: This product does not support charging while using.

title: SmallRig "HawkLock" Quick Release Half Cage for Sony FX3 / FX30 4772
desc:
1. Built-in HawkLock Quick Release mounting points, improve the efficiency of disassembling and assembling.

2. Modular design with removable NATO rail; supports the original XLR top handle.

3. Arca-Swiss quick release plate at the bottom quickly attaches DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro gimbal and Arca-Swiss tripod.

4. Multiple mounting points: 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes, cold shoe mounts, NATO rail and QD socket support handles, microphones, LED lights, monitors, etc.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig "HawkLock" Quick Release Half Cage for Sony FX3 / FX30 4772

SmallRig "HawkLock" Quick Release Half Cage for Sony FX3 / FX30 4772 is designed to protect the camera and provide accessory mounting points. The modular cage consists of a top plate (NATO rail) and a L-shaped cage. The NATO rail is secured on the top via two 1/4"-20 screws and removed to allow installing the original XLR top handle; the L-shaped cage is fixed via a 1/4"-20 screw on the left side and at the bottom to prevent twisting, with a cushion against scratches. The patented self-developed quick-release structure (named HawkLock) covers the cold shoe,  NATO rail, and Arca-Swiss plate. It is used in conjunction with HawkLock eco-accessories, such as the Top Handle 4483, the Side Handle 4485, the Arca-Swiss Clamp 4486, etc., to achieve smooth sliding in and self-locking to improve the efficiency of disassembling and reassembling. At the same time, it is compatible with the traditional cold shoe, NATO Clamp, and the Arca-Swiss Clamp eco-accessories. In addition, the cage has built-in 1/4“-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8”-16 Locating Hole, 1/4”-20 locating holes, QD socket, and strap slot, and can be expanded with accessories such as Magic Arm 3873, Top Handle 2165C, Rod Clamp 3598, QD Shoulder Strap, Hand Strap 3848, and Shoulder Strap PSC2428 for professional creation. A magnetic wrench is also included for easy assembly and disassembly.

Note:

1. When using the top plate, compatible hot shoe accessories include the Sony ECM-M1 microphone, Sony ECM-B1M microphone, Sony HVL-F32M flash, and DJI Mic 2 Camera Adapter. Incompatible hot shoe accessories include Sony ECM-W3 /W3S and Sony ECM-W2BT microphone.

2. Please remove the top NATO rail before installing the original XLR handle.

Work With

Sony FX30

Sony FX3

Sony FX3A

title: SmallRig Camera Cage for Blackmagic Design Cinema 6K (Full-Frame) 4785
desc:
1. Dedicated full cage for BlackmagicDesign Cinema 6K (Full-Frame), convertible into a half cage for added versatility.

2. Three-point locking system ensures stability and prevents twisting by securing the camera with two 1/4"-20 screws at the base and a 1/4"-20 screw at the top.

3. Versatile built-in interfaces including 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, cold shoe mounts, NATO rail, QD mounts, and wrist/shoulder strap holes for diverse shooting scenarios.

4. Two 1/4"-20 threaded holes at the handgrip prevent twisting for stable shooting in portrait orientation.

5. Includes a complimentary lens mount adapter support to safeguard against mount damage.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Camera Cage for Blackmagic Design Cinema 6K (Full-Frame) 4785

SmallRig Camera Cage for Blackmagic Design Cinema 6K (Full-Frame) 4785 is designed for handheld shooting with smooth camera movements. It protects the camera while providing various expansion options. Three-point locking system secures the camera with two 1/4"-20 screws at the base and a 1/4"-20 screw on the top, while integrated silicone pads prevent scratching. The cage offers unobstructed access to all camera interfaces, card slots, the flip screen, and the battery compartment. The lens adapter support is compatible with Sigma MC-31, Sigma MC-21, and similar lens adapters, preventing the camera's mount from damage. The cage features 1/4"-20 threaded holes, 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes for attaching accessories like side handles (2093, 4016), top handles (2165C), monitor mounts (2903, 2904), Manfrotto baseplates (1280, 2458), tripods (3989), and more. Additionally, the integrated 1/4"-20 and 3/8"-16 threaded holes, ARRI locating holes, and cold shoe mount allows for the attachment of accessories such as magic arms (3873), cable clamps (3271, 3289, 2960), and protective interface covers to prevent signal loss. Two 1/4"-20 threaded holes at the handgrip prevent the camera from twisting in portrait orientation. The slider on the left enables quick attachment of slider rotation handles (3847), and slider handles (4017) and facilitates the swift mounting of accessories. The built-in cold shoe mounts accommodate microphones, LED video lights, SSD mount brackets (ID 3272, 2343), and more. It also features strap interfaces compatible with wrist straps (3848, 2456) and shoulder straps (2793). The QD interface allows seamless integration with QD quick-release shoulder straps (4118).  The cage can be converted into a half case for stabilizer setups, ensuring easy leveling. Additionally, the cage features a magnetic Allen wrench at the bottom to facilitate accessory assembly and disassembly.

Work With

Blackmagic Design Cinema 6K (Full-Frame)

title: SmallRig Vibe P96 Pro mini LED Video Light  (Pink) 4786
desc:
1. User-friendly interface with an embedded color screen for easy single-handed brightness adjustment.

2. Multiple mounting options for enhanced efficiency and flexible lighting setups.

3. Professional color rendering performance to illuminate inspiration, delivering exceptional lighting.

4. 1.2 hours of battery life at full power, up to 3 hours for regular shooting.

5. High-strength materials, including ABS, PC, and textured anodized aluminum alloy, ensure sturdiness and durability.

6. Suitable for flat-lay photo and video content creation, including tabletop and figurine photography, portraits, short videos, vlogs, and store exploration videos.

7. Simulates 2500K-6500K daylight and offers 5 special effects.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Vibe P96 Pro mini LED Video Light  (Pink) 4786

SmallRig Vibe P96 Pro mini LED Video Light  (Pink) 4786 is the second-generation product in SmallRig's Vibe LED Light series. Inheriting the iconic ring-shaped metal step-less knob design, it now features an embedded LCD color screen for a clear display of parameters such as color temperature and brightness, allowing for easy single-handed adjustment. The light features a quick-release cold shoe base that enables seamless switching between various lighting setups like top-mount, handheld, or desktop stand, significantly enhancing flexibility and efficiency. Premium 5W Bi-Color Light Source with CRI > 95 and TLCI > 98, delivering 1160Lux @ 0.3m/5600K. Equipped with an integrated rectangular soft light panel for a seamless transition between horizontal and vertical soft lighting setups. Featuring a range of built-in special effects options, this light excels in professional color rendering, igniting creativity with its brilliant illumination. Built-in 1500mAh lithium polymer battery supports USB-C charging, providing up to 1.2 hours at full power and 3 hours for regular shooting. Equipped with various mounting options including 1/4"-20 threaded holes and a cold shoe mount, it provides convenient and flexible lighting configurations. The light body features a high-strength ABS frame, anodized aluminum alloy knobs, and an ABS/PC softbox, ensuring durability. The soft light panel provides uniform and wide light dispersion, capturing smooth and silky soft light moments for portrait photography effortlessly. With built-in cool/warm light and special effects modes, it can simulate 2500K-6500K daylight and five special effects (lightning, TV, fireworks, candlelight, pulse). This product meets all user needs for control experience, disassembly efficiency, light source performance, battery life, installation efficiency, light control accuracy, and quality stability in one convenient package.

Usage: Lightweight solution for photo and video content creation,  covering tabletop or small-space flat-lay shoots like desk photography, figurine photography, and portraits, as well as video content production (short videos, vlogs, store exploration, live streaming).

Warning: The device's body temperature may elevate during prolonged use, particularly in continuous operation. Exercise caution when handling to prevent accidents.

Work With

Compatible with the upcoming P96Pro/P108Pro silicone softbox

Compatible with accessories featuring a 1/4"-20 threaded adapter

SmallRig Swing-Away 4414

SmallRig Swing-Away 4414 is designed for users who need to change lenses on their matte box quickly. desc:

2. The included panoramic ball head features alignment markings that help users capture stunning panoramic shots with ease.

3. The damping ball head allows for seamless multi-angle adjustments, facilitating quick switches between landscape and portrait orientations for versatile shooting options.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Metal Tabletop Tripod with Arca-Swiss Quick Release Plate and Panoramic Ball Head 4630

SmallRig Metal Tabletop Tripod with Arca-Swiss Quick Release Plate and Panoramic Ball Head 4630 offers solutions for macro photography, smartphone photography, live streaming, and shooting in confined spaces. It provides stable support for small DSLRs, mirrorless cameras, smartphones, action cameras, etc., and enables handheld action shooting. Constructed from high-quality aluminum alloy, the payload of the ball head is up to 5kg (11.0 lbs), while the legs can support up to 20kg (44.1 lbs). Equipped with non-slip silicone foot pads, it enhances friction to prevent slipping on smooth surfaces during shooting. Equipped with alignment markings for effortless use, the panoramic ball head enables 360° panning for panoramic photography. The ball head facilitates multi-angle adjustments and seamless transitions between landscape and portrait orientations. The tripod comes with an Arca-Swiss quick-release plate for easy and swift device mounting and dismounting.

Work With

1. Compatible with 1/4-20" screw on top.

2. After removing the Arca-type head, the tripod can be paired with the quick-release adapter (ID 4609) to utilize the SmallRig HawkLock H11 quick-release ecosystem.

SmallRig Camera Viewfinder Eyecup for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 4819

title: SmallRig L-Bracket for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 4569
desc:
1. Arca-compatible side plate and baseplate for quickly switching between horizontal and vertical shots on a tripod.

2. The hinged Arm at the battery door fits the camera curve and enhances the grip experience.

3. Lower left shoulder strap mounting design, LCD screen viewing, adjusting more freely, can reduce the risk of lens bumping.

4. Multiple mounting points: 1/4"-20 threaded holes, strap slot, QD socket support tripods, strap, etc.

5. An extendable side plate leaves room for cables.

Notice: This item is not sold in the U.S.A.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig L-Bracket for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 4569

SmallRig L-Bracket for Sony Alpha 7C II / Alpha 7CR 4569 enables a quick switch between horizontal and vertical shots while improving grip experience. It attaches to the bottom of the camera via a 1/4" -20 screw and locating pin, with features a built-in silicone pad to prevent scratches and twisting. There is a spindle spanner at the battery door which fits the camera curve and leaves room for a little finger for a comfortable grip. Embedded select genuine leather in the baseplate integrates into the camera body; Arca compatible baseplate and side plates come with a lens center mark. The side plate is extendable to allow attaching HDMI cables and adjusted back and forth to facilitate 180-degree opening and 120-degree rotation of the LCD screen. Multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes at the bottom support quick-release plates, tripods, and the quick-release plate (pad) of the DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro stabilizer. In addition, there is a shoulder strap hole in the lower left corner, which can be used with the shoulder strap hook in the upper right corner of the camera to realize diagonal mounting of the shoulder strap for LCD screen viewing; the lens is facing down when diagonally mounting the shoulder strap, which effectively reduces bumping. Built-in Flat-head Screwdriver for easy disassembly and assembly.

Note:

1. The LCD screen can only be rotated and adjusted about 120° in the side flip state after using the L-bracket.

2. Please extend the side plate to use the camera port.

3. It is recommended that the triangular ring on the left side of the camera be removed before installation.

Work With

Sony Alpha 7C II

Sony Alpha 7CR

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Panasonic LUMIX GH7 / GH6 4824

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Panasonic LUMIX GH7 / GH6 4824 is designed to provide accessory mounts and protect the camera. The patented self-developed quick-release structure (named HawkLock) covers cold shoes, NATO rail, and arca swiss, which is used with HawkLock eco-accessories to realize solid and no false position, one push to load, release to lock, and improve the disassembly efficiency. It locks the camera via one 1/4"-20 screw and the two M2.5 screws on both sides. Built-in all-around protective spacers prevent the camera from being scratched. The cage gives access to interfaces, dials, buttons, or battery doors. 1/4"-20 threaded holes, ARRI 3/8" -16 locating holes and HawkLock cold shoe mounts support top handle 3765, side handle 2093, monitor mount 2903, microphones, LED lights, monitors, etc. The bottom QD socket supports the QD shoulder strap. HawkLock Arca-Swiss quick-release plate at the bottom is compatible with DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro. Strap holes on the sides and bottom of the cage allow attaching such accessories as hand strap PAC2456. Besides, the cage comes with a built-in magnetic spanner that facilitates disassembly and assembly.

Note:

1. To use the side locks you need to remove the triangle split rings on both sides of the camera first.

2. This cage is compatible with Panasonic DMW-XLR1 / XLR2, recommended to use [SmallRig Top Handle for Sony XLR-K1M / K2M / K3M and Panasonic DMW-XLR1 / XLR2 3082], please remove the cable clamp at the bottom of the XLR before using 3082.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Flagship Edition for iPhone 16 Pro Max 4827

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Flagship Edition for iPhone 16 Pro Max 4827 is a versatile mobile video cage meticulously designed to elevate your video recording, live streaming, and cinematic filmmaking to professional levels. This comprehensive set includes a phone protective case, a T-mount lens backplate, a trim ring, a video cage, and a TUP soft frame.

The equipped with a quick-release T-mount backplate phone case serves as daily protection. The T-mount backplate can be switched by a trim ring, a 17mm threaded lens backplate, or a 67mm magnetic filter adapter for enhanced optical output. The phone can be quickly mounted into the cage, featuring multiple 1/4"-20 anti-twist threaded holes and cold shoe mounts to expand it with accessories like handles, tripods, microphones, and lights, enhancing your shooting experience, while the integrated quick-release interfaces ensure seamless connectivity. 

The cage features a side-mounted wrist strap and shoulder strap holes compatible with professional straps under 2mm in diameter, for convenient carrying during shooting breaks. The hollowed-out design of the cage preserves access to all iPhone buttons, ports, radar system, ultra-wide lens, and wireless charging.

The quick lock mechanism allows for convenient, secure phone mounting and dismounting, preventing accidental unlocking. The all-metal construction of the cage provides comprehensive protection for your phone, aiding in shock absorption and safeguarding against scratches. The set enables the phone to be used without the case for underwater shooting or high-performance cooling, securely housed within the cage alongside the TPU soft frame.

Note: The phone case width is 81.7mm / 3.21in. When using a third-party phone case with the cage, ensure accurate measurements for compatibility.

title: SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX Hydraulic Carbon Fiber Tripod 4858
desc:
1. The X-Clutch hydraulic technology for instant single-action extension of all legs.

2. Leveling in seconds.

3. The compact design fits perfectly in standard luggage.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX Hydraulic Carbon Fiber Tripod 4858

SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX Hydraulic Carbon Fiber Tripod 4858 is the SmallRig x Potato Jet TRIBEX Hydraulic Carbon Fiber Tripod Kit (ID:4259) without video head version, designed for professional outdoor videography, offering swift and convenient operation. Featuring X-Clutch hydraulic technology, squeezing a single clutch allows all legs to unfold rapidly, adjust the angle, and automatically lock in just one second, providing photographers with a seamless experience. The clutch can also be adjusted to 45° and 90° to accommodate various shooting scenarios. Constructed with carbon fiber, both the legs and center column ensure lightweight design while delivering exceptional stability and high load-bearing capacity of 25kg (55lbs); it weighs only 2.6kg (5.7lbs).

The tripod operating altitude ranges from 15cm (5.9in) to 155cm (61.0in), and a compact storage length of 66cm (26.0in). The center column features a quick-lock design for easy height adjustments, with a detachable Allen wrench built into the other side of the hook for convenient camera equipment assembly/disassembly, and the option for low-angle shooting at a minimum height of 15cm (5.9in). The compact design of the tripod allows it to fit in any standard luggage (28"). The tripod also features three 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching accessories like magic arms, along with a built-in flat head screw for convenient camera installation and removal. The tripod also includes quick-release rubber feet with integrated spikes, allowing for seamless adaptation to various terrains.

Note:

1. Before shooting, make sure the head and tripod locking status are in normal condition.

2. Avoid use in sandy environments to prevent the risk of damage.

3. After using the short center column, mounted on the center column, need to ensure that the locking status.

4. Max payload of center column: 8kg / 16.6lb (center column raised, leg angle at 23°, height at 155cm / 61.0in).

5. Max payload of tripod: 25kg / 55lbs (center column not raised, leg angle at 23°, height at 128cm / 50.4in. The weight capacity of the tripod is not the absolute limit; it varies depending on the type of equipment, lenses used, accessories attached, and changes in the center of gravity).

6. After soaking in water, it needs to be dried before use.

Work With

3/8”-16 Threaded Flat Base Head

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate with Wooden Handle for Sony ZV-E10 II 4864

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate with Wooden Handle for Sony ZV-E10 II 4864 is designed to enhance the handgrip for users. The L-shaped mount plate is secured at the bottom with a 1/4"-20 screw. The handgrip is made of natural solid wood, elegant with a rich, natural feel, and designed ergonomically to enhance the grip feeling. The hinge on the battery compartment contours the camera's curves and improves the grip by addressing pinky placement issues.

The mount plate features a 1/4"-20 threaded hole at the bottom making it compatible with mini tripods and DJI RS Mini quick-release plates for camera stabilization setups.  It also has an integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate, compatible with Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro Pro stabilizers, facilitating smooth transitions between handheld, stabilizer, and tripod shooting scenarios. The bottom features a QD interface for the QD shoulder straps, while a strap hole is compatible with wrist straps (ID 3848).

To enhance convenience, the kit is equipped with a built-in magnetic Allen wrench at its base, ensuring quick access and facilitating easy assembly and disassembly.

desc:
1. Dual Arca-Swiss design with the base and side quick-release plates for a swift switching between landscape and portrait modes.

2. Three-point locking system ensures stability and prevents twisting by securing the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the base, a locating block, and a rolling pin.

3. Equipped with locating block to maintain stability and prevent distortion when shooting in portrait mode.

4. The side plate extends by 22.5mm / 0.9in for convenient cable routing in portrait orientation.

5. Versatile built-in interfaces include Arca-Swiss quick-release plates, 1/4"-20 threaded holes, QD mounts, cold shoe mounts, and shoulder/wrist strap holes for diverse shooting scenarios.

Notice: This item is not sold in the U.S.A.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for FUJIFILM GFX100S II 4716

SmallRig L-Shape Mount Plate for FUJIFILM GFX100S II 4716 is designed to facilitate quick switching between landscape and portrait modes for your camera. Three-point locking system ensures stability and prevents twisting by securing the camera with a 1/4"-20 screw at the base, a locating block, and a rolling pin, while integrated pads prevent the camera from scratching. The advanced locating block with the built-in cold shoe mount provides dual-point support to stabilize the cage and prevent distortion after extending the side plate. The cage offers unobstructed access to interfaces and buttons, allowing easy battery access, flip screen use, and cable management. The side plate extends by 22.5mm / 0.9in for convenient cable routing in portrait orientation. With multiple expansion interfaces like 1/4"-20 threaded holes, QD mounts, cold shoe mounts, and strap holes, it accommodates accessories such as the QD shoulder strap (ID 4118), microphone (ID 3468), tripods (ID 3989 / 4307) for versatile shooting setups. The built-in Arca-Swiss quick-release plate on the base is compatible with Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, enabling quick transitions between setups. Additionally, a magnetic dual-head flat wrench on the base plate simplifies assembly and disassembly, while a cable organizer keeps your setup tidy.

FUJIFILM GFX100S II

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Professional 12" 360° Photography Turntable 4807

SmallRig Professional 12" 360° Photography Turntable 4807 is primarily used for commercial video, food photography, and product shots. The product features a telescopic arm and foldable legs for a quick 3-step setup. This turntable photography utilizes industry-leading bearings for smooth, stable, and quiet operation. Weighting only 3.6kg / 7.9lb, this turntable is easy to transport. The detachable turntable allows for use with a tripod, freeing you from desktop constraints. Also, this product supports a maximum load of 5kg / 11.02lb on the base and 3kg / 6.6lb on the ball head section. The solid metal construction ensures durability and reliability.

Note:

1. Avoid exposing the bearing part to water, rain, or foreign objects.

2. The maximum weight capacity of the base is 5kg / 11.02lb.

3. The maximum weight capacity of the ball head is 3kg / 6.6lb.

4. When using a tripod, pay attention to the weight capacity of the head.

5. Ensure the weight is balanced at both ends of the rotation arm during use.

6. Exercise caution when installing or removing the camera to prevent tipping due to uneven weight distribution.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig 145W 4-Port PD Power Adapter (EU Standard) 4748

SmallRig 145W 4-Port PD Power Adapter (EU Standard) 4748 is a highly efficient and versatile charging device with a total output power of 145W. Featuring four USB-C ports, this charger supports simultaneous charging of multiple devices such as V mount batteries, NP-F batteries, rechargeable camera batteries, smartphones, computers, etc., making it suitable for various usage scenarios. All ports support fast charging, with USB-C1 / C2 supporting a maximum single-port output of 140W through PD3.1, and USB-C3 / C4 supporting a maximum output of 45W, providing strong support for high-power devices and significantly enhancing charging efficiency. Each output port is equipped with short-circuit and overcurrent protection to ensure safe usage. Additionally, the compact size of the charger makes it convenient for travel and daily use. The power status indicator light design illuminates when connected to power and turns off when disconnected, providing a clear overview of the charging status.

title: SmallRig RC 100B COB LED Video Light (Standard Version) 4893
desc:
1. Compact palm-sized design for easy storage, transport, and on-the-go lighting.

2. Supports versatile wireless and wired power options for seamless shooting without interruptions.

3. Offers efficient wireless and manual operation modes of light control.

4. Features a patented high Color Rendering Index (CRI) and high illuminance light source for exceptional illumination and color accuracy.

5. Simulates 2700K-6500K sunlight, features 12 special effects, and allows quick access to 4 preset parameters.

6. Comes with a comprehensive range of accessories for enhanced functionality.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig RC 100B COB LED Video Light (Standard Version) 4893

SmallRig RC 100B COB LED Video Light (Standard Version) 4893 is the latest addition to SmallRig's  Portable COB LED Video Light Ecosystem. This new light features a consistent cubic design, and an efficient cooling system independently developed by SmallRig.  The palm-sized RC 100B COB LED video light is only one-third the size of a traditional COB LED video light and is very close to the RED KOMODO in size, weighing just 700g or 24.7oz. Its compact design allows for easy storage and transport, making it particularly suitable for on-the-go photography and video content creation.

The light supports a variety of wireless and wired power options. Users can opt for V-mount batteries or NP-F970 batteries for wireless power supply, charge the device through a USB-C port with accessories like battery grip handles, PD fast charging power bank and charging plug, or AC to DC power adaptor. A single 98Wh V mount battery provides about an hour of full power, enabling uninterrupted shooting with quick battery changes.

The light offers both wireless and manual control modes for efficient light management. Wireless light control can be achieved through the SmallGoGo application. It is also compatible with DMX wired control manually when used with a DMX adapter (sold separately). Additionally, manual adjustments are possible via a 1.3-inch LCD screen, which is complemented by two individual knobs on the side of the device.

The Chip-on-Board light source features a patented high Color Rendering Index (CRI) for exceptional illumination and color accuracy. At a distance of 1m / 39.4in, the bare light source provides illumination of 4,610Lux at 5600K, which can be increased to 20,100Lux with the 45° mini hyper reflector. With a CRI of 97+, TLCI of 98+, SSI (3200K) of 91, and TM-30 (3200K) Rf/ Rg reaching 97/102, the light offers professional color performance, precise calibration, and accurate reproduction of natural daylight.

The body is made of V-0 flame retardant PC+ABS and reinforced with metal parts at the base, reducing weight by 30% compared to full aluminum alloy bodies while ensuring durability for frequent use.

The light features built-in cool and warm light adjust, special effects adjust, and preset modes, allowing simulation of 2700K-6500K sunlight with 12 common special effects. It also supports 4 sets of preset parameters for quick access and application of specific lighting settings.

It comes with a comprehensive range of accessories, fully compatible with SmallRig's mini-mount modifiers (D30, D60, 45x45 softbox) / battery accessories (V mount and NP-F970 batteries, universal battery grip handle for COB lights) / mounting accessories (light stand adaptor, Bowen's mount adapter part, 1/4"-20 with ARRI locating pins magic arm), providing users with a one-stop solution for portability, convenient power supply, easy control, high-quality light source, and comprehensive accessory ecosystem.

Usage Scenarios: Ideal for content creation, including photography (anime Convention, event,  travel, and wedding photography) as well as video content creation (YouTube channel episodes, interviews, documentaries, music video production, TV commercials, and live streaming).

Note: After using the equipment, the COB LED beads, panel area, top, and bottom of the device are all high-temperature zones. Avoid touching these high-temperature areas before the device has cooled down. For your safety and well-being, do not block the heat dissipation holes while using this device, and avoid prolonged direct exposure to the COB LED beads during operation.

title: SmallRig SH01 Charging Grip Handle (Compatible with V-Mount Battery) 4895
desc:
1. Split-type design for quick battery replacement and extended usage.

2. Dual interfaces, compatible with a wide range of video lights.

3. 1/4"-20 screw with locating pins for quick installation and universal compatibility.

4. Ergonomic design for comfortable grip and even weight distribution.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig SH01 Charging Grip Handle (Compatible with V-Mount Battery) 4895

SmallRig SH01 Charging Grip Handle (Compatible with V-Mount Battery) 4895 features a split-type design, differentiating it from other power handles. Its V-mount battery base is universally compatible with standard V-mount batteries, enabling quick battery replacement for extended power supply.

This power handle features an internal conversion circuit that enables V-mount battery BP input to be converted into USB-C PD/DC output. With USB-C and D-TAP interfaces, it supports up to 100W USB-C PD output and up to 168W D-TAP to DC output, making it compatible with most portable video lights on the market.

Additionally, the top of the handle is equipped with anti-twist 1/4"-20 screw and locating pins, allowing compatibility with video lights that feature standard 1/4"-20 locating holes. Its ergonomic design provides a comfortable grip and ensures even weight distribution.

Usage Scenarios: Designed for handheld power supply for video lights, ideal for scenarios such as mobile video shooting (content creation, short videos, short films) and mobile photography (comic conventions, wedding photography, travel photography).

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig RC 100B COB LED Video Light Kit (with Battery Grip Handle) 4897

SmallRig RC 100B COB LED Video Light Kit (with Battery Grip Handle) 4897 is the latest addition to SmallRig's Portable COB LED Video Light Ecosystem. This innovative light features a sleek cubic design and an efficient in-house cooling system. Compact and lightweight, the palm-sized RC 100B is only one-third the size of traditional COB LED lights, closely resembling the RED KOMODO, and weighs just 700g (24.7oz). This design facilitates easy storage and transport, making it ideal for on-the-go shooting.

Equipped with a Chip-on-Board light source, the RC 100B boasts a patented high Color Rendering Index (CRI) for exceptional illumination and color accuracy. At a distance of 1m (39.4in), it delivers 4,610 Lux at 5600K, which can be boosted to 20,100 Lux with the 45° mini reflector. With a CRI of 97+, a TLCI of 98+, an SSI (3200K) of 91, and TM-30 (3200K) Rf/Rg values of 97/102, this light ensures professional-grade color rendering and accurate reproduction of natural daylight. It also features cool and warm light options, special effects, and preset modes, simulating sunlight from 2700K to 6500K with 12 special effects. Users can quickly access four sets of preset parameters for specific lighting settings.

Control options include wireless operation through the SmallGoGo app or DMX wired control with a separate adapter. Manual adjustments are facilitated by a 1.44-inch LCD color screen and two independent knobs.

The light offers versatile power options, allowing for wireless operation with either V-mount or NP-F970 batteries. It can also be charged via a USB-C port using accessories such as a power handle, PD power bank, or charging cable, as well as an AC to DC power adapter. Contains SH73 Grip Handle Designed Powerbank, which can support up to 45 minutes of runtime at maximum output, ensuring uninterrupted shooting with quick battery swaps.

Constructed from V-0 flame-retardant PC+ABS and reinforced with metal at the base, the light is 30% lighter than full aluminum alloy bodies while maintaining durability for frequent use.

A comprehensive range of accessories is included, fully compatible with SmallRig's mini-mount lighting modifiers (D30, D60, 45x45 softbox), battery accessories (V-mount and NP-F970 batteries, universal power handle for COB lights), and mounting accessories (light stand adapter, Bowens mount adapters, magic arm with 1/4"-20 ARRI locating pins). This provides users with a one-stop solution for portability, convenient power supply, easy control, high-quality light source, and a complete accessory ecosystem.

Usage Scenarios: Perfect for content creation, including photography at anime conventions, events, travel, and weddings, as well as video production for YouTube episodes, interviews, documentaries, music videos, TV commercials, and live streaming.

Note: After operation, the COB LED beads, panel area, and both the top and bottom of the device may become hot. To ensure safety, please refrain from touching these areas until they have cooled down. Additionally, avoid obstructing the heat dissipation holes during use, and do not stare directly at the COB LED beads for extended periods.

The RC 60C represents SmallRig's debut RGBCW full-color COB portable light, enhancing the exceptional performance of its predecessor, the RC 60B, with additional professional features. This light boasts a customized light source with a broader color temperature range from 2500K to 10000K, along with advanced functions like G/M adjustment and colored filter adjustment.

Offering both manual (on the light body) and remote (dedicated app) control options, this light provides users with a truly innovative and user-friendly experience.

Target Audience and Scenarios: Designed for photographers and content creators, the RC 60C RGB LED Video Light serves as an essential fill lighting tool while live streaming and content creation, as well as key or ambient lighting to establish specific atmospheres and enhance color contrast. It is also effective as portable fill lighting, including weddings, outdoor short video shoots, store walkthroughs, and live streaming.

SmallRig ST30 One-Touch Deploy Selfie Stick Tripod (White) 4898

SmallRig ST30 One-Touch Deploy Selfie Stick Tripod (White) 4898 is a versatile companion designed for seamless adaptability to a variety of shooting scenarios. With its flexible step-less length adjustment feature, this device effortlessly extends from 33 to 170cm (13.0 to 66.1in), catering to a wide range of shooting needs.

Its standout feature lies in the unique triangular base design, ensuring stability with a quick single-action deployment, providing stable shots regardless of the terrain. Additionally, the included adjustable phone holder accommodates most smartphones with widths ranging from 60 to 100mm (2.4 to 3.9in) and facilitates multi-angle shooting with a 180° pan and tilt.

To enhance convenience, the Bluetooth remote control allows for a stable connection within a 10m (32.8ft) range and magnetically attaches to the selfie stick.

Besides, the storage design of this selfie stick tripod ensures effortless portability, making it an ideal companion for on-the-go photography enthusiasts.

title: SmallRig S 60 Wireless Microphone (Black / USB-C Version) 4934
desc:
1. Stylish and compact, this button-sized microphone is designed for comfortable, discreet wear.

2. Equipped with LDS antenna for stable signal transmission up to 300m / 984.2ft.

3. Customized highly directional microphone head for clear and pure audio recording.

4. High-resolution DSP chip supporting 48 kHz / 24-bit recording, with one-touch DSP noise reduction.

5. The 11-hour battery life is extended to nearly 44 hours with the charging case.

6. 3-level gain adjustment.

7. The microphone features a double-tap mute function.

8. Convenient charging while using mobile phones.

9. Tailored for mobile filming and live streaming, offering simple and efficient audio recording.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig S 60 Wireless Microphone (Black / USB-C Version) 4934

SmallRig S 60 Wireless Microphone (Black / USB-C Version) 4934 S60 is the latest wireless microphone from SmallRig, blending Bauhaus design elements with minimalist geometric patterns to define its modern appearance, incorporating advanced IML technology.

The button-sized microphone transmitter (TX), weighing only 7.9g / 0.27oz, offers excellent portability and stylish aesthetics for discreet wear. Featuring a laser direct structuring (LDS) antenna, it ensures stable signal transmission up to 300.0m / 984.2ft.

The transmitter utilizes a customized highly directional microphone head to reduce electromagnetic interference and noise, delivering clear and pure audio recording. Built-in high-resolution DSP chip enables 48 kHz / 24-bit audio recording and supports one-touch DSP noise reduction for enhanced audio details and a wider dynamic range.

The transmitter (TX) boasts an 11-hour battery life per charge, while combined with the charging case reaches nearly 44 hours, which is 1.5 times longer than similar products.

It offers user-friendly features such as a 3-level gain adjustment and convenient mobile charging support on the receiver. Additionally, it has a double-tap mute function on the transmitter. These features make it perfect for mobile filming and live streaming, providing a simple, efficient, and high-quality audio recording experience.

Featuring a range of accessories, this microphone offers versatile wearing options such as collar magnetic attachment, neck hanging, handheld, and clip-on styles. Additionally, it supports the use of a windscreen that can be affixed to a silicone mount, providing windproofing and noise reduction benefits.

Usage Scenarios: Designed for audio capturing on lightweight video content creation. Suitable for Vlogging, social media content creation, live streaming, interviews, and documentary filming.

4. Built-in professional lighting features such as G/M adjustment, colored filters (ROSCO, LEE), HSI, RGBCW, and color picking, catering to the needs of professional users.

5. Wide range of lighting accessories (compatible with 60B mount), including mini reflectors, parabolic softboxes, Bowens mount adapters, and more.

6. Control the light using the app, 12 light effects.
description:

SmallRig RC 60C RGB LED Video Light (with Powerbank Clamp Edition) 4810

The RC 60C represents SmallRig's debut RGBCW full-color COB portable light, enhancing the exceptional performance of its predecessor, the RC 60B, with additional professional features. This light boasts a customized light source with a broader color temperature range from 2500K to 10000K, along with advanced functions like G/M adjustment and colored filter adjustment.

Offering both manual (on the light body) and remote (dedicated app) control options, this light provides users with a truly innovative and user-friendly experience.

Target Audience and Scenarios: Designed for photographers and content creators, the RC 60C RGB LED Video Light serves as an essential fill lighting tool while live streaming and content creation, as well as key or ambient lighting to establish specific atmospheres and enhance color contrast. It is also effective as portable fill lighting, including weddings, outdoor short video shoots, store walkthroughs, and live streaming.

title: SmallRig Baseplate for Sony ZV-E10 II 4950
desc:
1. Enhances grip comfort and protects the camera's bottom from scratches.

2. Enhanced ergonomics with a hinged door on the battery compartment conforms better to the contours of the camera body for improved handheld grip.

3. Multiple built-in interfaces, including 1/4"-20 threaded holes, strap holes, and QD interfaces for attaching accessories such as tabletop tripods and wrist straps.

4. The integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate at the bottom enables a seamless transition between handheld, tripod, and stabilizer (DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro) shooting scenarios.

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Baseplate for Sony ZV-E10 II 4950

SmallRig Baseplate for Sony ZV-E10 II 4950 is designed to enhance grip comfort and protect the camera's bottom. It mounts to the camera's bottom with a 1/4"-20 screw while the built-in protective padding prevents scratches on the camera and deviation. The battery compartment features a hinged door that conforms better to the curves of the camera body, solving the issue of where to place the little finger and enhancing the grip.

The bottom of the cage is equipped with a 1/4"-20 threaded hole for mounting a mini tripod and is compatible with the DJI RS Mini quick-release plate, facilitating camera stabilization. An integrated Arca-Swiss quick-release plate accommodates Arca-type tripods and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro gimbals, allowing seamless transitions between handheld, gimbal, and tripod shooting scenarios.

The cage also features strap holes on the sides and bottom for attaching accessories such as the wrist strap (ID 3848), while the integrated QD holes are compatible with QD shoulder straps.

To enhance convenience, the kit is equipped with a built-in magnetic Allen wrench at its base, ensuring quick access and facilitating easy assembly and disassembly.

Note: When using with the DJI RS 3 Mini stabilizer, ensure to first attach the DJI RS Mini quick-release plate to the base of the baseplate.

Sony ZV-E10 II

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig "Black Mamba" Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4975

SmallRig "Black Mamba" Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4975 is meticulously crafted to provide comprehensive protection and a multitude of expansion interfaces for your camera. The cage features a secure locking mechanism with a bottom 1/4"-20 screw and two side locating blocks, along with integrated silicone pads to prevent scratches on your camera. Maintaining the iconic "Black Mamba" style, this cage allows full access to all camera buttons and interfaces.

The cage features multiple 1/4"-20 and ARRI 3/8"-16 threaded holes for attaching accessories like side handles (ID 2093, 4346), magic arms (ID 3874, 3875), monitor mounts (ID 2904B), Manfrotto baseplates (ID 1280, 2458), L-shaped mount plate kits (ID MD4360), and others. The top section features ARRI locating holes for expanding with such accessories as top handles (ID 3765), quick-release top handles (ID 4483), and monitor mounts (ID 2903B). Additionally, it incorporates a cold shoe mount for microphones and lighting accessories.

The cage features ordinary strap slots compatible with wrist straps (ID 3848, 2456), an innovative strap slot for downward hanging for extra lens protection, and a QD interface compatible with QD quick-release shoulder straps (ID 4118).

The Arca-Swiss quick-release baseplate allows for direct mounting on Arca-type tripods (ID 4060, 4353) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, enabling swift transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups. Moreover, the cage incorporates a magnetic dual head wrench at the bottom for easy assembly and disassembly.

The cage comes with a durable scratch-resistant tempered glass screen protector with a surface hardness of 9H and an IK03 impact resistance test rating.

Note:

1. Remove the side locating blocks on both sides of the cage before mounting.

2. The tempered glass screen protector is intentionally designed to be slightly smaller than the screen edges to prevent dust from entering through larger gaps, constituting a normal design feature.

Work With

Canon EOS R5 Mark II

title: SmallRig Cooling Fan for Sony / Canon / FUJIFILM Selected Cameras 4815
desc:
1. High-efficiency fan with TEC cooling module to quickly cool down the camera.

2. Automatic intelligent temperature control design.

3. Snap-on installation, easy to install and remove, compatible with more cameras.

4. Can be used with or without a camera cage, lighter and freer to use.

5. Compatible with V-Mount Battery Mount Plate Kit 4064B / 4063B, with V-Mount batteries and other uses, convenient power supply.
description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Cooling Fan for Sony / Canon / FUJIFILM Selected Cameras 4815

SmallRig Cooling Fan for Sony / Canon / FUJIFILM Selected Cameras 4815 is designed to cool down Sony mirrorless cameras and enhance the recording duration of high-specification videos. The cooling system utilizes a high-efficiency fan with a TEC cooling module to quickly cool the camera and effectively alleviate overheating problems. Built-in intelligent temperature control design, the cooling system automatically adjusts the cooling system power according to the temperature of the contact surface between the cooling system and the camera, easy to use. Snap-on mounting design, easy to remove and install, compatible with more models. Can be used with or without a camera cage, and it is lighter and freer to use. The cooling system is compatible with V-Mount Battery Mount Plate Kit 4064B / 4063B, with V-Mount battery 3579 / 3580 / 4292 use, heat dissipation, and power supply without worry.

Note:

1. After installing this product, the camera's LCD screen will not be able to be stowed. If you need to store the LCD screen, please remove the cooling system first.

2. This product does not have a built-in battery and needs to be powered by connecting to an external power source for proper operation.

3. This product is not waterproof, please do not store or use it in a humid environment.

4. Do not block the air inlet or outlet when the Cooling System is in operation.

5. Do not use the Cooling System to continue cooling the camera when the camera is not operating to prevent condensation inside the camera.

6. When not in use, press and hold the power switch for about 2 seconds to enter standby mode or disconnect the power cord to turn off the device.

Work With

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4977

SmallRig HawkLock Quick Release Cage for Canon EOS R5 Mark II 4977 is meticulously crafted to provide comprehensive protection and a multitude of expansion interfaces for your camera. The cage secures the camera in place with a single 1/4"-20 screw at the base and two locating blocks on the sides, incorporating built-in silicone pads to prevent scratches on the camera.

The cage provides unobstructed access to all of the camera's buttons, slots, screen, battery compartment, and other interfaces. It also features a built-in HawkLock quick-release patent structure, allowing for one-touch quick and secure attachment with a self-locking mechanism, eliminating the need for additional reinforcement. The bi-directional mounting design enables free installation orientation.

The top and sides of the cage are equipped with H21 NATO rails, facilitating quick attachment of accessories such as top handles (ID 4483, 3766), monitor mounts (ID 2904B), and magic arms (ID 3874) for expanding monitoring capabilities. It also features multiple 1/4"-20 threaded holes and 1/4"-20 locating holes for compatibility with side handles (ID 2093, 4346), and other accessories. It supports the expansion of accessories such as magic arms (ID 3874, 3875), monitor mounts (ID 2904B), Manfrotto baseplates (ID 1280, 2458),  L-shaped mount plate kits (ID MD4360), and others. The right side of the cage features dual horizontal 1/4"-20 threaded holes for attaching tripods (ID 3989), ensuring stability during vertical shooting.

The cage features ordinary strap slots compatible with wrist straps (ID 3848, 2456), an innovative strap slot for downward hanging for extra lens protection, and a QD interface compatible with QD quick-release shoulder straps (ID 4118).

The Arca-Swiss quick-release baseplate allows for direct mounting on Arca-type tripods (ID 4060, 4353) and DJI RS 2 / RSC 2 / RS 3 / RS 3 Pro / RS 4 / RS 4 Pro stabilizers, enabling swift transitions between stabilizer, handheld, and tripod setups. Moreover, the cage incorporates a magnetic dual head wrench at the bottom for easy assembly and disassembly.

The cage comes with a durable scratch-resistant tempered glass screen protector with a surface hardness of 9H and an IK03 impact resistance test rating.

Note:

1. Remove the side locating blocks on both sides of the cage before mounting.

2. The tempered glass screen protector is intentionally designed to be slightly smaller than the screen edges to prevent dust from entering through larger gaps, constituting a normal design feature.

Work With

Canon EOS R5 Mark II

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Flagship Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 4828

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Flagship Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 4828 is a versatile mobile video cage meticulously designed to elevate your video recording, live streaming, and cinematic filmmaking to professional levels. This comprehensive set includes a phone protective case, a T-mount lens backplate, a trim ring, a video cage, and a TUP soft frame.

The equipped with a quick-release T-mount backplate phone case serves as daily protection. The T-mount backplate can be switched by a trim ring, a 17mm threaded lens backplate, or a 67mm magnetic filter adapter for enhanced optical output. The phone can be quickly mounted into the cage, featuring multiple 1/4"-20 anti-twist threaded holes and cold shoe mounts to expand it with accessories like handles, tripods, microphones, and lights, enhancing your shooting experience, while the integrated quick-release interfaces ensure seamless connectivity. 

The cage features a side-mounted wrist strap and shoulder strap holes compatible with professional straps under 2mm in diameter, for convenient carrying during shooting breaks. The hollowed-out design of the cage preserves access to all iPhone buttons, ports, radar system, ultra-wide lens, and wireless charging.

The quick lock mechanism allows for convenient, secure phone mounting and dismounting, preventing accidental unlocking. The all-metal construction of the cage provides comprehensive protection for your phone, aiding in shock absorption and safeguarding against scratches. The set enables the phone to be used without the case for underwater shooting or high-performance cooling, securely housed within the cage alongside the TPU soft frame.

Note: The phone case width is 75.6mm / 2.97in. When using a third-party phone case with the cage, ensure accurate measurements for compatibility.

iPhone 16 Pro

desc:

description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

 

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Basic Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 5008

SmallRig Mobile Video Cage Basic Edition for iPhone 16 Pro 5008 is a versatile cage meticulously crafted for the iPhone 16 Pro to enhance professional-grade video shooting, live streaming, and cinematic filmmaking. This product comprises a dedicated video cage, a T-mount backplate, and a TPU soft frame.

The video cage features multiple 1/4"-20 anti-twist threaded holes and cold shoe mounts, facilitating the attachment of handles, tripods, microphones, and lighting accessories to elevate the professionalism of your shooting experience, while the integrated quick-release interfaces ensure seamless connectivity.

The standard quick-release T-mount backplate can be swapped for a trim ring, a 17mm threaded lens backplate, or a 67mm magnetic filter adapter, enabling a broader range of high-quality optical outputs.

The cage features a side-mounted wrist strap and shoulder strap holes compatible with professional straps under 2mm in diameter, for convenient carrying during shooting breaks. The hollowed-out design of the cage preserves access to all iPhone buttons, ports, radar system, ultra-wide lens, and wireless charging.

The quick lock mechanism allows for convenient, secure phone mounting and dismounting, preventing accidental unlocking. Additionally, the all-metal construction of the cage provides comprehensive protection for your phone, aiding in shock absorption and safeguarding against scratches.

Note: The phone case width is 75.6mm / 2.97in. When using a third-party phone case with the cage, ensure accurate measurements for compatibility.
